13398  if (node->HostWindow->Appearing)
13399  BringWindowToDisplayFront(node->HostWindow);
13400 
13401  node->AuthorityForPos = node->AuthorityForSize = node->AuthorityForViewport = ImGuiDataAuthority_Auto;
13402  }
13403  else if (node->ParentNode)
13404  {
13405  node->HostWindow = host_window = node->ParentNode->HostWindow;
13406  node->AuthorityForPos = node->AuthorityForSize = node->AuthorityForViewport = ImGuiDataAuthority_Auto;
13407  }
13408  if (node->WantMouseMove && node->HostWindow)
13409  DockNodeStartMouseMovingWindow(node, node->HostWindow);
13410  }
13411 
13412  // Update focused node (the one whose title bar is highlight) within a node tree
13413  if (node->IsSplitNode())
13414  IM_ASSERT(node->TabBar == NULL);
13415  if (node->IsRootNode())
13416  if (g.NavWindow && g.NavWindow->RootWindowDockStop->DockNode && g.NavWindow->RootWindowDockStop->ParentWindow == host_window)
13417  node->LastFocusedNodeId = g.NavWindow->RootWindowDockStop->DockNode->ID;
13418 
13419  // We need to draw a background at the root level if requested by ImGuiDockNodeFlags_PassthruCentralNode, but we will only know the correct pos/size
13420  // _after_ processing the resizing splitters. So we are using the DrawList channel splitting facility to submit drawing primitives out of order!
13421  const bool render_dockspace_bg = node->IsRootNode() && host_window && (node_flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_PassthruCentralNode) != 0;
13422  if (render_dockspace_bg)
13423  {
13424  host_window->DrawList->ChannelsSplit(2);
13425  host_window->DrawList->ChannelsSetCurrent(1);
13426  }
13427 
13428  // Register a hit-test hole in the window unless we are currently dragging a window that is compatible with our dockspace
13429  ImGuiDockNode* central_node = node->CentralNode;
13430  const bool central_node_hole = node->IsRootNode() && host_window && (node_flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_PassthruCentralNode) != 0 && central_node != NULL && central_node->IsEmpty();
13431  bool central_node_hole_register_hit_test_hole = central_node_hole;
13432  if (central_node_hole)
13433  if (const ImGuiPayload* payload = ImGui::GetDragDropPayload())
13434  if (payload->IsDataType(IMGUI_PAYLOAD_TYPE_WINDOW) && DockNodeIsDropAllowed(host_window, *(ImGuiWindow**)payload->Data))
13435  central_node_hole_register_hit_test_hole = false;
13436  if (central_node_hole_register_hit_test_hole)
13437  {
13438  // We add a little padding to match the "resize from edges" behavior and allow grabbing the splitter easily.
13439  // (But we only add it if there's something else on the other side of the hole, otherwise for e.g. fullscreen
13440  // covering passthru node we'd have a gap on the edge not covered by the hole)
13441  IM_ASSERT(node->IsDockSpace()); // We cannot pass this flag without the DockSpace() api. Testing this because we also setup the hole in host_window->ParentNode
13442  ImGuiDockNode* root_node = DockNodeGetRootNode(central_node);
13443  ImRect root_rect(root_node->Pos, root_node->Pos + root_node->Size);
13444  ImRect hole_rect(central_node->Pos, central_node->Pos + central_node->Size);
13445  if (hole_rect.Min.x > root_rect.Min.x) { hole_rect.Min.x += WINDOWS_RESIZE_FROM_EDGES_HALF_THICKNESS; }
13446  if (hole_rect.Max.x < root_rect.Max.x) { hole_rect.Max.x -= WINDOWS_RESIZE_FROM_EDGES_HALF_THICKNESS; }
13447  if (hole_rect.Min.y > root_rect.Min.y) { hole_rect.Min.y += WINDOWS_RESIZE_FROM_EDGES_HALF_THICKNESS; }
13448  if (hole_rect.Max.y < root_rect.Max.y) { hole_rect.Max.y -= WINDOWS_RESIZE_FROM_EDGES_HALF_THICKNESS; }
13449  //GetForegroundDrawList()->AddRect(hole_rect.Min, hole_rect.Max, IM_COL32(255, 0, 0, 255));
13450  if (central_node_hole && !hole_rect.IsInverted())
13451  {
13452  SetWindowHitTestHole(host_window, hole_rect.Min, hole_rect.Max - hole_rect.Min);
13453  SetWindowHitTestHole(host_window->ParentWindow, hole_rect.Min, hole_rect.Max - hole_rect.Min);
13454  }
13455  }
13456 
13457  // Update position/size, process and draw resizing splitters
13458  if (node->IsRootNode() && host_window)
13459  {
13460  DockNodeTreeUpdatePosSize(node, host_window->Pos, host_window->Size);
13461  DockNodeTreeUpdateSplitter(node);
13462  }
13463 
13464  // Draw empty node background (currently can only be the Central Node)
13465  if (host_window && node->IsEmpty() && node->IsVisible && !(node_flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_PassthruCentralNode))
13466  host_window->DrawList->AddRectFilled(node->Pos, node->Pos + node->Size, GetColorU32(ImGuiCol_DockingEmptyBg));
13467 
13468  // Draw whole dockspace background if ImGuiDockNodeFlags_PassthruCentralNode if set.
13469  if (render_dockspace_bg && node->IsVisible)
13470  {
13471  host_window->DrawList->ChannelsSetCurrent(0);
13472  if (central_node_hole)
13473  RenderRectFilledWithHole(host_window->DrawList, node->Rect(), central_node->Rect(), GetColorU32(ImGuiCol_WindowBg), 0.0f);
13474  else
13475  host_window->DrawList->AddRectFilled(node->Pos, node->Pos + node->Size, GetColorU32(ImGuiCol_WindowBg), 0.0f);
13476  host_window->DrawList->ChannelsMerge();
13477  }
13478 
13479  // Draw and populate Tab Bar
13480  if (host_window && node->Windows.Size > 0)
13481  {
13482  DockNodeUpdateTabBar(node, host_window);
13483  }
13484  else
13485  {
13486  node->WantCloseAll = false;
13487  node->WantCloseTabId = 0;
13488  node->IsFocused = false;
13489  }
13490  if (node->TabBar && node->TabBar->SelectedTabId)
13491  node->SelectedTabId = node->TabBar->SelectedTabId;
13492  else if (node->Windows.Size > 0)
13493  node->SelectedTabId = node->Windows[0]->ID;
13494 
13495  // Draw payload drop target
13496  if (host_window && node->IsVisible)
13497  if (node->IsRootNode() && (g.MovingWindow == NULL || g.MovingWindow->RootWindow != host_window))
13498  BeginDockableDragDropTarget(host_window);
13499 
13500  // We update this after DockNodeUpdateTabBar()
13501  node->LastFrameActive = g.FrameCount;
13502 
13503  // Recurse into children
13504  // FIXME-DOCK FIXME-OPT: Should not need to recurse into children
13505  if (host_window)
13506  {
13507  if (node->ChildNodes[0])
13508  DockNodeUpdate(node->ChildNodes[0]);
13509  if (node->ChildNodes[1])
13510  DockNodeUpdate(node->ChildNodes[1]);
13511 
13512  // Render outer borders last (after the tab bar)
13513  if (node->IsRootNode())
13514  RenderWindowOuterBorders(host_window);
13515  }
13516 
13517  // End host window
13518  if (beginned_into_host_window) //-V1020
13519  End();
13520 }
13521 
13522 // Compare TabItem nodes given the last known DockOrder (will persist in .ini file as hint), used to sort tabs when multiple tabs are added on the same frame.
13523 static int IMGUI_CDECL TabItemComparerByDockOrder(const void* lhs, const void* rhs)
13524 {
13525  ImGuiWindow* a = ((const ImGuiTabItem*)lhs)->Window;
13526  ImGuiWindow* b = ((const ImGuiTabItem*)rhs)->Window;
13527  if (int d = ((a->DockOrder == -1) ? INT_MAX : a->DockOrder) - ((b->DockOrder == -1) ? INT_MAX : b->DockOrder))
13528  return d;
13529  return (a->BeginOrderWithinContext - b->BeginOrderWithinContext);
13530 }
13531 
13532 static ImGuiID ImGui::DockNodeUpdateWindowMenu(ImGuiDockNode* node, ImGuiTabBar* tab_bar)
13533 {
13534  // Try to position the menu so it is more likely to stays within the same viewport
13535  ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
13536  ImGuiID ret_tab_id = 0;
13537  if (g.Style.WindowMenuButtonPosition == ImGuiDir_Left)
13538  SetNextWindowPos(ImVec2(node->Pos.x, node->Pos.y + GetFrameHeight()), ImGuiCond_Always, ImVec2(0.0f, 0.0f));
13539  else
13540  SetNextWindowPos(ImVec2(node->Pos.x + node->Size.x, node->Pos.y + GetFrameHeight()), ImGuiCond_Always, ImVec2(1.0f, 0.0f));
13541  if (BeginPopup("#WindowMenu"))
13542  {
13543  node->IsFocused = true;
13544  if (tab_bar->Tabs.Size == 1)
13545  {
13546  if (MenuItem("Hide tab bar", NULL, node->IsHiddenTabBar()))
13547  node->WantHiddenTabBarToggle = true;
13548  }
13549  else
13550  {
13551  for (int tab_n = 0; tab_n < tab_bar->Tabs.Size; tab_n++)
13552  {
13553  ImGuiTabItem* tab = &tab_bar->Tabs[tab_n];
13554  if (tab->Flags & ImGuiTabItemFlags_Button)
13555  continue;
13556  if (Selectable(tab_bar->GetTabName(tab), tab->ID == tab_bar->SelectedTabId))
13557  ret_tab_id = tab->ID;
13558  SameLine();
13559  Text(" ");
13560  }
13561  }
13562  EndPopup();
13563  }
13564  return ret_tab_id;
13565 }
13566 
13567 // User helper to append/amend into a dock node tab bar. Most commonly used to add e.g. a "+" button.
13568 bool ImGui::DockNodeBeginAmendTabBar(ImGuiDockNode* node)
13569 {
13570  if (node->TabBar == NULL || node->HostWindow == NULL)
13571  return false;
13572  if (node->SharedFlags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_KeepAliveOnly)
13573  return false;
13574  Begin(node->HostWindow->Name);
13575  PushOverrideID(node->ID);
13576  bool ret = BeginTabBarEx(node->TabBar, node->TabBar->BarRect, node->TabBar->Flags, node);
13577  IM_UNUSED(ret);
13578  IM_ASSERT(ret);
13579  return true;
13580 }
13581 
13582 void ImGui::DockNodeEndAmendTabBar()
13583 {
13584  EndTabBar();
13585  PopID();
13586  End();
13587 }
13588 
13589 // Submit the tab bar corresponding to a dock node and various housekeeping details.
13590 static void ImGui::DockNodeUpdateTabBar(ImGuiDockNode* node, ImGuiWindow* host_window)
13591 {
13592  ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
13593  ImGuiStyle& style = g.Style;
13594 
13595  const bool node_was_active = (node->LastFrameActive + 1 == g.FrameCount);
13596  const bool closed_all = node->WantCloseAll && node_was_active;
13597  const ImGuiID closed_one = node->WantCloseTabId && node_was_active;
13598  node->WantCloseAll = false;
13599  node->WantCloseTabId = 0;
13600 
13601  // Decide if we should use a focused title bar color
13602  bool is_focused = false;
13603  ImGuiDockNode* root_node = DockNodeGetRootNode(node);
13604  if (g.NavWindowingTarget)
13605  is_focused = (g.NavWindowingTarget->DockNode == node);
13606  else if (g.NavWindow && g.NavWindow->RootWindowForTitleBarHighlight == host_window->RootWindow && root_node->LastFocusedNodeId == node->ID)
13607  is_focused = true;
13608 
13609  // Hidden tab bar will show a triangle on the upper-left (in Begin)
13610  if (node->IsHiddenTabBar() || node->IsNoTabBar())
13611  {
13612  node->VisibleWindow = (node->Windows.Size > 0) ? node->Windows[0] : NULL;
13613  node->IsFocused = is_focused;
13614  if (is_focused)
13615  node->LastFrameFocused = g.FrameCount;
13616  if (node->VisibleWindow)
13617  {
13618  // Notify root of visible window (used to display title in OS task bar)
13619  if (is_focused || root_node->VisibleWindow == NULL)
13620  root_node->VisibleWindow = node->VisibleWindow;
13621  if (node->TabBar)
13622  node->TabBar->VisibleTabId = node->VisibleWindow->ID;
13623  }
13624  return;
13625  }
13626 
13627  // Move ourselves to the Menu layer (so we can be accessed by tapping Alt) + undo SkipItems flag in order to draw over the title bar even if the window is collapsed
13628  bool backup_skip_item = host_window->SkipItems;
13629  if (!node->IsDockSpace())
13630  {
13631  host_window->SkipItems = false;
13632  host_window->DC.NavLayerCurrent = ImGuiNavLayer_Menu;
13633  }
13634 
13635  // Use PushOverrideID() instead of PushID() to use the node id _without_ the host window ID.
13636  // This is to facilitate computing those ID from the outside, and will affect more or less only the ID of the collapse button, popup and tabs,
13637  // as docked windows themselves will override the stack with their own root ID.
13638  PushOverrideID(node->ID);
13639  ImGuiTabBar* tab_bar = node->TabBar;
13640  bool tab_bar_is_recreated = (tab_bar == NULL); // Tab bar are automatically destroyed when a node gets hidden
13641  if (tab_bar == NULL)
13642  {
13643  DockNodeAddTabBar(node);
13644  tab_bar = node->TabBar;
13645  }
13646 
13647  ImGuiID focus_tab_id = 0;
13648  node->IsFocused = is_focused;
13649 
13650  const ImGuiDockNodeFlags node_flags = node->GetMergedFlags();
13651  const bool has_window_menu_button = (node_flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoWindowMenuButton) == 0 && (style.WindowMenuButtonPosition != ImGuiDir_None);
13652 
13653  // In a dock node, the Collapse Button turns into the Window Menu button.
13654  // FIXME-DOCK FIXME-OPT: Could we recycle popups id across multiple dock nodes?
13655  if (has_window_menu_button && IsPopupOpen("#WindowMenu"))
13656  {
13657  if (ImGuiID tab_id = DockNodeUpdateWindowMenu(node, tab_bar))
13658  focus_tab_id = tab_bar->NextSelectedTabId = tab_id;
13659  is_focused |= node->IsFocused;
13660  }
13661 
13662  // Layout
13663  ImRect title_bar_rect, tab_bar_rect;
13664  ImVec2 window_menu_button_pos;
13665  DockNodeCalcTabBarLayout(node, &title_bar_rect, &tab_bar_rect, &window_menu_button_pos);
13666 
13667  // Submit new tabs and apply NavWindow focus back to the tab bar. They will be added as Unsorted and sorted below based on relative DockOrder value.
13668  const int tabs_count_old = tab_bar->Tabs.Size;
13669  for (int window_n = 0; window_n < node->Windows.Size; window_n++)
13670  {
13671  ImGuiWindow* window = node->Windows[window_n];
13672  if (g.NavWindow && g.NavWindow->RootWindowDockStop == window)
13673  tab_bar->SelectedTabId = window->ID;
13674  if (TabBarFindTabByID(tab_bar, window->ID) == NULL)
13675  TabBarAddTab(tab_bar, ImGuiTabItemFlags_Unsorted, window);
13676  }
13677 
13678  // Title bar
13679  if (is_focused)
13680  node->LastFrameFocused = g.FrameCount;
13681  ImU32 title_bar_col = GetColorU32(host_window->Collapsed ? ImGuiCol_TitleBgCollapsed : is_focused ? ImGuiCol_TitleBgActive : ImGuiCol_TitleBg);
13682  host_window->DrawList->AddRectFilled(title_bar_rect.Min, title_bar_rect.Max, title_bar_col, host_window->WindowRounding, ImDrawCornerFlags_Top);
13683 
13684  // Docking/Collapse button
13685  if (has_window_menu_button)
13686  {
13687  if (CollapseButton(host_window->GetID("#COLLAPSE"), window_menu_button_pos, node))
13688  OpenPopup("#WindowMenu");
13689  if (IsItemActive())
13690  focus_tab_id = tab_bar->SelectedTabId;
13691  }
13692 
13693  // If multiple tabs are appearing on the same frame, sort them based on their persistent DockOrder value
13694  int tabs_unsorted_start = tab_bar->Tabs.Size;
13695  for (int tab_n = tab_bar->Tabs.Size - 1; tab_n >= 0 && (tab_bar->Tabs[tab_n].Flags & ImGuiTabItemFlags_Unsorted); tab_n--)
13696  {
13697  // FIXME-DOCK: Consider only clearing the flag after the tab has been alive for a few consecutive frames, allowing late comers to not break sorting?
13698  tab_bar->Tabs[tab_n].Flags &= ~ImGuiTabItemFlags_Unsorted;
13699  tabs_unsorted_start = tab_n;
13700  }
13701  if (tab_bar->Tabs.Size > tabs_unsorted_start)
13702  {
13703  IMGUI_DEBUG_LOG_DOCKING("In node 0x%08X: %d new appearing tabs:%s\n", node->ID, tab_bar->Tabs.Size - tabs_unsorted_start, (tab_bar->Tabs.Size > tabs_unsorted_start + 1) ? " (will sort)" : "");
13704  for (int tab_n = tabs_unsorted_start; tab_n < tab_bar->Tabs.Size; tab_n++)
13705  IMGUI_DEBUG_LOG_DOCKING(" - Tab '%s' Order %d\n", tab_bar->Tabs[tab_n].Window->Name, tab_bar->Tabs[tab_n].Window->DockOrder);
13706  if (tab_bar->Tabs.Size > tabs_unsorted_start + 1)
13707  ImQsort(tab_bar->Tabs.Data + tabs_unsorted_start, tab_bar->Tabs.Size - tabs_unsorted_start, sizeof(ImGuiTabItem), TabItemComparerByDockOrder);
13708  }
13709 
13710  // Selected newly added tabs, or persistent tab ID if the tab bar was just recreated
13711  if (tab_bar_is_recreated && TabBarFindTabByID(tab_bar, node->SelectedTabId) != NULL)
13712  tab_bar->SelectedTabId = tab_bar->NextSelectedTabId = node->SelectedTabId;
13713  else if (tab_bar->Tabs.Size > tabs_count_old)
13714  tab_bar->SelectedTabId = tab_bar->NextSelectedTabId = tab_bar->Tabs.back().Window->ID;
13715 
13716  // Begin tab bar
13717  ImGuiTabBarFlags tab_bar_flags = ImGuiTabBarFlags_Reorderable | ImGuiTabBarFlags_AutoSelectNewTabs; // | ImGuiTabBarFlags_NoTabListScrollingButtons);
13718  tab_bar_flags |= ImGuiTabBarFlags_SaveSettings | ImGuiTabBarFlags_DockNode;
13719  if (!host_window->Collapsed && is_focused)
13720  tab_bar_flags |= ImGuiTabBarFlags_IsFocused;
13721  BeginTabBarEx(tab_bar, tab_bar_rect, tab_bar_flags, node);
13722  //host_window->DrawList->AddRect(tab_bar_rect.Min, tab_bar_rect.Max, IM_COL32(255,0,255,255));
13723 
13724  // Backup style colors
13725  ImVec4 backup_style_cols[ImGuiWindowDockStyleCol_COUNT];
13726  for (int color_n = 0; color_n < ImGuiWindowDockStyleCol_COUNT; color_n++)
13727  backup_style_cols[color_n] = g.Style.Colors[GWindowDockStyleColors[color_n]];
13728 
13729  // Submit actual tabs
13730  node->VisibleWindow = NULL;
13731  for (int window_n = 0; window_n < node->Windows.Size; window_n++)
13732  {
13733  ImGuiWindow* window = node->Windows[window_n];
13734  if ((closed_all || closed_one == window->ID) && window->HasCloseButton && !(window->Flags & ImGuiWindowFlags_UnsavedDocument))
13735  continue;
13736  if (window->LastFrameActive + 1 >= g.FrameCount || !node_was_active)
13737  {
13738  ImGuiTabItemFlags tab_item_flags = 0;
13739  tab_item_flags |= window->WindowClass.TabItemFlagsOverrideSet;
13740  if (window->Flags & ImGuiWindowFlags_UnsavedDocument)
13741  tab_item_flags |= ImGuiTabItemFlags_UnsavedDocument;
13742  if (tab_bar->Flags & ImGuiTabBarFlags_NoCloseWithMiddleMouseButton)
13743  tab_item_flags |= ImGuiTabItemFlags_NoCloseWithMiddleMouseButton;
13744 
13745  // Apply stored style overrides for the window
13746  for (int color_n = 0; color_n < ImGuiWindowDockStyleCol_COUNT; color_n++)
13747  g.Style.Colors[GWindowDockStyleColors[color_n]] = ColorConvertU32ToFloat4(window->DockStyle.Colors[color_n]);
13748 
13749  bool tab_open = true;
13750  TabItemEx(tab_bar, window->Name, window->HasCloseButton ? &tab_open : NULL, tab_item_flags, window);
13751  if (!tab_open)
13752  node->WantCloseTabId = window->ID;
13753  if (tab_bar->VisibleTabId == window->ID)
13754  node->VisibleWindow = window;
13755 
13756  // Store last item data so it can be queried with IsItemXXX functions after the user Begin() call
13757  window->DockTabItemStatusFlags = host_window->DC.LastItemStatusFlags;
13758  window->DockTabItemRect = host_window->DC.LastItemRect;
13759 
13760  // Update navigation ID on menu layer
13761  if (g.NavWindow && g.NavWindow->RootWindowDockStop == window && (window->DC.NavLayerActiveMask & (1 << ImGuiNavLayer_Menu)) == 0)
13762  host_window->NavLastIds[1] = window->ID;
13763  }
13764  }
13765 
13766  // Restore style colors
13767  for (int color_n = 0; color_n < ImGuiWindowDockStyleCol_COUNT; color_n++)
13768  g.Style.Colors[GWindowDockStyleColors[color_n]] = backup_style_cols[color_n];
13769 
13770  // Notify root of visible window (used to display title in OS task bar)
13771  if (node->VisibleWindow)
13772  if (is_focused || root_node->VisibleWindow == NULL)
13773  root_node->VisibleWindow = node->VisibleWindow;
13774 
13775  // Close button (after VisibleWindow was updated)
13776  // Note that VisibleWindow may have been overrided by CTRL+Tabbing, so VisibleWindow->ID may be != from tab_bar->SelectedTabId
13777  const bool close_button_is_enabled = node->HasCloseButton && node->VisibleWindow && node->VisibleWindow->HasCloseButton;
13778  const bool close_button_is_visible = node->HasCloseButton;
13779  //const bool close_button_is_visible = close_button_is_enabled; // Most people would expect this behavior of not even showing the button (leaving a hole since we can't claim that space as other windows in the tba bar have one)
13780  if (close_button_is_visible)
13781  {
13782  if (!close_button_is_enabled)
13783  {
13784  PushItemFlag(ImGuiItemFlags_Disabled, true);
13785  PushStyleColor(ImGuiCol_Text, style.Colors[ImGuiCol_Text] * ImVec4(1.0f,1.0f,1.0f,0.4f));
13786  }
13787  const float button_sz = g.FontSize;
13788  if (CloseButton(host_window->GetID("#CLOSE"), title_bar_rect.GetTR() + ImVec2(-style.FramePadding.x * 2.0f - button_sz, 0.0f)))
13789  if (ImGuiTabItem* tab = TabBarFindTabByID(tab_bar, tab_bar->VisibleTabId))
13790  {
13791  node->WantCloseTabId = tab->ID;
13792  TabBarCloseTab(tab_bar, tab);
13793  }
13794  //if (IsItemActive())
13795  // focus_tab_id = tab_bar->SelectedTabId;
13796  if (!close_button_is_enabled)
13797  {
13798  PopStyleColor();
13799  PopItemFlag();
13800  }
13801  }
13802 
13803  // When clicking on the title bar outside of tabs, we still focus the selected tab for that node
13804  // FIXME: TabItem use AllowItemOverlap so we manually perform a more specific test for now (hovered || held)
13805  ImGuiID title_bar_id = host_window->GetID("#TITLEBAR");
13806  if (g.HoveredId == 0 || g.HoveredId == title_bar_id || g.ActiveId == title_bar_id)
13807  {
13808  bool held;
13809  ButtonBehavior(title_bar_rect, title_bar_id, NULL, &held, ImGuiButtonFlags_AllowItemOverlap);
13810  if (g.HoveredId == title_bar_id)
13811  {
13812  // ImGuiButtonFlags_AllowItemOverlap + SetItemAllowOverlap() required for appending into dock node tab bar,
13813  // otherwise dragging window will steal HoveredId and amended tabs cannot get them.
13814  host_window->DC.LastItemId = title_bar_id;
13815  SetItemAllowOverlap();
13816  }
13817  if (held)
13818  {
13819  if (IsMouseClicked(0))
13820  focus_tab_id = tab_bar->SelectedTabId;
13821 
13822  // Forward moving request to selected window
13823  if (ImGuiTabItem* tab = TabBarFindTabByID(tab_bar, tab_bar->SelectedTabId))
13824  StartMouseMovingWindowOrNode(tab->Window ? tab->Window : node->HostWindow, node, false);
13825  }
13826  }
13827 
13828  // Forward focus from host node to selected window
13829  //if (is_focused && g.NavWindow == host_window && !g.NavWindowingTarget)
13830  // focus_tab_id = tab_bar->SelectedTabId;
13831 
13832  // When clicked on a tab we requested focus to the docked child
13833  // This overrides the value set by "forward focus from host node to selected window".
13834  if (tab_bar->NextSelectedTabId)
13835  focus_tab_id = tab_bar->NextSelectedTabId;
13836 
13837  // Apply navigation focus
13838  if (focus_tab_id != 0)
13839  if (ImGuiTabItem* tab = TabBarFindTabByID(tab_bar, focus_tab_id))
13840  if (tab->Window)
13841  {
13842  FocusWindow(tab->Window);
13843  NavInitWindow(tab->Window, false);
13844  }
13845 
13846  EndTabBar();
13847  PopID();
13848 
13849  // Restore SkipItems flag
13850  if (!node->IsDockSpace())
13851  {
13852  host_window->DC.NavLayerCurrent = ImGuiNavLayer_Main;
13853  host_window->SkipItems = backup_skip_item;
13854  }
13855 }
13856 
13857 static void ImGui::DockNodeAddTabBar(ImGuiDockNode* node)
13858 {
13859  IM_ASSERT(node->TabBar == NULL);
13860  node->TabBar = IM_NEW(ImGuiTabBar);
13861 }
13862 
13863 static void ImGui::DockNodeRemoveTabBar(ImGuiDockNode* node)
13864 {
13865  if (node->TabBar == NULL)
13866  return;
13867  IM_DELETE(node->TabBar);
13868  node->TabBar = NULL;
13869 }
13870 
13871 static bool DockNodeIsDropAllowedOne(ImGuiWindow* payload, ImGuiWindow* host_window)
13872 {
13873  if (host_window->DockNodeAsHost && host_window->DockNodeAsHost->IsDockSpace() && payload->BeginOrderWithinContext < host_window->BeginOrderWithinContext)
13874  return false;
13875 
13876  ImGuiWindowClass* host_class = host_window->DockNodeAsHost ? &host_window->DockNodeAsHost->WindowClass : &host_window->WindowClass;
13877  ImGuiWindowClass* payload_class = &payload->WindowClass;
13878  if (host_class->ClassId != payload_class->ClassId)
13879  {
13880  if (host_class->ClassId != 0 && host_class->DockingAllowUnclassed && payload_class->ClassId == 0)
13881  return true;
13882  if (payload_class->ClassId != 0 && payload_class->DockingAllowUnclassed && host_class->ClassId == 0)
13883  return true;
13884  return false;
13885  }
13886 
13887  return true;
13888 }
13889 
13890 static bool ImGui::DockNodeIsDropAllowed(ImGuiWindow* host_window, ImGuiWindow* root_payload)
13891 {
13892  if (root_payload->DockNodeAsHost && root_payload->DockNodeAsHost->IsSplitNode())
13893  return true;
13894 
13895  const int payload_count = root_payload->DockNodeAsHost ? root_payload->DockNodeAsHost->Windows.Size : 1;
13896  for (int payload_n = 0; payload_n < payload_count; payload_n++)
13897  {
13898  ImGuiWindow* payload = root_payload->DockNodeAsHost ? root_payload->DockNodeAsHost->Windows[payload_n] : root_payload;
13899  if (DockNodeIsDropAllowedOne(payload, host_window))
13900  return true;
13901  }
13902  return false;
13903 }
13904 
13905 // window menu button == collapse button when not in a dock node.
13906 // FIXME: This is similar to RenderWindowTitleBarContents, may want to share code.
13907 static void ImGui::DockNodeCalcTabBarLayout(const ImGuiDockNode* node, ImRect* out_title_rect, ImRect* out_tab_bar_rect, ImVec2* out_window_menu_button_pos)
13908 {
13909  ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
13910  ImRect r = ImRect(node->Pos.x, node->Pos.y, node->Pos.x + node->Size.x, node->Pos.y + g.FontSize + g.Style.FramePadding.y * 2.0f);
13911  if (out_title_rect) { *out_title_rect = r; }
13912 
13913  ImVec2 window_menu_button_pos = r.Min;
13914  r.Min.x += g.Style.FramePadding.x;
13915  r.Max.x -= g.Style.FramePadding.x;
13916  if (node->HasCloseButton)
13917  {
13918  r.Max.x -= g.FontSize;// +1.0f; // In DockNodeUpdateTabBar() we currently display a disabled close button even if there is none.
13919  }
13920  if (node->HasWindowMenuButton && g.Style.WindowMenuButtonPosition == ImGuiDir_Left)
13921  {
13922  r.Min.x += g.FontSize; // + g.Style.ItemInnerSpacing.x; // <-- Adding ItemInnerSpacing makes the title text moves slightly when in a docking tab bar. Instead we adjusted RenderArrowDockMenu()
13923  }
13924  else if (node->HasWindowMenuButton && g.Style.WindowMenuButtonPosition == ImGuiDir_Right)
13925  {
13926  r.Max.x -= g.FontSize + g.Style.FramePadding.x;
13927  window_menu_button_pos = ImVec2(r.Max.x, r.Min.y);
13928  }
13929  if (out_tab_bar_rect) { *out_tab_bar_rect = r; }
13930  if (out_window_menu_button_pos) { *out_window_menu_button_pos = window_menu_button_pos; }
13931 }
13932 
13933 void ImGui::DockNodeCalcSplitRects(ImVec2& pos_old, ImVec2& size_old, ImVec2& pos_new, ImVec2& size_new, ImGuiDir dir, ImVec2 size_new_desired)
13934 {
13935  ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
13936  const float dock_spacing = g.Style.ItemInnerSpacing.x;
13937  const ImGuiAxis axis = (dir == ImGuiDir_Left || dir == ImGuiDir_Right) ? ImGuiAxis_X : ImGuiAxis_Y;
13938  pos_new[axis ^ 1] = pos_old[axis ^ 1];
13939  size_new[axis ^ 1] = size_old[axis ^ 1];
13940 
13941  // Distribute size on given axis (with a desired size or equally)
13942  const float w_avail = size_old[axis] - dock_spacing;
13943  if (size_new_desired[axis] > 0.0f && size_new_desired[axis] <= w_avail * 0.5f)
13944  {
13945  size_new[axis] = size_new_desired[axis];
13946  size_old[axis] = IM_FLOOR(w_avail - size_new[axis]);
13947  }
13948  else
13949  {
13950  size_new[axis] = IM_FLOOR(w_avail * 0.5f);
13951  size_old[axis] = IM_FLOOR(w_avail - size_new[axis]);
13952  }
13953 
13954  // Position each node
13955  if (dir == ImGuiDir_Right || dir == ImGuiDir_Down)
13956  {
13957  pos_new[axis] = pos_old[axis] + size_old[axis] + dock_spacing;
13958  }
13959  else if (dir == ImGuiDir_Left || dir == ImGuiDir_Up)
13960  {
13961  pos_new[axis] = pos_old[axis];
13962  pos_old[axis] = pos_new[axis] + size_new[axis] + dock_spacing;
13963  }
13964 }
13965 
13966 // Retrieve the drop rectangles for a given direction or for the center + perform hit testing.
13967 bool ImGui::DockNodeCalcDropRectsAndTestMousePos(const ImRect& parent, ImGuiDir dir, ImRect& out_r, bool outer_docking, ImVec2* test_mouse_pos)
13968 {
13969  ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
13970 
13971  const float parent_smaller_axis = ImMin(parent.GetWidth(), parent.GetHeight());
13972  const float hs_for_central_nodes = ImMin(g.FontSize * 1.5f, ImMax(g.FontSize * 0.5f, parent_smaller_axis / 8.0f));
13973  float hs_w; // Half-size, longer axis
13974  float hs_h; // Half-size, smaller axis
13975  ImVec2 off; // Distance from edge or center
13976  if (outer_docking)
13977  {
13978  //hs_w = ImFloor(ImClamp(parent_smaller_axis - hs_for_central_nodes * 4.0f, g.FontSize * 0.5f, g.FontSize * 8.0f));
13979  //hs_h = ImFloor(hs_w * 0.15f);
13980  //off = ImVec2(ImFloor(parent.GetWidth() * 0.5f - GetFrameHeightWithSpacing() * 1.4f - hs_h), ImFloor(parent.GetHeight() * 0.5f - GetFrameHeightWithSpacing() * 1.4f - hs_h));
13981  hs_w = ImFloor(hs_for_central_nodes * 1.50f);
13982  hs_h = ImFloor(hs_for_central_nodes * 0.80f);
13983  off = ImVec2(ImFloor(parent.GetWidth() * 0.5f - hs_h), ImFloor(parent.GetHeight() * 0.5f - hs_h));
13984  }
13985  else
13986  {
13987  hs_w = ImFloor(hs_for_central_nodes);
13988  hs_h = ImFloor(hs_for_central_nodes * 0.90f);
13989  off = ImVec2(ImFloor(hs_w * 2.40f), ImFloor(hs_w * 2.40f));
13990  }
13991 
13992  ImVec2 c = ImFloor(parent.GetCenter());
13993  if (dir == ImGuiDir_None) { out_r = ImRect(c.x - hs_w, c.y - hs_w, c.x + hs_w, c.y + hs_w); }
13994  else if (dir == ImGuiDir_Up) { out_r = ImRect(c.x - hs_w, c.y - off.y - hs_h, c.x + hs_w, c.y - off.y + hs_h); }
13995  else if (dir == ImGuiDir_Down) { out_r = ImRect(c.x - hs_w, c.y + off.y - hs_h, c.x + hs_w, c.y + off.y + hs_h); }
13996  else if (dir == ImGuiDir_Left) { out_r = ImRect(c.x - off.x - hs_h, c.y - hs_w, c.x - off.x + hs_h, c.y + hs_w); }
13997  else if (dir == ImGuiDir_Right) { out_r = ImRect(c.x + off.x - hs_h, c.y - hs_w, c.x + off.x + hs_h, c.y + hs_w); }
13998 
13999  if (test_mouse_pos == NULL)
14000  return false;
14001 
14002  ImRect hit_r = out_r;
14003  if (!outer_docking)
14004  {
14005  // Custom hit testing for the 5-way selection, designed to reduce flickering when moving diagonally between sides
14006  hit_r.Expand(ImFloor(hs_w * 0.30f));
14007  ImVec2 mouse_delta = (*test_mouse_pos - c);
14008  float mouse_delta_len2 = ImLengthSqr(mouse_delta);
14009  float r_threshold_center = hs_w * 1.4f;
14010  float r_threshold_sides = hs_w * (1.4f + 1.2f);
14011  if (mouse_delta_len2 < r_threshold_center * r_threshold_center)
14012  return (dir == ImGuiDir_None);
14013  if (mouse_delta_len2 < r_threshold_sides * r_threshold_sides)
14014  return (dir == ImGetDirQuadrantFromDelta(mouse_delta.x, mouse_delta.y));
14015  }
14016  return hit_r.Contains(*test_mouse_pos);
14017 }
14018 
14019 // host_node may be NULL if the window doesn't have a DockNode already.
14020 // FIXME-DOCK: This is misnamed since it's also doing the filtering.
14021 static void ImGui::DockNodePreviewDockSetup(ImGuiWindow* host_window, ImGuiDockNode* host_node, ImGuiWindow* root_payload, ImGuiDockPreviewData* data, bool is_explicit_target, bool is_outer_docking)
14022 {
14023  ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
14024 
14025  // There is an edge case when docking into a dockspace which only has inactive nodes.
14026  // In this case DockNodeTreeFindNodeByPos() will have selected a leaf node which is inactive.
14027  // Because the inactive leaf node doesn't have proper pos/size yet, we'll use the root node as reference.
14028  ImGuiDockNode* root_payload_as_host = root_payload->DockNodeAsHost;
14029  ImGuiDockNode* ref_node_for_rect = (host_node && !host_node->IsVisible) ? DockNodeGetRootNode(host_node) : host_node;
14030  if (ref_node_for_rect)
14031  IM_ASSERT(ref_node_for_rect->IsVisible);
14032 
14033  // Filter, figure out where we are allowed to dock
14034  ImGuiDockNodeFlags src_node_flags = root_payload_as_host ? root_payload_as_host->GetMergedFlags() : root_payload->WindowClass.DockNodeFlagsOverrideSet;
14035  ImGuiDockNodeFlags dst_node_flags = host_node ? host_node->GetMergedFlags() : host_window->WindowClass.DockNodeFlagsOverrideSet;
14036  data->IsCenterAvailable = true;
14037  if (is_outer_docking)
14038  data->IsCenterAvailable = false;
14039  else if (dst_node_flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoDocking)
14040  data->IsCenterAvailable = false;
14041  else if (host_node && (dst_node_flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoDockingInCentralNode) && host_node->IsCentralNode())
14042  data->IsCenterAvailable = false;
14043  else if ((!host_node || !host_node->IsEmpty()) && root_payload_as_host && root_payload_as_host->IsSplitNode() && (root_payload_as_host->OnlyNodeWithWindows == NULL)) // Is _visibly_ split?
14044  data->IsCenterAvailable = false;
14045  else if ((dst_node_flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoDockingOverMe) || (src_node_flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoDockingOverOther))
14046  data->IsCenterAvailable = false;
14047 
14048  data->IsSidesAvailable = true;
14049  if ((dst_node_flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoSplit) || g.IO.ConfigDockingNoSplit)
14050  data->IsSidesAvailable = false;
14051  else if (!is_outer_docking && host_node && host_node->ParentNode == NULL && host_node->IsCentralNode())
14052  data->IsSidesAvailable = false;
14053  else if ((dst_node_flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoDockingSplitMe) || (src_node_flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoDockingSplitOther))
14054  data->IsSidesAvailable = false;
14055 
14056  // Build a tentative future node (reuse same structure because it is practical. Shape will be readjusted when previewing a split)
14057  data->FutureNode.HasCloseButton = (host_node ? host_node->HasCloseButton : host_window->HasCloseButton) || (root_payload->HasCloseButton);
14058  data->FutureNode.HasWindowMenuButton = host_node ? true : ((host_window->Flags & ImGuiWindowFlags_NoCollapse) == 0);
14059  data->FutureNode.Pos = ref_node_for_rect ? ref_node_for_rect->Pos : host_window->Pos;
14060  data->FutureNode.Size = ref_node_for_rect ? ref_node_for_rect->Size : host_window->Size;
14061 
14062  // Calculate drop shapes geometry for allowed splitting directions
14063  IM_ASSERT(ImGuiDir_None == -1);
14064  data->SplitNode = host_node;
14065  data->SplitDir = ImGuiDir_None;
14066  data->IsSplitDirExplicit = false;
14067  if (!host_window->Collapsed)
14068  for (int dir = ImGuiDir_None; dir < ImGuiDir_COUNT; dir++)
14069  {
14070  if (dir == ImGuiDir_None && !data->IsCenterAvailable)
14071  continue;
14072  if (dir != ImGuiDir_None && !data->IsSidesAvailable)
14073  continue;
14074  if (DockNodeCalcDropRectsAndTestMousePos(data->FutureNode.Rect(), (ImGuiDir)dir, data->DropRectsDraw[dir+1], is_outer_docking, &g.IO.MousePos))
14075  {
14076  data->SplitDir = (ImGuiDir)dir;
14077  data->IsSplitDirExplicit = true;
14078  }
14079  }
14080 
14081  // When docking without holding Shift, we only allow and preview docking when hovering over a drop rect or over the title bar
14082  data->IsDropAllowed = (data->SplitDir != ImGuiDir_None) || (data->IsCenterAvailable);
14083  if (!is_explicit_target && !data->IsSplitDirExplicit && !g.IO.ConfigDockingWithShift)
14084  data->IsDropAllowed = false;
14085 
14086  // Calculate split area
14087  data->SplitRatio = 0.0f;
14088  if (data->SplitDir != ImGuiDir_None)
14089  {
14090  ImGuiDir split_dir = data->SplitDir;
14091  ImGuiAxis split_axis = (split_dir == ImGuiDir_Left || split_dir == ImGuiDir_Right) ? ImGuiAxis_X : ImGuiAxis_Y;
14092  ImVec2 pos_new, pos_old = data->FutureNode.Pos;
14093  ImVec2 size_new, size_old = data->FutureNode.Size;
14094  DockNodeCalcSplitRects(pos_old, size_old, pos_new, size_new, split_dir, root_payload->Size);
14095 
14096  // Calculate split ratio so we can pass it down the docking request
14097  float split_ratio = ImSaturate(size_new[split_axis] / data->FutureNode.Size[split_axis]);
14098  data->FutureNode.Pos = pos_new;
14099  data->FutureNode.Size = size_new;
14100  data->SplitRatio = (split_dir == ImGuiDir_Right || split_dir == ImGuiDir_Down) ? (1.0f - split_ratio) : (split_ratio);
14101  }
14102 }
14103 
14104 static void ImGui::DockNodePreviewDockRender(ImGuiWindow* host_window, ImGuiDockNode* host_node, ImGuiWindow* root_payload, const ImGuiDockPreviewData* data)
14105 {
14106  ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
14107  IM_ASSERT(g.CurrentWindow == host_window); // Because we rely on font size to calculate tab sizes
14108 
14109  // With this option, we only display the preview on the target viewport, and the payload viewport is made transparent.
14110  // To compensate for the single layer obstructed by the payload, we'll increase the alpha of the preview nodes.
14111  const bool is_transparent_payload = g.IO.ConfigDockingTransparentPayload;
14112 
14113  // In case the two windows involved are on different viewports, we will draw the overlay on each of them.
14114  int overlay_draw_lists_count = 0;
14115  ImDrawList* overlay_draw_lists[2];
14116  overlay_draw_lists[overlay_draw_lists_count++] = GetForegroundDrawList(host_window->Viewport);
14117  if (host_window->Viewport != root_payload->Viewport && !is_transparent_payload)
14118  overlay_draw_lists[overlay_draw_lists_count++] = GetForegroundDrawList(root_payload->Viewport);
14119 
14120  // Draw main preview rectangle
14121  const ImU32 overlay_col_main = GetColorU32(ImGuiCol_DockingPreview, is_transparent_payload ? 0.60f : 0.40f);
14122  const ImU32 overlay_col_drop = GetColorU32(ImGuiCol_DockingPreview, is_transparent_payload ? 0.90f : 0.70f);
14123  const ImU32 overlay_col_drop_hovered = GetColorU32(ImGuiCol_DockingPreview, is_transparent_payload ? 1.20f : 1.00f);
14124  const ImU32 overlay_col_lines = GetColorU32(ImGuiCol_NavWindowingHighlight, is_transparent_payload ? 0.80f : 0.60f);
14125 
14126  // Display area preview
14127  const bool can_preview_tabs = (root_payload->DockNodeAsHost == NULL || root_payload->DockNodeAsHost->Windows.Size > 0);
14128  if (data->IsDropAllowed)
14129  {
14130  ImRect overlay_rect = data->FutureNode.Rect();
14131  if (data->SplitDir == ImGuiDir_None && can_preview_tabs)
14132  overlay_rect.Min.y += GetFrameHeight();
14133  if (data->SplitDir != ImGuiDir_None || data->IsCenterAvailable)
14134  for (int overlay_n = 0; overlay_n < overlay_draw_lists_count; overlay_n++)
14135  overlay_draw_lists[overlay_n]->AddRectFilled(overlay_rect.Min, overlay_rect.Max, overlay_col_main, host_window->WindowRounding);
14136  }
14137 
14138  // Display tab shape/label preview unless we are splitting node (it generally makes the situation harder to read)
14139  if (data->IsDropAllowed && can_preview_tabs && data->SplitDir == ImGuiDir_None && data->IsCenterAvailable)
14140  {
14141  // Compute target tab bar geometry so we can locate our preview tabs
14142  ImRect tab_bar_rect;
14143  DockNodeCalcTabBarLayout(&data->FutureNode, NULL, &tab_bar_rect, NULL);
14144  ImVec2 tab_pos = tab_bar_rect.Min;
14145  if (host_node && host_node->TabBar)
14146  {
14147  if (!host_node->IsHiddenTabBar() && !host_node->IsNoTabBar())
14148  tab_pos.x += host_node->TabBar->WidthAllTabs + g.Style.ItemInnerSpacing.x; // We don't use OffsetNewTab because when using non-persistent-order tab bar it is incremented with each Tab submission.
14149  else
14150  tab_pos.x += g.Style.ItemInnerSpacing.x + TabItemCalcSize(host_node->Windows[0]->Name, host_node->Windows[0]->HasCloseButton).x;
14151  }
14152  else if (!(host_window->Flags & ImGuiWindowFlags_DockNodeHost))
14153  {
14154  tab_pos.x += g.Style.ItemInnerSpacing.x + TabItemCalcSize(host_window->Name, host_window->HasCloseButton).x; // Account for slight offset which will be added when changing from title bar to tab bar
14155  }
14156 
14157  // Draw tab shape/label preview (payload may be a loose window or a host window carrying multiple tabbed windows)
14158  if (root_payload->DockNodeAsHost)
14159  IM_ASSERT(root_payload->DockNodeAsHost->Windows.Size <= root_payload->DockNodeAsHost->TabBar->Tabs.Size);
14160  ImGuiTabBar* tab_bar_with_payload = root_payload->DockNodeAsHost ? root_payload->DockNodeAsHost->TabBar : NULL;
14161  const int payload_count = tab_bar_with_payload ? tab_bar_with_payload->Tabs.Size : 1;
14162  for (int payload_n = 0; payload_n < payload_count; payload_n++)
14163  {
14164  // DockNode's TabBar may have non-window Tabs manually appended by user
14165  ImGuiWindow* payload_window = tab_bar_with_payload ? tab_bar_with_payload->Tabs[payload_n].Window : root_payload;
14166  if (tab_bar_with_payload && payload_window == NULL)
14167  continue;
14168  if (!DockNodeIsDropAllowedOne(payload_window, host_window))
14169  continue;
14170 
14171  // Calculate the tab bounding box for each payload window
14172  ImVec2 tab_size = TabItemCalcSize(payload_window->Name, payload_window->HasCloseButton);
14173  ImRect tab_bb(tab_pos.x, tab_pos.y, tab_pos.x + tab_size.x, tab_pos.y + tab_size.y);
14174  tab_pos.x += tab_size.x + g.Style.ItemInnerSpacing.x;
14175  const ImU32 overlay_col_text = GetColorU32(payload_window->DockStyle.Colors[ImGuiWindowDockStyleCol_Text]);
14176  const ImU32 overlay_col_tabs = GetColorU32(payload_window->DockStyle.Colors[ImGuiWindowDockStyleCol_TabActive]);
14177  PushStyleColor(ImGuiCol_Text, overlay_col_text);
14178  for (int overlay_n = 0; overlay_n < overlay_draw_lists_count; overlay_n++)
14179  {
14180  ImGuiTabItemFlags tab_flags = ImGuiTabItemFlags_Preview | ((payload_window->Flags & ImGuiWindowFlags_UnsavedDocument) ? ImGuiTabItemFlags_UnsavedDocument : 0);
14181  if (!tab_bar_rect.Contains(tab_bb))
14182  overlay_draw_lists[overlay_n]->PushClipRect(tab_bar_rect.Min, tab_bar_rect.Max);
14183  TabItemBackground(overlay_draw_lists[overlay_n], tab_bb, tab_flags, overlay_col_tabs);
14184  TabItemLabelAndCloseButton(overlay_draw_lists[overlay_n], tab_bb, tab_flags, g.Style.FramePadding, payload_window->Name, 0, 0, false, NULL, NULL);
14185  if (!tab_bar_rect.Contains(tab_bb))
14186  overlay_draw_lists[overlay_n]->PopClipRect();
14187  }
14188  PopStyleColor();
14189  }
14190  }
14191 
14192  // Display drop boxes
14193  const float overlay_rounding = ImMax(3.0f, g.Style.FrameRounding);
14194  for (int dir = ImGuiDir_None; dir < ImGuiDir_COUNT; dir++)
14195  {
14196  if (!data->DropRectsDraw[dir + 1].IsInverted())
14197  {
14198  ImRect draw_r = data->DropRectsDraw[dir + 1];
14199  ImRect draw_r_in = draw_r;
14200  draw_r_in.Expand(-2.0f);
14201  ImU32 overlay_col = (data->SplitDir == (ImGuiDir)dir && data->IsSplitDirExplicit) ? overlay_col_drop_hovered : overlay_col_drop;
14202  for (int overlay_n = 0; overlay_n < overlay_draw_lists_count; overlay_n++)
14203  {
14204  ImVec2 center = ImFloor(draw_r_in.GetCenter());
14205  overlay_draw_lists[overlay_n]->AddRectFilled(draw_r.Min, draw_r.Max, overlay_col, overlay_rounding);
14206  overlay_draw_lists[overlay_n]->AddRect(draw_r_in.Min, draw_r_in.Max, overlay_col_lines, overlay_rounding);
14207  if (dir == ImGuiDir_Left || dir == ImGuiDir_Right)
14208  overlay_draw_lists[overlay_n]->AddLine(ImVec2(center.x, draw_r_in.Min.y), ImVec2(center.x, draw_r_in.Max.y), overlay_col_lines);
14209  if (dir == ImGuiDir_Up || dir == ImGuiDir_Down)
14210  overlay_draw_lists[overlay_n]->AddLine(ImVec2(draw_r_in.Min.x, center.y), ImVec2(draw_r_in.Max.x, center.y), overlay_col_lines);
14211  }
14212  }
14213 
14214  // Stop after ImGuiDir_None
14215  if ((host_node && (host_node->GetMergedFlags() & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoSplit)) || g.IO.ConfigDockingNoSplit)
14216  return;
14217  }
14218 }
14219 
14220 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
14221 // Docking: ImGuiDockNode Tree manipulation functions
14222 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
14223 // - DockNodeTreeSplit()
14224 // - DockNodeTreeMerge()
14225 // - DockNodeTreeUpdatePosSize()
14226 // - DockNodeTreeUpdateSplitterFindTouchingNode()
14227 // - DockNodeTreeUpdateSplitter()
14228 // - DockNodeTreeFindFallbackLeafNode()
14229 // - DockNodeTreeFindNodeByPos()
14230 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
14231 
14232 void ImGui::DockNodeTreeSplit(ImGuiContext* ctx, ImGuiDockNode* parent_node, ImGuiAxis split_axis, int split_inheritor_child_idx, float split_ratio, ImGuiDockNode* new_node)
14233 {
14234  ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
14235  IM_ASSERT(split_axis != ImGuiAxis_None);
14236 
14237  ImGuiDockNode* child_0 = (new_node && split_inheritor_child_idx != 0) ? new_node : DockContextAddNode(ctx, 0);
14238  child_0->ParentNode = parent_node;
14239 
14240  ImGuiDockNode* child_1 = (new_node && split_inheritor_child_idx != 1) ? new_node : DockContextAddNode(ctx, 0);
14241  child_1->ParentNode = parent_node;
14242 
14243  ImGuiDockNode* child_inheritor = (split_inheritor_child_idx == 0) ? child_0 : child_1;
14244  DockNodeMoveChildNodes(child_inheritor, parent_node);
14245  parent_node->ChildNodes[0] = child_0;
14246  parent_node->ChildNodes[1] = child_1;
14247  parent_node->ChildNodes[split_inheritor_child_idx]->VisibleWindow = parent_node->VisibleWindow;
14248  parent_node->SplitAxis = split_axis;
14249  parent_node->VisibleWindow = NULL;
14250  parent_node->AuthorityForPos = parent_node->AuthorityForSize = ImGuiDataAuthority_DockNode;
14251 
14252  float size_avail = (parent_node->Size[split_axis] - DOCKING_SPLITTER_SIZE);
14253  size_avail = ImMax(size_avail, g.Style.WindowMinSize[split_axis] * 2.0f);
14254  IM_ASSERT(size_avail > 0.0f); // If you created a node manually with DockBuilderAddNode(), you need to also call DockBuilderSetNodeSize() before splitting.
14255  child_0->SizeRef = child_1->SizeRef = parent_node->Size;
14256  child_0->SizeRef[split_axis] = ImFloor(size_avail * split_ratio);
14257  child_1->SizeRef[split_axis] = ImFloor(size_avail - child_0->SizeRef[split_axis]);
14258 
14259  DockNodeMoveWindows(parent_node->ChildNodes[split_inheritor_child_idx], parent_node);
14260  DockSettingsRenameNodeReferences(parent_node->ID, parent_node->ChildNodes[split_inheritor_child_idx]->ID);
14261  DockNodeTreeUpdatePosSize(parent_node, parent_node->Pos, parent_node->Size);
14262 
14263  // Flags transfer (e.g. this is where we transfer the ImGuiDockNodeFlags_CentralNode property)
14264  child_0->SharedFlags = parent_node->SharedFlags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_SharedFlagsInheritMask_;
14265  child_1->SharedFlags = parent_node->SharedFlags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_SharedFlagsInheritMask_;
14266  child_inheritor->LocalFlags = parent_node->LocalFlags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_LocalFlagsTransferMask_;
14267  parent_node->LocalFlags &= ~ImGuiDockNodeFlags_LocalFlagsTransferMask_;
14268  if (child_inheritor->IsCentralNode())
14269  DockNodeGetRootNode(parent_node)->CentralNode = child_inheritor;
14270 }
14271 
14272 void ImGui::DockNodeTreeMerge(ImGuiContext* ctx, ImGuiDockNode* parent_node, ImGuiDockNode* merge_lead_child)
14273 {
14274  // When called from DockContextProcessUndockNode() it is possible that one of the child is NULL.
14275  ImGuiDockNode* child_0 = parent_node->ChildNodes[0];
14276  ImGuiDockNode* child_1 = parent_node->ChildNodes[1];
14277  IM_ASSERT(child_0 || child_1);
14278  IM_ASSERT(merge_lead_child == child_0 || merge_lead_child == child_1);
14279  if ((child_0 && child_0->Windows.Size > 0) || (child_1 && child_1->Windows.Size > 0))
14280  {
14281  IM_ASSERT(parent_node->TabBar == NULL);
14282  IM_ASSERT(parent_node->Windows.Size == 0);
14283  }
14284  IMGUI_DEBUG_LOG_DOCKING("DockNodeTreeMerge 0x%08X & 0x%08X back into parent 0x%08X\n", child_0 ? child_0->ID : 0, child_1 ? child_1->ID : 0, parent_node->ID);
14285 
14286  ImVec2 backup_last_explicit_size = parent_node->SizeRef;
14287  DockNodeMoveChildNodes(parent_node, merge_lead_child);
14288  if (child_0)
14289  {
14290  DockNodeMoveWindows(parent_node, child_0); // Generally only 1 of the 2 child node will have windows
14291  DockSettingsRenameNodeReferences(child_0->ID, parent_node->ID);
14292  }
14293  if (child_1)
14294  {
14295  DockNodeMoveWindows(parent_node, child_1);
14296  DockSettingsRenameNodeReferences(child_1->ID, parent_node->ID);
14297  }
14298  DockNodeApplyPosSizeToWindows(parent_node);
14299  parent_node->AuthorityForPos = parent_node->AuthorityForSize = parent_node->AuthorityForViewport = ImGuiDataAuthority_Auto;
14300  parent_node->VisibleWindow = merge_lead_child->VisibleWindow;
14301  parent_node->SizeRef = backup_last_explicit_size;
14302 
14303  // Flags transfer
14304  parent_node->LocalFlags &= ~ImGuiDockNodeFlags_LocalFlagsTransferMask_; // Preserve Dockspace flag
14305  parent_node->LocalFlags |= (child_0 ? child_0->LocalFlags : 0) & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_LocalFlagsTransferMask_;
14306  parent_node->LocalFlags |= (child_1 ? child_1->LocalFlags : 0) & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_LocalFlagsTransferMask_;
14307 
14308  if (child_0)
14309  {
14310  ctx->DockContext.Nodes.SetVoidPtr(child_0->ID, NULL);
14311  IM_DELETE(child_0);
14312  }
14313  if (child_1)
14314  {
14315  ctx->DockContext.Nodes.SetVoidPtr(child_1->ID, NULL);
14316  IM_DELETE(child_1);
14317  }
14318 }
14319 
14320 // Update Pos/Size for a node hierarchy (don't affect child Windows yet)
14321 void ImGui::DockNodeTreeUpdatePosSize(ImGuiDockNode* node, ImVec2 pos, ImVec2 size, bool only_write_to_marked_nodes)
14322 {
14323  // During the regular dock node update we write to all nodes.
14324  // 'only_write_to_marked_nodes' is only set when turning a node visible mid-frame and we need its size right-away.
14325  const bool write_to_node = (only_write_to_marked_nodes == false) || (node->MarkedForPosSizeWrite);
14326  if (write_to_node)
14327  {
14328  node->Pos = pos;
14329  node->Size = size;
14330  }
14331 
14332  if (node->IsLeafNode())
14333  return;
14334 
14335  ImGuiDockNode* child_0 = node->ChildNodes[0];
14336  ImGuiDockNode* child_1 = node->ChildNodes[1];
14337  ImVec2 child_0_pos = pos, child_1_pos = pos;
14338  ImVec2 child_0_size = size, child_1_size = size;
14339  if (child_0->IsVisible && child_1->IsVisible)
14340  {
14341  const float spacing = DOCKING_SPLITTER_SIZE;
14342  const ImGuiAxis axis = (ImGuiAxis)node->SplitAxis;
14343  const float size_avail = ImMax(size[axis] - spacing, 0.0f);
14344 
14345  // Size allocation policy
14346  // 1) The first 0..WindowMinSize[axis]*2 are allocated evenly to both windows.
14347  ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
14348  const float size_min_each = ImFloor(ImMin(size_avail, g.Style.WindowMinSize[axis] * 2.0f) * 0.5f);
14349 
14350  // 2) Process locked absolute size (during a splitter resize we preserve the child of nodes not touching the splitter edge)
14351  if (child_0->WantLockSizeOnce && !child_1->WantLockSizeOnce)
14352  {
14353  child_0_size[axis] = child_0->SizeRef[axis] = ImMin(size_avail - 1.0f, child_0->Size[axis]);
14354  child_1_size[axis] = child_1->SizeRef[axis] = (size_avail - child_0_size[axis]);
14355  IM_ASSERT(child_0->SizeRef[axis] > 0.0f && child_1->SizeRef[axis] > 0.0f);
14356  }
14357  else if (child_1->WantLockSizeOnce && !child_0->WantLockSizeOnce)
14358  {
14359  child_1_size[axis] = child_1->SizeRef[axis] = ImMin(size_avail - 1.0f, child_1->Size[axis]);
14360  child_0_size[axis] = child_0->SizeRef[axis] = (size_avail - child_1_size[axis]);
14361  IM_ASSERT(child_0->SizeRef[axis] > 0.0f && child_1->SizeRef[axis] > 0.0f);
14362  }
14363  else if (child_0->WantLockSizeOnce && child_1->WantLockSizeOnce)
14364  {
14365  // FIXME-DOCK: We cannot honor the requested size, so apply ratio.
14366  // Currently this path will only be taken if code programmatically sets WantLockSizeOnce
14367  float ratio_0 = child_0_size[axis] / (child_0_size[axis] + child_1_size[axis]);
14368  child_0_size[axis] = child_0->SizeRef[axis] = ImFloor(size_avail * ratio_0);
14369  child_1_size[axis] = child_1->SizeRef[axis] = (size_avail - child_0_size[axis]);
14370  IM_ASSERT(child_0->SizeRef[axis] > 0.0f && child_1->SizeRef[axis] > 0.0f);
14371  }
14372 
14373  // 3) If one window is the central node (~ use remaining space, should be made explicit!), use explicit size from the other, and remainder for the central node
14374  else if (child_1->IsCentralNode() && child_0->SizeRef[axis] != 0.0f)
14375  {
14376  child_0_size[axis] = ImMin(size_avail - size_min_each, child_0->SizeRef[axis]);
14377  child_1_size[axis] = (size_avail - child_0_size[axis]);
14378  }
14379  else if (child_0->IsCentralNode() && child_1->SizeRef[axis] != 0.0f)
14380  {
14381  child_1_size[axis] = ImMin(size_avail - size_min_each, child_1->SizeRef[axis]);
14382  child_0_size[axis] = (size_avail - child_1_size[axis]);
14383  }
14384  else
14385  {
14386  // 4) Otherwise distribute according to the relative ratio of each SizeRef value
14387  float split_ratio = child_0->SizeRef[axis] / (child_0->SizeRef[axis] + child_1->SizeRef[axis]);
14388  child_0_size[axis] = ImMax(size_min_each, ImFloor(size_avail * split_ratio + 0.5F));
14389  child_1_size[axis] = (size_avail - child_0_size[axis]);
14390  }
14391 
14392  child_1_pos[axis] += spacing + child_0_size[axis];
14393  }
14394  child_0->WantLockSizeOnce = child_1->WantLockSizeOnce = false;
14395 
14396  if (child_0->IsVisible)
14397  DockNodeTreeUpdatePosSize(child_0, child_0_pos, child_0_size);
14398  if (child_1->IsVisible)
14399  DockNodeTreeUpdatePosSize(child_1, child_1_pos, child_1_size);
14400 }
14401 
14402 static void DockNodeTreeUpdateSplitterFindTouchingNode(ImGuiDockNode* node, ImGuiAxis axis, int side, ImVector<ImGuiDockNode*>* touching_nodes)
14403 {
14404  if (node->IsLeafNode())
14405  {
14406  touching_nodes->push_back(node);
14407  return;
14408  }
14409  if (node->ChildNodes[0]->IsVisible)
14410  if (node->SplitAxis != axis || side == 0 || !node->ChildNodes[1]->IsVisible)
14411  DockNodeTreeUpdateSplitterFindTouchingNode(node->ChildNodes[0], axis, side, touching_nodes);
14412  if (node->ChildNodes[1]->IsVisible)
14413  if (node->SplitAxis != axis || side == 1 || !node->ChildNodes[0]->IsVisible)
14414  DockNodeTreeUpdateSplitterFindTouchingNode(node->ChildNodes[1], axis, side, touching_nodes);
14415 }
14416 
14417 void ImGui::DockNodeTreeUpdateSplitter(ImGuiDockNode* node)
14418 {
14419  if (node->IsLeafNode())
14420  return;
14421 
14422  ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
14423 
14424  ImGuiDockNode* child_0 = node->ChildNodes[0];
14425  ImGuiDockNode* child_1 = node->ChildNodes[1];
14426  if (child_0->IsVisible && child_1->IsVisible)
14427  {
14428  // Bounding box of the splitter cover the space between both nodes (w = Spacing, h = Size[xy^1] for when splitting horizontally)
14429  const ImGuiAxis axis = (ImGuiAxis)node->SplitAxis;
14430  IM_ASSERT(axis != ImGuiAxis_None);
14431  ImRect bb;
14432  bb.Min = child_0->Pos;
14433  bb.Max = child_1->Pos;
14434  bb.Min[axis] += child_0->Size[axis];
14435  bb.Max[axis ^ 1] += child_1->Size[axis ^ 1];
14436  //if (g.IO.KeyCtrl) GetForegroundDrawList(g.CurrentWindow->Viewport)->AddRect(bb.Min, bb.Max, IM_COL32(255,0,255,255));
14437 
14438  const ImGuiDockNodeFlags merged_flags = child_0->GetMergedFlags() | child_1->GetMergedFlags();
14439  const ImGuiDockNodeFlags no_resize_axis_flag = (axis == ImGuiAxis_X) ? ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoResizeX : ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoResizeY;
14440  if ((merged_flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoResize) || (merged_flags & no_resize_axis_flag))
14441  {
14442  ImGuiWindow* window = g.CurrentWindow;
14443  window->DrawList->AddRectFilled(bb.Min, bb.Max, GetColorU32(ImGuiCol_Separator), g.Style.FrameRounding);
14444  }
14445  else
14446  {
14447  //bb.Min[axis] += 1; // Display a little inward so highlight doesn't connect with nearby tabs on the neighbor node.
14448  //bb.Max[axis] -= 1;
14449  PushID(node->ID);
14450 
14451  // Gather list of nodes that are touching the splitter line. Find resizing limits based on those nodes.
14452  ImVector<ImGuiDockNode*> touching_nodes[2];
14453  float min_size = g.Style.WindowMinSize[axis];
14454  float resize_limits[2];
14455  resize_limits[0] = node->ChildNodes[0]->Pos[axis] + min_size;
14456  resize_limits[1] = node->ChildNodes[1]->Pos[axis] + node->ChildNodes[1]->Size[axis] - min_size;
14457 
14458  ImGuiID splitter_id = GetID("##Splitter");
14459  if (g.ActiveId == splitter_id)
14460  {
14461  // Only process when splitter is active
14462  DockNodeTreeUpdateSplitterFindTouchingNode(child_0, axis, 1, &touching_nodes[0]);
14463  DockNodeTreeUpdateSplitterFindTouchingNode(child_1, axis, 0, &touching_nodes[1]);
14464  for (int touching_node_n = 0; touching_node_n < touching_nodes[0].Size; touching_node_n++)
14465  resize_limits[0] = ImMax(resize_limits[0], touching_nodes[0][touching_node_n]->Rect().Min[axis] + min_size);
14466  for (int touching_node_n = 0; touching_node_n < touching_nodes[1].Size; touching_node_n++)
14467  resize_limits[1] = ImMin(resize_limits[1], touching_nodes[1][touching_node_n]->Rect().Max[axis] - min_size);
14468 
14469  /*
14470  // [DEBUG] Render limits
14471  ImDrawList* draw_list = node->HostWindow ? GetForegroundDrawList(node->HostWindow) : GetForegroundDrawList(GetMainViewport());
14472  for (int n = 0; n < 2; n++)
14473  if (axis == ImGuiAxis_X)
14474  draw_list->AddLine(ImVec2(resize_limits[n], node->ChildNodes[n]->Pos.y), ImVec2(resize_limits[n], node->ChildNodes[n]->Pos.y + node->ChildNodes[n]->Size.y), IM_COL32(255, 0, 255, 255), 3.0f);
14475  else
14476  draw_list->AddLine(ImVec2(node->ChildNodes[n]->Pos.x, resize_limits[n]), ImVec2(node->ChildNodes[n]->Pos.x + node->ChildNodes[n]->Size.x, resize_limits[n]), IM_COL32(255, 0, 255, 255), 3.0f);
14477  */
14478  }
14479 
14480  // Use a short delay before highlighting the splitter (and changing the mouse cursor) in order for regular mouse movement to not highlight many splitters
14481  float cur_size_0 = child_0->Size[axis];
14482  float cur_size_1 = child_1->Size[axis];
14483  float min_size_0 = resize_limits[0] - child_0->Pos[axis];
14484  float min_size_1 = child_1->Pos[axis] + child_1->Size[axis] - resize_limits[1];
14485  if (SplitterBehavior(bb, GetID("##Splitter"), axis, &cur_size_0, &cur_size_1, min_size_0, min_size_1, WINDOWS_RESIZE_FROM_EDGES_HALF_THICKNESS, WINDOWS_RESIZE_FROM_EDGES_FEEDBACK_TIMER))
14486  {
14487  if (touching_nodes[0].Size > 0 && touching_nodes[1].Size > 0)
14488  {
14489  child_0->Size[axis] = child_0->SizeRef[axis] = cur_size_0;
14490  child_1->Pos[axis] -= cur_size_1 - child_1->Size[axis];
14491  child_1->Size[axis] = child_1->SizeRef[axis] = cur_size_1;
14492 
14493  // Lock the size of every node that is a sibling of the node we are touching
14494  // This might be less desirable if we can merge sibling of a same axis into the same parental level.
14495  for (int side_n = 0; side_n < 2; side_n++)
14496  for (int touching_node_n = 0; touching_node_n < touching_nodes[side_n].Size; touching_node_n++)
14497  {
14498  ImGuiDockNode* touching_node = touching_nodes[side_n][touching_node_n];
14499  //ImDrawList* draw_list = node->HostWindow ? GetForegroundDrawList(node->HostWindow) : GetForegroundDrawList(GetMainViewport());
14500  //draw_list->AddRect(touching_node->Pos, touching_node->Pos + touching_node->Size, IM_COL32(255, 128, 0, 255));
14501  while (touching_node->ParentNode != node)
14502  {
14503  if (touching_node->ParentNode->SplitAxis == axis)
14504  {
14505  // Mark other node so its size will be preserved during the upcoming call to DockNodeTreeUpdatePosSize().
14506  ImGuiDockNode* node_to_preserve = touching_node->ParentNode->ChildNodes[side_n];
14507  node_to_preserve->WantLockSizeOnce = true;
14508  //draw_list->AddRect(touching_node->Pos, touching_node->Rect().Max, IM_COL32(255, 0, 0, 255));
14509  //draw_list->AddRectFilled(node_to_preserve->Pos, node_to_preserve->Rect().Max, IM_COL32(0, 255, 0, 100));
14510  }
14511  touching_node = touching_node->ParentNode;
14512  }
14513  }
14514 
14515  DockNodeTreeUpdatePosSize(child_0, child_0->Pos, child_0->Size);
14516  DockNodeTreeUpdatePosSize(child_1, child_1->Pos, child_1->Size);
14517  MarkIniSettingsDirty();
14518  }
14519  }
14520  PopID();
14521  }
14522  }
14523 
14524  if (child_0->IsVisible)
14525  DockNodeTreeUpdateSplitter(child_0);
14526  if (child_1->IsVisible)
14527  DockNodeTreeUpdateSplitter(child_1);
14528 }
14529 
14530 ImGuiDockNode* ImGui::DockNodeTreeFindFallbackLeafNode(ImGuiDockNode* node)
14531 {
14532  if (node->IsLeafNode())
14533  return node;
14534  if (ImGuiDockNode* leaf_node = DockNodeTreeFindFallbackLeafNode(node->ChildNodes[0]))
14535  return leaf_node;
14536  if (ImGuiDockNode* leaf_node = DockNodeTreeFindFallbackLeafNode(node->ChildNodes[1]))
14537  return leaf_node;
14538  return NULL;
14539 }
14540 
14541 ImGuiDockNode* ImGui::DockNodeTreeFindVisibleNodeByPos(ImGuiDockNode* node, ImVec2 pos)
14542 {
14543  if (!node->IsVisible)
14544  return NULL;
14545 
14546  const float dock_spacing = 0.0f;// g.Style.ItemInnerSpacing.x; // FIXME: Relation to DOCKING_SPLITTER_SIZE?
14547  ImRect r(node->Pos, node->Pos + node->Size);
14548  r.Expand(dock_spacing * 0.5f);
14549  bool inside = r.Contains(pos);
14550  if (!inside)
14551  return NULL;
14552 
14553  if (node->IsLeafNode())
14554  return node;
14555  if (ImGuiDockNode* hovered_node = DockNodeTreeFindVisibleNodeByPos(node->ChildNodes[0], pos))
14556  return hovered_node;
14557  if (ImGuiDockNode* hovered_node = DockNodeTreeFindVisibleNodeByPos(node->ChildNodes[1], pos))
14558  return hovered_node;
14559 
14560  return NULL;
14561 }
14562 
14563 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
14564 // Docking: Public Functions (SetWindowDock, DockSpace, DockSpaceOverViewport)
14565 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
14566 // - SetWindowDock() [Internal]
14567 // - DockSpace()
14568 // - DockSpaceOverViewport()
14569 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
14570 
14571 // [Internal] Called via SetNextWindowDockID()
14572 void ImGui::SetWindowDock(ImGuiWindow* window, ImGuiID dock_id, ImGuiCond cond)
14573 {
14574  // Test condition (NB: bit 0 is always true) and clear flags for next time
14575  if (cond && (window->SetWindowDockAllowFlags & cond) == 0)
14576  return;
14577  window->SetWindowDockAllowFlags &= ~(ImGuiCond_Once | ImGuiCond_FirstUseEver | ImGuiCond_Appearing);
14578 
14579  if (window->DockId == dock_id)
14580  return;
14581 
14582  // If the user attempt to set a dock id that is a split node, we'll dig within to find a suitable docking spot
14583  ImGuiContext* ctx = GImGui;
14584  if (ImGuiDockNode* new_node = DockContextFindNodeByID(ctx, dock_id))
14585  if (new_node->IsSplitNode())
14586  {
14587  // Policy: Find central node or latest focused node. We first move back to our root node.
14588  new_node = DockNodeGetRootNode(new_node);
14589  if (new_node->CentralNode)
14590  {
14591  IM_ASSERT(new_node->CentralNode->IsCentralNode());
14592  dock_id = new_node->CentralNode->ID;
14593  }
14594  else
14595  {
14596  dock_id = new_node->LastFocusedNodeId;
14597  }
14598  }
14599 
14600  if (window->DockId == dock_id)
14601  return;
14602 
14603  if (window->DockNode)
14604  DockNodeRemoveWindow(window->DockNode, window, 0);
14605  window->DockId = dock_id;
14606 }
14607 
14608 // Create an explicit dockspace node within an existing window. Also expose dock node flags and creates a CentralNode by default.
14609 // The Central Node is always displayed even when empty and shrink/extend according to the requested size of its neighbors.
14610 // DockSpace() needs to be submitted _before_ any window they can host. If you use a dockspace, submit it early in your app.
14611 void ImGui::DockSpace(ImGuiID id, const ImVec2& size_arg, ImGuiDockNodeFlags flags, const ImGuiWindowClass* window_class)
14612 {
14613  ImGuiContext* ctx = GImGui;
14614  ImGuiContext& g = *ctx;
14615  ImGuiWindow* window = GetCurrentWindow();
14616  if (!(g.IO.ConfigFlags & ImGuiConfigFlags_DockingEnable))
14617  return;
14618 
14619  // Early out if parent window is hidden/collapsed
14620  // This is faster but also DockNodeUpdateTabBar() relies on TabBarLayout() running (which won't if SkipItems=true) to set NextSelectedTabId = 0). See #2960.
14621  // If for whichever reason this is causing problem we would need to ensure that DockNodeUpdateTabBar() ends up clearing NextSelectedTabId even if SkipItems=true.
14622  if (window->SkipItems)
14623  flags |= ImGuiDockNodeFlags_KeepAliveOnly;
14624 
14625  IM_ASSERT((flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_DockSpace) == 0);
14626  IM_ASSERT(id != 0);
14627  ImGuiDockNode* node = DockContextFindNodeByID(ctx, id);
14628  if (!node)
14629  {
14630  IMGUI_DEBUG_LOG_DOCKING("DockSpace: dockspace node 0x%08X created\n", id);
14631  node = DockContextAddNode(ctx, id);
14632  node->LocalFlags |= ImGuiDockNodeFlags_CentralNode;
14633  }
14634  if (window_class && window_class->ClassId != node->WindowClass.ClassId)
14635  IMGUI_DEBUG_LOG_DOCKING("DockSpace: dockspace node 0x%08X: setup WindowClass 0x%08X -> 0x%08X\n", id, node->WindowClass.ClassId, window_class->ClassId);
14636  node->SharedFlags = flags;
14637  node->WindowClass = window_class ? *window_class : ImGuiWindowClass();
14638 
14639  // When a DockSpace transitioned form implicit to explicit this may be called a second time
14640  // It is possible that the node has already been claimed by a docked window which appeared before the DockSpace() node, so we overwrite IsDockSpace again.
14641  if (node->LastFrameActive == g.FrameCount && !(flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_KeepAliveOnly))
14642  {
14643  IM_ASSERT(node->IsDockSpace() == false && "Cannot call DockSpace() twice a frame with the same ID");
14644  node->LocalFlags |= ImGuiDockNodeFlags_DockSpace;
14645  return;
14646  }
14647  node->LocalFlags |= ImGuiDockNodeFlags_DockSpace;
14648 
14649  // Keep alive mode, this is allow windows docked into this node so stay docked even if they are not visible
14650  if (flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_KeepAliveOnly)
14651  {
14652  node->LastFrameAlive = g.FrameCount;
14653  return;
14654  }
14655 
14656  const ImVec2 content_avail = GetContentRegionAvail();
14657  ImVec2 size = ImFloor(size_arg);
14658  if (size.x <= 0.0f)
14659  size.x = ImMax(content_avail.x + size.x, 4.0f); // Arbitrary minimum child size (0.0f causing too much issues)
14660  if (size.y <= 0.0f)
14661  size.y = ImMax(content_avail.y + size.y, 4.0f);
14662  IM_ASSERT(size.x > 0.0f && size.y > 0.0f);
14663 
14664  node->Pos = window->DC.CursorPos;
14665  node->Size = node->SizeRef = size;
14666  SetNextWindowPos(node->Pos);
14667  SetNextWindowSize(node->Size);
14668  g.NextWindowData.PosUndock = false;
14669 
14670  // FIXME-DOCK Why do we need a child window to host a dockspace, could we host it in the existing window?
14671  ImGuiWindowFlags window_flags = ImGuiWindowFlags_ChildWindow | ImGuiWindowFlags_DockNodeHost;
14672  window_flags |= ImGuiWindowFlags_NoSavedSettings | ImGuiWindowFlags_NoResize | ImGuiWindowFlags_NoCollapse | ImGuiWindowFlags_NoTitleBar;
14673  window_flags |= ImGuiWindowFlags_NoScrollbar | ImGuiWindowFlags_NoScrollWithMouse;
14674 
14675  char title[256];
14676  ImFormatString(title, IM_ARRAYSIZE(title), "%s/DockSpace_%08X", window->Name, id);
14677 
14678  // FIXME-DOCK: What is the reason for not simply calling BeginChild()?
14679  if (node->Windows.Size > 0 || node->IsSplitNode())
14680  PushStyleColor(ImGuiCol_ChildBg, IM_COL32(0, 0, 0, 0));
14681  PushStyleVar(ImGuiStyleVar_ChildBorderSize, 0.0f);
14682  Begin(title, NULL, window_flags);
14683  PopStyleVar();
14684  if (node->Windows.Size > 0 || node->IsSplitNode())
14685  PopStyleColor();
14686 
14687  ImGuiWindow* host_window = g.CurrentWindow;
14688  host_window->DockNodeAsHost = node;
14689  host_window->ChildId = window->GetID(title);
14690  node->HostWindow = host_window;
14691  node->OnlyNodeWithWindows = NULL;
14692 
14693  IM_ASSERT(node->IsRootNode());
14694 
14695  // We need to handle the rare case were a central node is missing.
14696  // This can happen if the node was first created manually with DockBuilderAddNode() but _without_ the ImGuiDockNodeFlags_Dockspace.
14697  // Doing it correctly would set the _CentralNode flags, which would then propagate according to subsequent split.
14698  // It would also be ambiguous to attempt to assign a central node while there are split nodes, so we wait until there's a single node remaining.
14699  // The specific sub-property of _CentralNode we are interested in recovering here is the "Don't delete when empty" property,
14700  // as it doesn't make sense for an empty dockspace to not have this property.
14701  if (node->IsLeafNode() && !node->IsCentralNode())
14702  node->LocalFlags |= ImGuiDockNodeFlags_CentralNode;
14703 
14704  // Update the node
14705  DockNodeUpdate(node);
14706 
14707  End();
14708  ItemSize(size);
14709 }
14710 
14711 // Tips: Use with ImGuiDockNodeFlags_PassthruCentralNode!
14712 // The limitation with this call is that your window won't have a menu bar.
14713 // Even though we could pass window flags, it would also require the user to be able to call BeginMenuBar() somehow meaning we can't Begin/End in a single function.
14714 // But you can also use BeginMainMenuBar(). If you really want a menu bar inside the same window as the one hosting the dockspace, you will need to copy this code somewhere and tweak it.
14715 ImGuiID ImGui::DockSpaceOverViewport(const ImGuiViewport* viewport, ImGuiDockNodeFlags dockspace_flags, const ImGuiWindowClass* window_class)
14716 {
14717  if (viewport == NULL)
14718  viewport = GetMainViewport();
14719 
14720  SetNextWindowPos(viewport->WorkPos);
14721  SetNextWindowSize(viewport->WorkSize);
14722  SetNextWindowViewport(viewport->ID);
14723 
14724  ImGuiWindowFlags host_window_flags = 0;
14725  host_window_flags |= ImGuiWindowFlags_NoTitleBar | ImGuiWindowFlags_NoCollapse | ImGuiWindowFlags_NoResize | ImGuiWindowFlags_NoMove | ImGuiWindowFlags_NoDocking;
14726  host_window_flags |= ImGuiWindowFlags_NoBringToFrontOnFocus | ImGuiWindowFlags_NoNavFocus;
14727  if (dockspace_flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_PassthruCentralNode)
14728  host_window_flags |= ImGuiWindowFlags_NoBackground;
14729 
14730  char label[32];
14731  ImFormatString(label, IM_ARRAYSIZE(label), "DockSpaceViewport_%08X", viewport->ID);
14732 
14733  PushStyleVar(ImGuiStyleVar_WindowRounding, 0.0f);
14734  PushStyleVar(ImGuiStyleVar_WindowBorderSize, 0.0f);
14735  PushStyleVar(ImGuiStyleVar_WindowPadding, ImVec2(0.0f, 0.0f));
14736  Begin(label, NULL, host_window_flags);
14737  PopStyleVar(3);
14738 
14739  ImGuiID dockspace_id = GetID("DockSpace");
14740  DockSpace(dockspace_id, ImVec2(0.0f, 0.0f), dockspace_flags, window_class);
14741  End();
14742 
14743  return dockspace_id;
14744 }
14745 
14746 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
14747 // Docking: Builder Functions
14748 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
14749 // Very early end-user API to manipulate dock nodes.
14750 // Only available in imgui_internal.h. Expect this API to change/break!
14751 // It is expected that those functions are all called _before_ the dockspace node submission.
14752 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
14753 // - DockBuilderDockWindow()
14754 // - DockBuilderGetNode()
14755 // - DockBuilderSetNodePos()
14756 // - DockBuilderSetNodeSize()
14757 // - DockBuilderAddNode()
14758 // - DockBuilderRemoveNode()
14759 // - DockBuilderRemoveNodeChildNodes()
14760 // - DockBuilderRemoveNodeDockedWindows()
14761 // - DockBuilderSplitNode()
14762 // - DockBuilderCopyNodeRec()
14763 // - DockBuilderCopyNode()
14764 // - DockBuilderCopyWindowSettings()
14765 // - DockBuilderCopyDockSpace()
14766 // - DockBuilderFinish()
14767 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
14768 
14769 void ImGui::DockBuilderDockWindow(const char* window_name, ImGuiID node_id)
14770 {
14771  // We don't preserve relative order of multiple docked windows (by clearing DockOrder back to -1)
14772  ImGuiID window_id = ImHashStr(window_name);
14773  if (ImGuiWindow* window = FindWindowByID(window_id))
14774  {
14775  // Apply to created window
14776  SetWindowDock(window, node_id, ImGuiCond_Always);
14777  window->DockOrder = -1;
14778  }
14779  else
14780  {
14781  // Apply to settings
14782  ImGuiWindowSettings* settings = FindWindowSettings(window_id);
14783  if (settings == NULL)
14784  settings = CreateNewWindowSettings(window_name);
14785  settings->DockId = node_id;
14786  settings->DockOrder = -1;
14787  }
14788 }
14789 
14790 ImGuiDockNode* ImGui::DockBuilderGetNode(ImGuiID node_id)
14791 {
14792  ImGuiContext* ctx = GImGui;
14793  return DockContextFindNodeByID(ctx, node_id);
14794 }
14795 
14796 void ImGui::DockBuilderSetNodePos(ImGuiID node_id, ImVec2 pos)
14797 {
14798  ImGuiContext* ctx = GImGui;
14799  ImGuiDockNode* node = DockContextFindNodeByID(ctx, node_id);
14800  if (node == NULL)
14801  return;
14802  node->Pos = pos;
14803  node->AuthorityForPos = ImGuiDataAuthority_DockNode;
14804 }
14805 
14806 void ImGui::DockBuilderSetNodeSize(ImGuiID node_id, ImVec2 size)
14807 {
14808  ImGuiContext* ctx = GImGui;
14809  ImGuiDockNode* node = DockContextFindNodeByID(ctx, node_id);
14810  if (node == NULL)
14811  return;
14812  IM_ASSERT(size.x > 0.0f && size.y > 0.0f);
14813  node->Size = node->SizeRef = size;
14814  node->AuthorityForSize = ImGuiDataAuthority_DockNode;
14815 }
14816 
14817 // Make sure to use the ImGuiDockNodeFlags_DockSpace flag to create a dockspace node! Otherwise this will create a floating node!
14818 // - Floating node: you can then call DockBuilderSetNodePos()/DockBuilderSetNodeSize() to position and size the floating node.
14819 // - Dockspace node: calling DockBuilderSetNodePos() is unnecessary.
14820 // - If you intend to split a node immediately after creation using DockBuilderSplitNode(), make sure to call DockBuilderSetNodeSize() beforehand!
14821 // For various reason, the splitting code currently needs a base size otherwise space may not be allocated as precisely as you would expect.
14822 // - Use (id == 0) to let the system allocate a node identifier.
14823 // - Existing node with a same id will be removed.
14824 ImGuiID ImGui::DockBuilderAddNode(ImGuiID id, ImGuiDockNodeFlags flags)
14825 {
14826  ImGuiContext* ctx = GImGui;
14827  ImGuiDockNode* node = NULL;
14828 
14829  if (id != 0)
14830  DockBuilderRemoveNode(id);
14831 
14832  if (flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_DockSpace)
14833  {
14834  DockSpace(id, ImVec2(0, 0), (flags & ~ImGuiDockNodeFlags_DockSpace) | ImGuiDockNodeFlags_KeepAliveOnly);
14835  node = DockContextFindNodeByID(ctx, id);
14836  }
14837  else
14838  {
14839  node = DockContextAddNode(ctx, id);
14840  node->LocalFlags = flags;
14841  }
14842  node->LastFrameAlive = ctx->FrameCount; // Set this otherwise BeginDocked will undock during the same frame.
14843  return node->ID;
14844 }
14845 
14846 void ImGui::DockBuilderRemoveNode(ImGuiID node_id)
14847 {
14848  ImGuiContext* ctx = GImGui;
14849  ImGuiDockNode* node = DockContextFindNodeByID(ctx, node_id);
14850  if (node == NULL)
14851  return;
14852  DockBuilderRemoveNodeDockedWindows(node_id, true);
14853  DockBuilderRemoveNodeChildNodes(node_id);
14854  if (node->IsCentralNode() && node->ParentNode)
14855  node->ParentNode->LocalFlags |= ImGuiDockNodeFlags_CentralNode;
14856  DockContextRemoveNode(ctx, node, true);
14857 }
14858 
14859 // root_id = 0 to remove all, root_id != 0 to remove child of given node.
14860 void ImGui::DockBuilderRemoveNodeChildNodes(ImGuiID root_id)
14861 {
14862  ImGuiContext* ctx = GImGui;
14863  ImGuiDockContext* dc = &ctx->DockContext;
14864 
14865  ImGuiDockNode* root_node = root_id ? DockContextFindNodeByID(ctx, root_id) : NULL;
14866  if (root_id && root_node == NULL)
14867  return;
14868  bool has_central_node = false;
14869 
14870  ImGuiDataAuthority backup_root_node_authority_for_pos = root_node ? root_node->AuthorityForPos : ImGuiDataAuthority_Auto;
14871  ImGuiDataAuthority backup_root_node_authority_for_size = root_node ? root_node->AuthorityForSize : ImGuiDataAuthority_Auto;
14872 
14873  // Process active windows
14874  ImVector<ImGuiDockNode*> nodes_to_remove;
14875  for (int n = 0; n < dc->Nodes.Data.Size; n++)
14876  if (ImGuiDockNode* node = (ImGuiDockNode*)dc->Nodes.Data[n].val_p)
14877  {
14878  bool want_removal = (root_id == 0) || (node->ID != root_id && DockNodeGetRootNode(node)->ID == root_id);
14879  if (want_removal)
14880  {
14881  if (node->IsCentralNode())
14882  has_central_node = true;
14883  if (root_id != 0)
14884  DockContextQueueNotifyRemovedNode(ctx, node);
14885  if (root_node)
14886  {
14887  DockNodeMoveWindows(root_node, node);
14888  DockSettingsRenameNodeReferences(node->ID, root_node->ID);
14889  }
14890  nodes_to_remove.push_back(node);
14891  }
14892  }
14893 
14894  // DockNodeMoveWindows->DockNodeAddWindow will normally set those when reaching two windows (which is only adequate during interactive merge)
14895  // Make sure we don't lose our current pos/size. (FIXME-DOCK: Consider tidying up that code in DockNodeAddWindow instead)
14896  if (root_node)
14897  {
14898  root_node->AuthorityForPos = backup_root_node_authority_for_pos;
14899  root_node->AuthorityForSize = backup_root_node_authority_for_size;
14900  }
14901 
14902  // Apply to settings
14903  for (ImGuiWindowSettings* settings = ctx->SettingsWindows.begin(); settings != NULL; settings = ctx->SettingsWindows.next_chunk(settings))
14904  if (ImGuiID window_settings_dock_id = settings->DockId)
14905  for (int n = 0; n < nodes_to_remove.Size; n++)
14906  if (nodes_to_remove[n]->ID == window_settings_dock_id)
14907  {
14908  settings->DockId = root_id;
14909  break;
14910  }
14911 
14912  // Not really efficient, but easier to destroy a whole hierarchy considering DockContextRemoveNode is attempting to merge nodes
14913  if (nodes_to_remove.Size > 1)
14914  ImQsort(nodes_to_remove.Data, nodes_to_remove.Size, sizeof(ImGuiDockNode*), DockNodeComparerDepthMostFirst);
14915  for (int n = 0; n < nodes_to_remove.Size; n++)
14916  DockContextRemoveNode(ctx, nodes_to_remove[n], false);
14917 
14918  if (root_id == 0)
14919  {
14920  dc->Nodes.Clear();
14921  dc->Requests.clear();
14922  }
14923  else if (has_central_node)
14924  {
14925  root_node->LocalFlags |= ImGuiDockNodeFlags_CentralNode;
14926  root_node->CentralNode = root_node;
14927  }
14928 }
14929 
14930 void ImGui::DockBuilderRemoveNodeDockedWindows(ImGuiID root_id, bool clear_settings_refs)
14931 {
14932  // Clear references in settings
14933  ImGuiContext* ctx = GImGui;
14934  ImGuiContext& g = *ctx;
14935  if (clear_settings_refs)
14936  {
14937  for (ImGuiWindowSettings* settings = g.SettingsWindows.begin(); settings != NULL; settings = g.SettingsWindows.next_chunk(settings))
14938  {
14939  bool want_removal = (root_id == 0) || (settings->DockId == root_id);
14940  if (!want_removal && settings->DockId != 0)
14941  if (ImGuiDockNode* node = DockContextFindNodeByID(ctx, settings->DockId))
14942  if (DockNodeGetRootNode(node)->ID == root_id)
14943  want_removal = true;
14944  if (want_removal)
14945  settings->DockId = 0;
14946  }
14947  }
14948 
14949  // Clear references in windows
14950  for (int n = 0; n < g.Windows.Size; n++)
14951  {
14952  ImGuiWindow* window = g.Windows[n];
14953  bool want_removal = (root_id == 0) || (window->DockNode && DockNodeGetRootNode(window->DockNode)->ID == root_id) || (window->DockNodeAsHost && window->DockNodeAsHost->ID == root_id);
14954  if (want_removal)
14955  {
14956  const ImGuiID backup_dock_id = window->DockId;
14957  IM_UNUSED(backup_dock_id);
14958  DockContextProcessUndockWindow(ctx, window, clear_settings_refs);
14959  if (!clear_settings_refs)
14960  IM_ASSERT(window->DockId == backup_dock_id);
14961  }
14962  }
14963 }
14964 
14965 // If 'out_id_at_dir' or 'out_id_at_opposite_dir' are non NULL, the function will write out the ID of the two new nodes created.
14966 // Return value is ID of the node at the specified direction, so same as (*out_id_at_dir) if that pointer is set.
14967 // FIXME-DOCK: We are not exposing nor using split_outer.
14968 ImGuiID ImGui::DockBuilderSplitNode(ImGuiID id, ImGuiDir split_dir, float size_ratio_for_node_at_dir, ImGuiID* out_id_at_dir, ImGuiID* out_id_at_opposite_dir)
14969 {
14970  ImGuiContext* ctx = GImGui;
14971  IM_ASSERT(split_dir != ImGuiDir_None);
14972  IMGUI_DEBUG_LOG_DOCKING("DockBuilderSplitNode node 0x%08X, split_dir %d\n", id, split_dir);
14973 
14974  ImGuiDockNode* node = DockContextFindNodeByID(ctx, id);
14975  if (node == NULL)
14976  {
14977  IM_ASSERT(node != NULL);
14978  return 0;
14979  }
14980
