14981  IM_ASSERT(!node->IsSplitNode()); // Assert if already Split
14982 
14983  ImGuiDockRequest req;
14984  req.Type = ImGuiDockRequestType_Split;
14985  req.DockTargetWindow = NULL;
14986  req.DockTargetNode = node;
14987  req.DockPayload = NULL;
14988  req.DockSplitDir = split_dir;
14989  req.DockSplitRatio = ImSaturate((split_dir == ImGuiDir_Left || split_dir == ImGuiDir_Up) ? size_ratio_for_node_at_dir : 1.0f - size_ratio_for_node_at_dir);
14990  req.DockSplitOuter = false;
14991  DockContextProcessDock(ctx, &req);
14992 
14993  ImGuiID id_at_dir = node->ChildNodes[(split_dir == ImGuiDir_Left || split_dir == ImGuiDir_Up) ? 0 : 1]->ID;
14994  ImGuiID id_at_opposite_dir = node->ChildNodes[(split_dir == ImGuiDir_Left || split_dir == ImGuiDir_Up) ? 1 : 0]->ID;
14995  if (out_id_at_dir)
14996  *out_id_at_dir = id_at_dir;
14997  if (out_id_at_opposite_dir)
14998  *out_id_at_opposite_dir = id_at_opposite_dir;
14999  return id_at_dir;
15000 }
15001 
15002 static ImGuiDockNode* DockBuilderCopyNodeRec(ImGuiDockNode* src_node, ImGuiID dst_node_id_if_known, ImVector<ImGuiID>* out_node_remap_pairs)
15003 {
15004  ImGuiContext* ctx = GImGui;
15005  ImGuiDockNode* dst_node = ImGui::DockContextAddNode(ctx, dst_node_id_if_known);
15006  dst_node->SharedFlags = src_node->SharedFlags;
15007  dst_node->LocalFlags = src_node->LocalFlags;
15008  dst_node->Pos = src_node->Pos;
15009  dst_node->Size = src_node->Size;
15010  dst_node->SizeRef = src_node->SizeRef;
15011  dst_node->SplitAxis = src_node->SplitAxis;
15012 
15013  out_node_remap_pairs->push_back(src_node->ID);
15014  out_node_remap_pairs->push_back(dst_node->ID);
15015 
15016  for (int child_n = 0; child_n < IM_ARRAYSIZE(src_node->ChildNodes); child_n++)
15017  if (src_node->ChildNodes[child_n])
15018  {
15019  dst_node->ChildNodes[child_n] = DockBuilderCopyNodeRec(src_node->ChildNodes[child_n], 0, out_node_remap_pairs);
15020  dst_node->ChildNodes[child_n]->ParentNode = dst_node;
15021  }
15022 
15023  IMGUI_DEBUG_LOG_DOCKING("Fork node %08X -> %08X (%d childs)\n", src_node->ID, dst_node->ID, dst_node->IsSplitNode() ? 2 : 0);
15024  return dst_node;
15025 }
15026 
15027 void ImGui::DockBuilderCopyNode(ImGuiID src_node_id, ImGuiID dst_node_id, ImVector<ImGuiID>* out_node_remap_pairs)
15028 {
15029  ImGuiContext* ctx = GImGui;
15030  IM_ASSERT(src_node_id != 0);
15031  IM_ASSERT(dst_node_id != 0);
15032  IM_ASSERT(out_node_remap_pairs != NULL);
15033 
15034  ImGuiDockNode* src_node = DockContextFindNodeByID(ctx, src_node_id);
15035  IM_ASSERT(src_node != NULL);
15036 
15037  out_node_remap_pairs->clear();
15038  DockBuilderRemoveNode(dst_node_id);
15039  DockBuilderCopyNodeRec(src_node, dst_node_id, out_node_remap_pairs);
15040 
15041  IM_ASSERT((out_node_remap_pairs->Size % 2) == 0);
15042 }
15043 
15044 void ImGui::DockBuilderCopyWindowSettings(const char* src_name, const char* dst_name)
15045 {
15046  ImGuiWindow* src_window = FindWindowByName(src_name);
15047  if (src_window == NULL)
15048  return;
15049  if (ImGuiWindow* dst_window = FindWindowByName(dst_name))
15050  {
15051  dst_window->Pos = src_window->Pos;
15052  dst_window->Size = src_window->Size;
15053  dst_window->SizeFull = src_window->SizeFull;
15054  dst_window->Collapsed = src_window->Collapsed;
15055  }
15056  else if (ImGuiWindowSettings* dst_settings = FindOrCreateWindowSettings(dst_name))
15057  {
15058  ImVec2ih window_pos_2ih = ImVec2ih(src_window->Pos);
15059  if (src_window->ViewportId != 0 && src_window->ViewportId != IMGUI_VIEWPORT_DEFAULT_ID)
15060  {
15061  dst_settings->ViewportPos = window_pos_2ih;
15062  dst_settings->ViewportId = src_window->ViewportId;
15063  dst_settings->Pos = ImVec2ih(0, 0);
15064  }
15065  else
15066  {
15067  dst_settings->Pos = window_pos_2ih;
15068  }
15069  dst_settings->Size = ImVec2ih(src_window->SizeFull);
15070  dst_settings->Collapsed = src_window->Collapsed;
15071  }
15072 }
15073 
15074 // FIXME: Will probably want to change this signature, in particular how the window remapping pairs are passed.
15075 void ImGui::DockBuilderCopyDockSpace(ImGuiID src_dockspace_id, ImGuiID dst_dockspace_id, ImVector<const char*>* in_window_remap_pairs)
15076 {
15077  IM_ASSERT(src_dockspace_id != 0);
15078  IM_ASSERT(dst_dockspace_id != 0);
15079  IM_ASSERT(in_window_remap_pairs != NULL);
15080  IM_ASSERT((in_window_remap_pairs->Size % 2) == 0);
15081 
15082  // Duplicate entire dock
15083  // FIXME: When overwriting dst_dockspace_id, windows that aren't part of our dockspace window class but that are docked in a same node will be split apart,
15084  // whereas we could attempt to at least keep them together in a new, same floating node.
15085  ImVector<ImGuiID> node_remap_pairs;
15086  DockBuilderCopyNode(src_dockspace_id, dst_dockspace_id, &node_remap_pairs);
15087 
15088  // Attempt to transition all the upcoming windows associated to dst_dockspace_id into the newly created hierarchy of dock nodes
15089  // (The windows associated to src_dockspace_id are staying in place)
15090  ImVector<ImGuiID> src_windows;
15091  for (int remap_window_n = 0; remap_window_n < in_window_remap_pairs->Size; remap_window_n += 2)
15092  {
15093  const char* src_window_name = (*in_window_remap_pairs)[remap_window_n];
15094  const char* dst_window_name = (*in_window_remap_pairs)[remap_window_n + 1];
15095  ImGuiID src_window_id = ImHashStr(src_window_name);
15096  src_windows.push_back(src_window_id);
15097 
15098  // Search in the remapping tables
15099  ImGuiID src_dock_id = 0;
15100  if (ImGuiWindow* src_window = FindWindowByID(src_window_id))
15101  src_dock_id = src_window->DockId;
15102  else if (ImGuiWindowSettings* src_window_settings = FindWindowSettings(src_window_id))
15103  src_dock_id = src_window_settings->DockId;
15104  ImGuiID dst_dock_id = 0;
15105  for (int dock_remap_n = 0; dock_remap_n < node_remap_pairs.Size; dock_remap_n += 2)
15106  if (node_remap_pairs[dock_remap_n] == src_dock_id)
15107  {
15108  dst_dock_id = node_remap_pairs[dock_remap_n + 1];
15109  //node_remap_pairs[dock_remap_n] = node_remap_pairs[dock_remap_n + 1] = 0; // Clear
15110  break;
15111  }
15112 
15113  if (dst_dock_id != 0)
15114  {
15115  // Docked windows gets redocked into the new node hierarchy.
15116  IMGUI_DEBUG_LOG_DOCKING("Remap live window '%s' 0x%08X -> '%s' 0x%08X\n", src_window_name, src_dock_id, dst_window_name, dst_dock_id);
15117  DockBuilderDockWindow(dst_window_name, dst_dock_id);
15118  }
15119  else
15120  {
15121  // Floating windows gets their settings transferred (regardless of whether the new window already exist or not)
15122  // When this is leading to a Copy and not a Move, we would get two overlapping floating windows. Could we possibly dock them together?
15123  IMGUI_DEBUG_LOG_DOCKING("Remap window settings '%s' -> '%s'\n", src_window_name, dst_window_name);
15124  DockBuilderCopyWindowSettings(src_window_name, dst_window_name);
15125  }
15126  }
15127 
15128  // Anything else in the source nodes of 'node_remap_pairs' are windows that were docked in src_dockspace_id but are not owned by it (unaffiliated windows, e.g. "ImGui Demo")
15129  // Find those windows and move to them to the cloned dock node. This may be optional?
15130  for (int dock_remap_n = 0; dock_remap_n < node_remap_pairs.Size; dock_remap_n += 2)
15131  if (ImGuiID src_dock_id = node_remap_pairs[dock_remap_n])
15132  {
15133  ImGuiID dst_dock_id = node_remap_pairs[dock_remap_n + 1];
15134  ImGuiDockNode* node = DockBuilderGetNode(src_dock_id);
15135  for (int window_n = 0; window_n < node->Windows.Size; window_n++)
15136  {
15137  ImGuiWindow* window = node->Windows[window_n];
15138  if (src_windows.contains(window->ID))
15139  continue;
15140 
15141  // Docked windows gets redocked into the new node hierarchy.
15142  IMGUI_DEBUG_LOG_DOCKING("Remap window '%s' %08X -> %08X\n", window->Name, src_dock_id, dst_dock_id);
15143  DockBuilderDockWindow(window->Name, dst_dock_id);
15144  }
15145  }
15146 }
15147 
15148 void ImGui::DockBuilderFinish(ImGuiID root_id)
15149 {
15150  ImGuiContext* ctx = GImGui;
15151  //DockContextRebuild(ctx);
15152  DockContextBuildAddWindowsToNodes(ctx, root_id);
15153 }
15154 
15155 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
15156 // Docking: Begin/End Support Functions (called from Begin/End)
15157 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
15158 // - GetWindowAlwaysWantOwnTabBar()
15159 // - DockContextBindNodeToWindow()
15160 // - BeginDocked()
15161 // - BeginDockableDragDropSource()
15162 // - BeginDockableDragDropTarget()
15163 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
15164 
15165 bool ImGui::GetWindowAlwaysWantOwnTabBar(ImGuiWindow* window)
15166 {
15167  ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
15168  if (g.IO.ConfigDockingAlwaysTabBar || window->WindowClass.DockingAlwaysTabBar)
15169  if ((window->Flags & (ImGuiWindowFlags_ChildWindow | ImGuiWindowFlags_NoTitleBar | ImGuiWindowFlags_NoDocking)) == 0)
15170  if (!window->IsFallbackWindow) // We don't support AlwaysTabBar on the fallback/implicit window to avoid unused dock-node overhead/noise
15171  return true;
15172  return false;
15173 }
15174 
15175 static ImGuiDockNode* ImGui::DockContextBindNodeToWindow(ImGuiContext* ctx, ImGuiWindow* window)
15176 {
15177  ImGuiContext& g = *ctx;
15178  ImGuiDockNode* node = DockContextFindNodeByID(ctx, window->DockId);
15179  IM_ASSERT(window->DockNode == NULL);
15180 
15181  // We should not be docking into a split node (SetWindowDock should avoid this)
15182  if (node && node->IsSplitNode())
15183  {
15184  DockContextProcessUndockWindow(ctx, window);
15185  return NULL;
15186  }
15187 
15188  // Create node
15189  if (node == NULL)
15190  {
15191  node = DockContextAddNode(ctx, window->DockId);
15192  node->AuthorityForPos = node->AuthorityForSize = node->AuthorityForViewport = ImGuiDataAuthority_Window;
15193  node->LastFrameAlive = g.FrameCount;
15194  }
15195 
15196  // If the node just turned visible and is part of a hierarchy, it doesn't have a Size assigned by DockNodeTreeUpdatePosSize() yet,
15197  // so we're forcing a Pos/Size update from the first ancestor that is already visible (often it will be the root node).
15198  // If we don't do this, the window will be assigned a zero-size on its first frame, which won't ideally warm up the layout.
15199  // This is a little wonky because we don't normally update the Pos/Size of visible node mid-frame.
15200  if (!node->IsVisible)
15201  {
15202  ImGuiDockNode* ancestor_node = node;
15203  while (!ancestor_node->IsVisible)
15204  {
15205  ancestor_node->IsVisible = true;
15206  ancestor_node->MarkedForPosSizeWrite = true;
15207  if (ancestor_node->ParentNode)
15208  ancestor_node = ancestor_node->ParentNode;
15209  }
15210  IM_ASSERT(ancestor_node->Size.x > 0.0f && ancestor_node->Size.y > 0.0f);
15211  DockNodeTreeUpdatePosSize(ancestor_node, ancestor_node->Pos, ancestor_node->Size, true);
15212  }
15213 
15214  // Add window to node
15215  DockNodeAddWindow(node, window, true);
15216  IM_ASSERT(node == window->DockNode);
15217  return node;
15218 }
15219 
15220 void ImGui::BeginDocked(ImGuiWindow* window, bool* p_open)
15221 {
15222  ImGuiContext* ctx = GImGui;
15223  ImGuiContext& g = *ctx;
15224 
15225  const bool auto_dock_node = GetWindowAlwaysWantOwnTabBar(window);
15226  if (auto_dock_node)
15227  {
15228  if (window->DockId == 0)
15229  {
15230  IM_ASSERT(window->DockNode == NULL);
15231  window->DockId = DockContextGenNodeID(ctx);
15232  }
15233  }
15234  else
15235  {
15236  // Calling SetNextWindowPos() undock windows by default (by setting PosUndock)
15237  bool want_undock = false;
15238  want_undock |= (window->Flags & ImGuiWindowFlags_NoDocking) != 0;
15239  want_undock |= (g.NextWindowData.Flags & ImGuiNextWindowDataFlags_HasPos) && (window->SetWindowPosAllowFlags & g.NextWindowData.PosCond) && g.NextWindowData.PosUndock;
15240  if (want_undock)
15241  {
15242  DockContextProcessUndockWindow(ctx, window);
15243  return;
15244  }
15245  }
15246 
15247  // Bind to our dock node
15248  ImGuiDockNode* node = window->DockNode;
15249  if (node != NULL)
15250  IM_ASSERT(window->DockId == node->ID);
15251  if (window->DockId != 0 && node == NULL)
15252  {
15253  node = DockContextBindNodeToWindow(ctx, window);
15254  if (node == NULL)
15255  return;
15256  }
15257 
15258 #if 0
15259  // Undock if the ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoDockingInCentralNode got set
15260  if (node->IsCentralNode && (node->Flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoDockingInCentralNode))
15261  {
15262  DockContextProcessUndockWindow(ctx, window);
15263  return;
15264  }
15265 #endif
15266 
15267  // Undock if our dockspace node disappeared
15268  // Note how we are testing for LastFrameAlive and NOT LastFrameActive. A DockSpace node can be maintained alive while being inactive with ImGuiDockNodeFlags_KeepAliveOnly.
15269  if (node->LastFrameAlive < g.FrameCount)
15270  {
15271  // If the window has been orphaned, transition the docknode to an implicit node processed in DockContextNewFrameUpdateDocking()
15272  ImGuiDockNode* root_node = DockNodeGetRootNode(node);
15273  if (root_node->LastFrameAlive < g.FrameCount)
15274  {
15275  DockContextProcessUndockWindow(ctx, window);
15276  }
15277  else
15278  {
15279  window->DockIsActive = true;
15280  window->DockTabIsVisible = false;
15281  }
15282  return;
15283  }
15284 
15285  // Store style overrides
15286  for (int color_n = 0; color_n < ImGuiWindowDockStyleCol_COUNT; color_n++)
15287  window->DockStyle.Colors[color_n] = ColorConvertFloat4ToU32(g.Style.Colors[GWindowDockStyleColors[color_n]]);
15288 
15289  // Fast path return. It is common for windows to hold on a persistent DockId but be the only visible window,
15290  // and never create neither a host window neither a tab bar.
15291  // FIXME-DOCK: replace ->HostWindow NULL compare with something more explicit (~was initially intended as a first frame test)
15292  if (node->HostWindow == NULL)
15293  {
15294  window->DockIsActive = (node->State == ImGuiDockNodeState_HostWindowHiddenBecauseWindowsAreResizing);
15295  window->DockTabIsVisible = false;
15296  return;
15297  }
15298 
15299  // We can have zero-sized nodes (e.g. children of a small-size dockspace)
15300  IM_ASSERT(node->HostWindow);
15301  IM_ASSERT(node->IsLeafNode());
15302  IM_ASSERT(node->Size.x >= 0.0f && node->Size.y >= 0.0f);
15303  node->State = ImGuiDockNodeState_HostWindowVisible;
15304 
15305  // Undock if we are submitted earlier than the host window
15306  if (window->BeginOrderWithinContext < node->HostWindow->BeginOrderWithinContext)
15307  {
15308  DockContextProcessUndockWindow(ctx, window);
15309  return;
15310  }
15311 
15312  // Position/Size window
15313  SetNextWindowPos(node->Pos);
15314  SetNextWindowSize(node->Size);
15315  g.NextWindowData.PosUndock = false; // Cancel implicit undocking of SetNextWindowPos()
15316  window->DockIsActive = true;
15317  window->DockTabIsVisible = false;
15318  if (node->SharedFlags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_KeepAliveOnly)
15319  return;
15320 
15321  // When the window is selected we mark it as visible.
15322  if (node->VisibleWindow == window)
15323  window->DockTabIsVisible = true;
15324 
15325  // Update window flag
15326  IM_ASSERT((window->Flags & ImGuiWindowFlags_ChildWindow) == 0);
15327  window->Flags |= ImGuiWindowFlags_ChildWindow | ImGuiWindowFlags_AlwaysUseWindowPadding | ImGuiWindowFlags_NoResize;
15328  if (node->IsHiddenTabBar() || node->IsNoTabBar())
15329  window->Flags |= ImGuiWindowFlags_NoTitleBar;
15330  else
15331  window->Flags &= ~ImGuiWindowFlags_NoTitleBar; // Clear the NoTitleBar flag in case the user set it: confusingly enough we need a title bar height so we are correctly offset, but it won't be displayed!
15332 
15333  // Save new dock order only if the tab bar has been visible once.
15334  // This allows multiple windows to be created in the same frame and have their respective dock orders preserved.
15335  if (node->TabBar && node->TabBar->CurrFrameVisible != -1)
15336  window->DockOrder = (short)DockNodeGetTabOrder(window);
15337 
15338  if ((node->WantCloseAll || node->WantCloseTabId == window->ID) && p_open != NULL)
15339  *p_open = false;
15340 
15341  // Update ChildId to allow returning from Child to Parent with Escape
15342  ImGuiWindow* parent_window = window->DockNode->HostWindow;
15343  window->ChildId = parent_window->GetID(window->Name);
15344 }
15345 
15346 void ImGui::BeginDockableDragDropSource(ImGuiWindow* window)
15347 {
15348  ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
15349  IM_ASSERT(g.ActiveId == window->MoveId);
15350  IM_ASSERT(g.MovingWindow == window);
15351 
15352  window->DC.LastItemId = window->MoveId;
15353  window = window->RootWindow;
15354  IM_ASSERT((window->Flags & ImGuiWindowFlags_NoDocking) == 0);
15355  bool is_drag_docking = (g.IO.ConfigDockingWithShift) || ImRect(0, 0, window->SizeFull.x, GetFrameHeight()).Contains(g.ActiveIdClickOffset);
15356  if (is_drag_docking && BeginDragDropSource(ImGuiDragDropFlags_SourceNoPreviewTooltip | ImGuiDragDropFlags_SourceNoHoldToOpenOthers | ImGuiDragDropFlags_SourceAutoExpirePayload))
15357  {
15358  SetDragDropPayload(IMGUI_PAYLOAD_TYPE_WINDOW, &window, sizeof(window));
15359  EndDragDropSource();
15360 
15361  // Store style overrides
15362  for (int color_n = 0; color_n < ImGuiWindowDockStyleCol_COUNT; color_n++)
15363  window->DockStyle.Colors[color_n] = ColorConvertFloat4ToU32(g.Style.Colors[GWindowDockStyleColors[color_n]]);
15364  }
15365 }
15366 
15367 void ImGui::BeginDockableDragDropTarget(ImGuiWindow* window)
15368 {
15369  ImGuiContext* ctx = GImGui;
15370  ImGuiContext& g = *ctx;
15371 
15372  //IM_ASSERT(window->RootWindow == window); // May also be a DockSpace
15373  IM_ASSERT((window->Flags & ImGuiWindowFlags_NoDocking) == 0);
15374  if (!g.DragDropActive)
15375  return;
15376  //GetForegroundDrawList(window)->AddRect(window->Pos, window->Pos + window->Size, IM_COL32(255, 255, 0, 255));
15377  if (!BeginDragDropTargetCustom(window->Rect(), window->ID))
15378  return;
15379 
15380  // Peek into the payload before calling AcceptDragDropPayload() so we can handle overlapping dock nodes with filtering
15381  // (this is a little unusual pattern, normally most code would call AcceptDragDropPayload directly)
15382  const ImGuiPayload* payload = &g.DragDropPayload;
15383  if (!payload->IsDataType(IMGUI_PAYLOAD_TYPE_WINDOW) || !DockNodeIsDropAllowed(window, *(ImGuiWindow**)payload->Data))
15384  {
15385  EndDragDropTarget();
15386  return;
15387  }
15388 
15389  ImGuiWindow* payload_window = *(ImGuiWindow**)payload->Data;
15390  if (AcceptDragDropPayload(IMGUI_PAYLOAD_TYPE_WINDOW, ImGuiDragDropFlags_AcceptBeforeDelivery | ImGuiDragDropFlags_AcceptNoDrawDefaultRect))
15391  {
15392  // Select target node
15393  // (Important: we cannot use g.HoveredDockNode here! Because each of our target node have filters based on payload, each candidate drop target will do its own evaluation)
15394  bool dock_into_floating_window = false;
15395  ImGuiDockNode* node = NULL;
15396  if (window->DockNodeAsHost)
15397  {
15398  // Cannot assume that node will != NULL even though we passed the rectangle test: it depends on padding/spacing handled by DockNodeTreeFindVisibleNodeByPos().
15399  node = DockNodeTreeFindVisibleNodeByPos(window->DockNodeAsHost, g.IO.MousePos);
15400 
15401  // There is an edge case when docking into a dockspace which only has _inactive_ nodes (because none of the windows are active)
15402  // In this case we need to fallback into any leaf mode, possibly the central node.
15403  // FIXME-20181220: We should not have to test for IsLeafNode() here but we have another bug to fix first.
15404  if (node && node->IsDockSpace() && node->IsRootNode())
15405  node = (node->CentralNode && node->IsLeafNode()) ? node->CentralNode : DockNodeTreeFindFallbackLeafNode(node);
15406  }
15407  else
15408  {
15409  if (window->DockNode)
15410  node = window->DockNode;
15411  else
15412  dock_into_floating_window = true; // Dock into a regular window
15413  }
15414 
15415  const ImRect explicit_target_rect = (node && node->TabBar && !node->IsHiddenTabBar() && !node->IsNoTabBar()) ? node->TabBar->BarRect : ImRect(window->Pos, window->Pos + ImVec2(window->Size.x, GetFrameHeight()));
15416  const bool is_explicit_target = g.IO.ConfigDockingWithShift || IsMouseHoveringRect(explicit_target_rect.Min, explicit_target_rect.Max);
15417 
15418  // Preview docking request and find out split direction/ratio
15419  //const bool do_preview = true; // Ignore testing for payload->IsPreview() which removes one frame of delay, but breaks overlapping drop targets within the same window.
15420  const bool do_preview = payload->IsPreview() || payload->IsDelivery();
15421  if (do_preview && (node != NULL || dock_into_floating_window))
15422  {
15423  ImGuiDockPreviewData split_inner;
15424  ImGuiDockPreviewData split_outer;
15425  ImGuiDockPreviewData* split_data = &split_inner;
15426  if (node && (node->ParentNode || node->IsCentralNode()))
15427  if (ImGuiDockNode* root_node = DockNodeGetRootNode(node))
15428  {
15429  DockNodePreviewDockSetup(window, root_node, payload_window, &split_outer, is_explicit_target, true);
15430  if (split_outer.IsSplitDirExplicit)
15431  split_data = &split_outer;
15432  }
15433  DockNodePreviewDockSetup(window, node, payload_window, &split_inner, is_explicit_target, false);
15434  if (split_data == &split_outer)
15435  split_inner.IsDropAllowed = false;
15436 
15437  // Draw inner then outer, so that previewed tab (in inner data) will be behind the outer drop boxes
15438  DockNodePreviewDockRender(window, node, payload_window, &split_inner);
15439  DockNodePreviewDockRender(window, node, payload_window, &split_outer);
15440 
15441  // Queue docking request
15442  if (split_data->IsDropAllowed && payload->IsDelivery())
15443  DockContextQueueDock(ctx, window, split_data->SplitNode, payload_window, split_data->SplitDir, split_data->SplitRatio, split_data == &split_outer);
15444  }
15445  }
15446  EndDragDropTarget();
15447 }
15448 
15449 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
15450 // Docking: Settings
15451 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
15452 // - DockSettingsRenameNodeReferences()
15453 // - DockSettingsRemoveNodeReferences()
15454 // - DockSettingsFindNodeSettings()
15455 // - DockSettingsHandler_ApplyAll()
15456 // - DockSettingsHandler_ReadOpen()
15457 // - DockSettingsHandler_ReadLine()
15458 // - DockSettingsHandler_DockNodeToSettings()
15459 // - DockSettingsHandler_WriteAll()
15460 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
15461 
15462 static void ImGui::DockSettingsRenameNodeReferences(ImGuiID old_node_id, ImGuiID new_node_id)
15463 {
15464  ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
15465  IMGUI_DEBUG_LOG_DOCKING("DockSettingsRenameNodeReferences: from 0x%08X -> to 0x%08X\n", old_node_id, new_node_id);
15466  for (int window_n = 0; window_n < g.Windows.Size; window_n++)
15467  {
15468  ImGuiWindow* window = g.Windows[window_n];
15469  if (window->DockId == old_node_id && window->DockNode == NULL)
15470  window->DockId = new_node_id;
15471  }
15473  for (ImGuiWindowSettings* settings = g.SettingsWindows.begin(); settings != NULL; settings = g.SettingsWindows.next_chunk(settings))
15474  if (settings->DockId == old_node_id)
15475  settings->DockId = new_node_id;
15476 }
15477 
15478 // Remove references stored in ImGuiWindowSettings to the given ImGuiDockNodeSettings
15479 static void ImGui::DockSettingsRemoveNodeReferences(ImGuiID* node_ids, int node_ids_count)
15480 {
15481  ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
15482  int found = 0;
15484  for (ImGuiWindowSettings* settings = g.SettingsWindows.begin(); settings != NULL; settings = g.SettingsWindows.next_chunk(settings))
15485  for (int node_n = 0; node_n < node_ids_count; node_n++)
15486  if (settings->DockId == node_ids[node_n])
15487  {
15488  settings->DockId = 0;
15489  settings->DockOrder = -1;
15490  if (++found < node_ids_count)
15491  break;
15492  return;
15493  }
15494 }
15495 
15496 static ImGuiDockNodeSettings* ImGui::DockSettingsFindNodeSettings(ImGuiContext* ctx, ImGuiID id)
15497 {
15498  // FIXME-OPT
15499  ImGuiDockContext* dc = &ctx->DockContext;
15500  for (int n = 0; n < dc->NodesSettings.Size; n++)
15501  if (dc->NodesSettings[n].ID == id)
15502  return &dc->NodesSettings[n];
15503  return NULL;
15504 }
15505 
15506 // Clear settings data
15507 static void ImGui::DockSettingsHandler_ClearAll(ImGuiContext* ctx, ImGuiSettingsHandler*)
15508 {
15509  ImGuiDockContext* dc = &ctx->DockContext;
15510  dc->NodesSettings.clear();
15511  DockContextClearNodes(ctx, 0, true);
15512 }
15513 
15514 // Recreate nodes based on settings data
15515 static void ImGui::DockSettingsHandler_ApplyAll(ImGuiContext* ctx, ImGuiSettingsHandler*)
15516 {
15517  // Prune settings at boot time only
15518  ImGuiDockContext* dc = &ctx->DockContext;
15519  if (ctx->Windows.Size == 0)
15520  DockContextPruneUnusedSettingsNodes(ctx);
15521  DockContextBuildNodesFromSettings(ctx, dc->NodesSettings.Data, dc->NodesSettings.Size);
15522  DockContextBuildAddWindowsToNodes(ctx, 0);
15523 }
15524 
15525 static void* ImGui::DockSettingsHandler_ReadOpen(ImGuiContext*, ImGuiSettingsHandler*, const char* name)
15526 {
15527  if (strcmp(name, "Data") != 0)
15528  return NULL;
15529  return (void*)1;
15530 }
15531 
15532 static void ImGui::DockSettingsHandler_ReadLine(ImGuiContext* ctx, ImGuiSettingsHandler*, void*, const char* line)
15533 {
15534  char c = 0;
15535  int x = 0, y = 0;
15536  int r = 0;
15537 
15538  // Parsing, e.g.
15539  // " DockNode ID=0x00000001 Pos=383,193 Size=201,322 Split=Y,0.506 "
15540  // " DockNode ID=0x00000002 Parent=0x00000001 "
15541  // Important: this code expect currently fields in a fixed order.
15542  ImGuiDockNodeSettings node;
15543  line = ImStrSkipBlank(line);
15544  if (strncmp(line, "DockNode", 8) == 0) { line = ImStrSkipBlank(line + strlen("DockNode")); }
15545  else if (strncmp(line, "DockSpace", 9) == 0) { line = ImStrSkipBlank(line + strlen("DockSpace")); node.Flags |= ImGuiDockNodeFlags_DockSpace; }
15546  else return;
15547  if (sscanf(line, "ID=0x%08X%n", &node.ID, &r) == 1) { line += r; } else return;
15548  if (sscanf(line, " Parent=0x%08X%n", &node.ParentNodeId, &r) == 1) { line += r; if (node.ParentNodeId == 0) return; }
15549  if (sscanf(line, " Window=0x%08X%n", &node.ParentWindowId, &r) ==1) { line += r; if (node.ParentWindowId == 0) return; }
15550  if (node.ParentNodeId == 0)
15551  {
15552  if (sscanf(line, " Pos=%i,%i%n", &x, &y, &r) == 2) { line += r; node.Pos = ImVec2ih((short)x, (short)y); } else return;
15553  if (sscanf(line, " Size=%i,%i%n", &x, &y, &r) == 2) { line += r; node.Size = ImVec2ih((short)x, (short)y); } else return;
15554  }
15555  else
15556  {
15557  if (sscanf(line, " SizeRef=%i,%i%n", &x, &y, &r) == 2) { line += r; node.SizeRef = ImVec2ih((short)x, (short)y); }
15558  }
15559  if (sscanf(line, " Split=%c%n", &c, &r) == 1) { line += r; if (c == 'X') node.SplitAxis = ImGuiAxis_X; else if (c == 'Y') node.SplitAxis = ImGuiAxis_Y; }
15560  if (sscanf(line, " NoResize=%d%n", &x, &r) == 1) { line += r; if (x != 0) node.Flags |= ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoResize; }
15561  if (sscanf(line, " CentralNode=%d%n", &x, &r) == 1) { line += r; if (x != 0) node.Flags |= ImGuiDockNodeFlags_CentralNode; }
15562  if (sscanf(line, " NoTabBar=%d%n", &x, &r) == 1) { line += r; if (x != 0) node.Flags |= ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoTabBar; }
15563  if (sscanf(line, " HiddenTabBar=%d%n", &x, &r) == 1) { line += r; if (x != 0) node.Flags |= ImGuiDockNodeFlags_HiddenTabBar; }
15564  if (sscanf(line, " NoWindowMenuButton=%d%n", &x, &r) == 1) { line += r; if (x != 0) node.Flags |= ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoWindowMenuButton; }
15565  if (sscanf(line, " NoCloseButton=%d%n", &x, &r) == 1) { line += r; if (x != 0) node.Flags |= ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoCloseButton; }
15566  if (sscanf(line, " Selected=0x%08X%n", &node.SelectedWindowId,&r) == 1) { line += r; }
15567  if (node.ParentNodeId != 0)
15568  if (ImGuiDockNodeSettings* parent_settings = DockSettingsFindNodeSettings(ctx, node.ParentNodeId))
15569  node.Depth = parent_settings->Depth + 1;
15570  ctx->DockContext.NodesSettings.push_back(node);
15571 }
15572 
15573 static void DockSettingsHandler_DockNodeToSettings(ImGuiDockContext* dc, ImGuiDockNode* node, int depth)
15574 {
15575  ImGuiDockNodeSettings node_settings;
15576  IM_ASSERT(depth < (1 << (sizeof(node_settings.Depth) << 3)));
15577  node_settings.ID = node->ID;
15578  node_settings.ParentNodeId = node->ParentNode ? node->ParentNode->ID : 0;
15579  node_settings.ParentWindowId = (node->IsDockSpace() && node->HostWindow && node->HostWindow->ParentWindow) ? node->HostWindow->ParentWindow->ID : 0;
15580  node_settings.SelectedWindowId = node->SelectedTabId;
15581  node_settings.SplitAxis = (signed char)(node->IsSplitNode() ? node->SplitAxis : ImGuiAxis_None);
15582  node_settings.Depth = (char)depth;
15583  node_settings.Flags = (node->LocalFlags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_SavedFlagsMask_);
15584  node_settings.Pos = ImVec2ih(node->Pos);
15585  node_settings.Size = ImVec2ih(node->Size);
15586  node_settings.SizeRef = ImVec2ih(node->SizeRef);
15587  dc->NodesSettings.push_back(node_settings);
15588  if (node->ChildNodes[0])
15589  DockSettingsHandler_DockNodeToSettings(dc, node->ChildNodes[0], depth + 1);
15590  if (node->ChildNodes[1])
15591  DockSettingsHandler_DockNodeToSettings(dc, node->ChildNodes[1], depth + 1);
15592 }
15593 
15594 static void ImGui::DockSettingsHandler_WriteAll(ImGuiContext* ctx, ImGuiSettingsHandler* handler, ImGuiTextBuffer* buf)
15595 {
15596  ImGuiContext& g = *ctx;
15597  ImGuiDockContext* dc = &ctx->DockContext;
15598  if (!(g.IO.ConfigFlags & ImGuiConfigFlags_DockingEnable))
15599  return;
15600 
15601  // Gather settings data
15602  // (unlike our windows settings, because nodes are always built we can do a full rewrite of the SettingsNode buffer)
15603  dc->NodesSettings.resize(0);
15604  dc->NodesSettings.reserve(dc->Nodes.Data.Size);
15605  for (int n = 0; n < dc->Nodes.Data.Size; n++)
15606  if (ImGuiDockNode* node = (ImGuiDockNode*)dc->Nodes.Data[n].val_p)
15607  if (node->IsRootNode())
15608  DockSettingsHandler_DockNodeToSettings(dc, node, 0);
15609 
15610  int max_depth = 0;
15611  for (int node_n = 0; node_n < dc->NodesSettings.Size; node_n++)
15612  max_depth = ImMax((int)dc->NodesSettings[node_n].Depth, max_depth);
15613 
15614  // Write to text buffer
15615  buf->appendf("[%s][Data]\n", handler->TypeName);
15616  for (int node_n = 0; node_n < dc->NodesSettings.Size; node_n++)
15617  {
15618  const int line_start_pos = buf->size(); (void)line_start_pos;
15619  const ImGuiDockNodeSettings* node_settings = &dc->NodesSettings[node_n];
15620  buf->appendf("%*s%s%*s", node_settings->Depth * 2, "", (node_settings->Flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_DockSpace) ? "DockSpace" : "DockNode ", (max_depth - node_settings->Depth) * 2, ""); // Text align nodes to facilitate looking at .ini file
15621  buf->appendf(" ID=0x%08X", node_settings->ID);
15622  if (node_settings->ParentNodeId)
15623  {
15624  buf->appendf(" Parent=0x%08X SizeRef=%d,%d", node_settings->ParentNodeId, node_settings->SizeRef.x, node_settings->SizeRef.y);
15625  }
15626  else
15627  {
15628  if (node_settings->ParentWindowId)
15629  buf->appendf(" Window=0x%08X", node_settings->ParentWindowId);
15630  buf->appendf(" Pos=%d,%d Size=%d,%d", node_settings->Pos.x, node_settings->Pos.y, node_settings->Size.x, node_settings->Size.y);
15631  }
15632  if (node_settings->SplitAxis != ImGuiAxis_None)
15633  buf->appendf(" Split=%c", (node_settings->SplitAxis == ImGuiAxis_X) ? 'X' : 'Y');
15634  if (node_settings->Flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoResize)
15635  buf->appendf(" NoResize=1");
15636  if (node_settings->Flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_CentralNode)
15637  buf->appendf(" CentralNode=1");
15638  if (node_settings->Flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoTabBar)
15639  buf->appendf(" NoTabBar=1");
15640  if (node_settings->Flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_HiddenTabBar)
15641  buf->appendf(" HiddenTabBar=1");
15642  if (node_settings->Flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoWindowMenuButton)
15643  buf->appendf(" NoWindowMenuButton=1");
15644  if (node_settings->Flags & ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoCloseButton)
15645  buf->appendf(" NoCloseButton=1");
15646  if (node_settings->SelectedWindowId)
15647  buf->appendf(" Selected=0x%08X", node_settings->SelectedWindowId);
15648 
15649 #if IMGUI_DEBUG_INI_SETTINGS
15650  // [DEBUG] Include comments in the .ini file to ease debugging
15651  if (ImGuiDockNode* node = DockContextFindNodeByID(ctx, node_settings->ID))
15652  {
15653  buf->appendf("%*s", ImMax(2, (line_start_pos + 92) - buf->size()), ""); // Align everything
15654  if (node->IsDockSpace() && node->HostWindow && node->HostWindow->ParentWindow)
15655  buf->appendf(" ; in '%s'", node->HostWindow->ParentWindow->Name);
15656  // Iterate settings so we can give info about windows that didn't exist during the session.
15657  int contains_window = 0;
15658  for (ImGuiWindowSettings* settings = g.SettingsWindows.begin(); settings != NULL; settings = g.SettingsWindows.next_chunk(settings))
15659  if (settings->DockId == node_settings->ID)
15660  {
15661  if (contains_window++ == 0)
15662  buf->appendf(" ; contains ");
15663  buf->appendf("'%s' ", settings->GetName());
15664  }
15665  }
15666 #endif
15667  buf->appendf("\n");
15668  }
15669  buf->appendf("\n");
15670 }
15671 
15672 
15673 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
15674 // [SECTION] PLATFORM DEPENDENT HELPERS
15675 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
15676 
15677 #if defined(_WIN32) && !defined(IMGUI_DISABLE_WIN32_FUNCTIONS) && !defined(IMGUI_DISABLE_WIN32_DEFAULT_CLIPBOARD_FUNCTIONS)
15678 
15679 #ifdef _MSC_VER
15680 #pragma comment(lib, "user32")
15681 #pragma comment(lib, "kernel32")
15682 #endif
15683 
15684 // Win32 clipboard implementation
15685 // We use g.ClipboardHandlerData for temporary storage to ensure it is freed on Shutdown()
15686 static const char* GetClipboardTextFn_DefaultImpl(void*)
15687 {
15688  ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
15689  g.ClipboardHandlerData.clear();
15690  if (!::OpenClipboard(NULL))
15691  return NULL;
15692  HANDLE wbuf_handle = ::GetClipboardData(CF_UNICODETEXT);
15693  if (wbuf_handle == NULL)
15694  {
15695  ::CloseClipboard();
15696  return NULL;
15697  }
15698  if (const WCHAR* wbuf_global = (const WCHAR*)::GlobalLock(wbuf_handle))
15699  {
15700  int buf_len = ::WideCharToMultiByte(CP_UTF8, 0, wbuf_global, -1, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL);
15701  g.ClipboardHandlerData.resize(buf_len);
15702  ::WideCharToMultiByte(CP_UTF8, 0, wbuf_global, -1, g.ClipboardHandlerData.Data, buf_len, NULL, NULL);
15703  }
15704  ::GlobalUnlock(wbuf_handle);
15705  ::CloseClipboard();
15706  return g.ClipboardHandlerData.Data;
15707 }
15708 
15709 static void SetClipboardTextFn_DefaultImpl(void*, const char* text)
15710 {
15711  if (!::OpenClipboard(NULL))
15712  return;
15713  const int wbuf_length = ::MultiByteToWideChar(CP_UTF8, 0, text, -1, NULL, 0);
15714  HGLOBAL wbuf_handle = ::GlobalAlloc(GMEM_MOVEABLE, (SIZE_T)wbuf_length * sizeof(WCHAR));
15715  if (wbuf_handle == NULL)
15716  {
15717  ::CloseClipboard();
15718  return;
15719  }
15720  WCHAR* wbuf_global = (WCHAR*)::GlobalLock(wbuf_handle);
15721  ::MultiByteToWideChar(CP_UTF8, 0, text, -1, wbuf_global, wbuf_length);
15722  ::GlobalUnlock(wbuf_handle);
15723  ::EmptyClipboard();
15724  if (::SetClipboardData(CF_UNICODETEXT, wbuf_handle) == NULL)
15725  ::GlobalFree(wbuf_handle);
15726  ::CloseClipboard();
15727 }
15728 
15729 #elif defined(__APPLE__) && TARGET_OS_OSX && defined(IMGUI_ENABLE_OSX_DEFAULT_CLIPBOARD_FUNCTIONS)
15730 
15731 #include <Carbon/Carbon.h> // Use old API to avoid need for separate .mm file
15732 static PasteboardRef main_clipboard = 0;
15733 
15734 // OSX clipboard implementation
15735 // If you enable this you will need to add '-framework ApplicationServices' to your linker command-line!
15736 static void SetClipboardTextFn_DefaultImpl(void*, const char* text)
15737 {
15738  if (!main_clipboard)
15739  PasteboardCreate(kPasteboardClipboard, &main_clipboard);
15740  PasteboardClear(main_clipboard);
15741  CFDataRef cf_data = CFDataCreate(kCFAllocatorDefault, (const UInt8*)text, strlen(text));
15742  if (cf_data)
15743  {
15744  PasteboardPutItemFlavor(main_clipboard, (PasteboardItemID)1, CFSTR("public.utf8-plain-text"), cf_data, 0);
15745  CFRelease(cf_data);
15746  }
15747 }
15748 
15749 static const char* GetClipboardTextFn_DefaultImpl(void*)
15750 {
15751  if (!main_clipboard)
15752  PasteboardCreate(kPasteboardClipboard, &main_clipboard);
15753  PasteboardSynchronize(main_clipboard);
15754 
15755  ItemCount item_count = 0;
15756  PasteboardGetItemCount(main_clipboard, &item_count);
15757  for (ItemCount i = 0; i < item_count; i++)
15758  {
15759  PasteboardItemID item_id = 0;
15760  PasteboardGetItemIdentifier(main_clipboard, i + 1, &item_id);
15761  CFArrayRef flavor_type_array = 0;
15762  PasteboardCopyItemFlavors(main_clipboard, item_id, &flavor_type_array);
15763  for (CFIndex j = 0, nj = CFArrayGetCount(flavor_type_array); j < nj; j++)
15764  {
15765  CFDataRef cf_data;
15766  if (PasteboardCopyItemFlavorData(main_clipboard, item_id, CFSTR("public.utf8-plain-text"), &cf_data) == noErr)
15767  {
15768  ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
15769  g.ClipboardHandlerData.clear();
15770  int length = (int)CFDataGetLength(cf_data);
15771  g.ClipboardHandlerData.resize(length + 1);
15772  CFDataGetBytes(cf_data, CFRangeMake(0, length), (UInt8*)g.ClipboardHandlerData.Data);
15773  g.ClipboardHandlerData[length] = 0;
15774  CFRelease(cf_data);
15775  return g.ClipboardHandlerData.Data;
15776  }
15777  }
15778  }
15779  return NULL;
15780 }
15781 
15782 #else
15783 
15784 // Local Dear ImGui-only clipboard implementation, if user hasn't defined better clipboard handlers.
15785 static const char* GetClipboardTextFn_DefaultImpl(void*)
15786 {
15787  ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
15788  return g.ClipboardHandlerData.empty() ? NULL : g.ClipboardHandlerData.begin();
15789 }
15790 
15791 static void SetClipboardTextFn_DefaultImpl(void*, const char* text)
15792 {
15793  ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
15794  g.ClipboardHandlerData.clear();
15795  const char* text_end = text + strlen(text);
15796  g.ClipboardHandlerData.resize((int)(text_end - text) + 1);
15797  memcpy(&g.ClipboardHandlerData[0], text, (size_t)(text_end - text));
15798  g.ClipboardHandlerData[(int)(text_end - text)] = 0;
15799 }
15800 
15801 #endif
15802 
15803 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
15804 // [SECTION] METRICS/DEBUGGER WINDOW
15805 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
15806 // - RenderViewportThumbnail() [Internal]
15807 // - RenderViewportsThumbnails() [Internal]
15808 // - MetricsHelpMarker() [Internal]
15809 // - ShowMetricsWindow()
15810 // - DebugNodeColumns() [Internal]
15811 // - DebugNodeDockNode() [Internal]
15812 // - DebugNodeDrawList() [Internal]
15813 // - DebugNodeDrawCmdShowMeshAndBoundingBox() [Internal]
15814 // - DebugNodeStorage() [Internal]
15815 // - DebugNodeTabBar() [Internal]
15816 // - DebugNodeViewport() [Internal]
15817 // - DebugNodeWindow() [Internal]
15818 // - DebugNodeWindowSettings() [Internal]
15819 // - DebugNodeWindowsList() [Internal]
15820 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
15821 
15822 #ifndef IMGUI_DISABLE_METRICS_WINDOW
15823 
15824 void ImGui::DebugRenderViewportThumbnail(ImDrawList* draw_list, ImGuiViewportP* viewport, const ImRect& bb)
15825 {
15826  ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
15827  ImGuiWindow* window = g.CurrentWindow;
15828 
15829  ImVec2 scale = bb.GetSize() / viewport->Size;
15830  ImVec2 off = bb.Min - viewport->Pos * scale;
15831  float alpha_mul = (viewport->Flags & ImGuiViewportFlags_Minimized) ? 0.30f : 1.00f;
15832  window->DrawList->AddRectFilled(bb.Min, bb.Max, ImGui::GetColorU32(ImGuiCol_Border, alpha_mul * 0.40f));
15833  for (int i = 0; i != g.Windows.Size; i++)
15834  {
15835  ImGuiWindow* thumb_window = g.Windows[i];
15836  if (!thumb_window->WasActive || (thumb_window->Flags & ImGuiWindowFlags_ChildWindow))
15837  continue;
15838  if (thumb_window->Viewport != viewport)
15839  continue;
15840 
15841  ImRect thumb_r = thumb_window->Rect();
15842  ImRect title_r = thumb_window->TitleBarRect();
15843  thumb_r = ImRect(ImFloor(off + thumb_r.Min * scale), ImFloor(off + thumb_r.Max * scale));
15844  title_r = ImRect(ImFloor(off + title_r.Min * scale), ImFloor(off + ImVec2(title_r.Max.x, title_r.Min.y) * scale) + ImVec2(0,5)); // Exaggerate title bar height
15845  thumb_r.ClipWithFull(bb);
15846  title_r.ClipWithFull(bb);
15847  const bool window_is_focused = (g.NavWindow && thumb_window->RootWindowForTitleBarHighlight == g.NavWindow->RootWindowForTitleBarHighlight);
15848  window->DrawList->AddRectFilled(thumb_r.Min, thumb_r.Max, GetColorU32(ImGuiCol_WindowBg, alpha_mul));
15849  window->DrawList->AddRectFilled(title_r.Min, title_r.Max, GetColorU32(window_is_focused ? ImGuiCol_TitleBgActive : ImGuiCol_TitleBg, alpha_mul));
15850  window->DrawList->AddRect(thumb_r.Min, thumb_r.Max, GetColorU32(ImGuiCol_Border, alpha_mul));
15851  window->DrawList->AddText(g.Font, g.FontSize * 1.0f, title_r.Min, GetColorU32(ImGuiCol_Text, alpha_mul), thumb_window->Name, FindRenderedTextEnd(thumb_window->Name));
15852  }
15853  draw_list->AddRect(bb.Min, bb.Max, GetColorU32(ImGuiCol_Border, alpha_mul));
15854 }
15855 
15856 static void RenderViewportsThumbnails()
15857 {
15858  ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
15859  ImGuiWindow* window = g.CurrentWindow;
15860 
15861  // We don't display full monitor bounds (we could, but it often looks awkward), instead we display just enough to cover all of our viewports.
15862  float SCALE = 1.0f / 8.0f;
15863  ImRect bb_full(FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX, -FLT_MAX, -FLT_MAX);
15864  for (int n = 0; n < g.Viewports.Size; n++)
15865  bb_full.Add(g.Viewports[n]->GetMainRect());
15866  ImVec2 p = window->DC.CursorPos;
15867  ImVec2 off = p - bb_full.Min * SCALE;
15868  for (int n = 0; n < g.Viewports.Size; n++)
15869  {
15870  ImGuiViewportP* viewport = g.Viewports[n];
15871  ImRect viewport_draw_bb(off + (viewport->Pos) * SCALE, off + (viewport->Pos + viewport->Size) * SCALE);
15872  ImGui::DebugRenderViewportThumbnail(window->DrawList, viewport, viewport_draw_bb);
15873  }
15874  ImGui::Dummy(bb_full.GetSize() * SCALE);
15875 }
15876 
15877 static int IMGUI_CDECL ViewportComparerByFrontMostStampCount(const void* lhs, const void* rhs)
15878 {
15879  const ImGuiViewportP* a = *(const ImGuiViewportP* const *)lhs;
15880  const ImGuiViewportP* b = *(const ImGuiViewportP* const *)rhs;
15881  return b->LastFrontMostStampCount - a->LastFrontMostStampCount;
15882 }
15883 
15884 // Avoid naming collision with imgui_demo.cpp's HelpMarker() for unity builds.
15885 static void MetricsHelpMarker(const char* desc)
15886 {
15887  ImGui::TextDisabled("(?)");
15888  if (ImGui::IsItemHovered())
15889  {
15890  ImGui::BeginTooltip();
15891  ImGui::PushTextWrapPos(ImGui::GetFontSize() * 35.0f);
15892  ImGui::TextUnformatted(desc);
15893  ImGui::PopTextWrapPos();
15894  ImGui::EndTooltip();
15895  }
15896 }
15897 
15898 void ImGui::ShowMetricsWindow(bool* p_open)
15899 {
15900  if (!Begin("Dear ImGui Metrics/Debugger", p_open))
15901  {
15902  End();
15903  return;
15904  }
15905 
15906  ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
15907  ImGuiIO& io = g.IO;
15908  ImGuiMetricsConfig* cfg = &g.DebugMetricsConfig;
15909 
15910  // Basic info
15911  Text("Dear ImGui %s", GetVersion());
15912  Text("Application average %.3f ms/frame (%.1f FPS)", 1000.0f / io.Framerate, io.Framerate);
15913  Text("%d vertices, %d indices (%d triangles)", io.MetricsRenderVertices, io.MetricsRenderIndices, io.MetricsRenderIndices / 3);
15914  Text("%d active windows (%d visible)", io.MetricsActiveWindows, io.MetricsRenderWindows);
15915  Text("%d active allocations", io.MetricsActiveAllocations);
15916  //SameLine(); if (SmallButton("GC")) { g.GcCompactAll = true; }
15917 
15918  Separator();
15919 
15920  // Debugging enums
15921  enum { WRT_OuterRect, WRT_OuterRectClipped, WRT_InnerRect, WRT_InnerClipRect, WRT_WorkRect, WRT_Content, WRT_ContentIdeal, WRT_ContentRegionRect, WRT_Count }; // Windows Rect Type
15922  const char* wrt_rects_names[WRT_Count] = { "OuterRect", "OuterRectClipped", "InnerRect", "InnerClipRect", "WorkRect", "Content", "ContentIdeal", "ContentRegionRect" };
15923  enum { TRT_OuterRect, TRT_InnerRect, TRT_WorkRect, TRT_HostClipRect, TRT_InnerClipRect, TRT_BackgroundClipRect, TRT_ColumnsRect, TRT_ColumnsWorkRect, TRT_ColumnsClipRect, TRT_ColumnsContentHeadersUsed, TRT_ColumnsContentHeadersIdeal, TRT_ColumnsContentFrozen, TRT_ColumnsContentUnfrozen, TRT_Count }; // Tables Rect Type
15924  const char* trt_rects_names[TRT_Count] = { "OuterRect", "InnerRect", "WorkRect", "HostClipRect", "InnerClipRect", "BackgroundClipRect", "ColumnsRect", "ColumnsWorkRect", "ColumnsClipRect", "ColumnsContentHeadersUsed", "ColumnsContentHeadersIdeal", "ColumnsContentFrozen", "ColumnsContentUnfrozen" };
15925  if (cfg->ShowWindowsRectsType < 0)
15926  cfg->ShowWindowsRectsType = WRT_WorkRect;
15927  if (cfg->ShowTablesRectsType < 0)
15928  cfg->ShowTablesRectsType = TRT_WorkRect;
15929 
15930  struct Funcs
15931  {
15932  static ImRect GetTableRect(ImGuiTable* table, int rect_type, int n)
15933  {
15934  if (rect_type == TRT_OuterRect) { return table->OuterRect; }
15935  else if (rect_type == TRT_InnerRect) { return table->InnerRect; }
15936  else if (rect_type == TRT_WorkRect) { return table->WorkRect; }
15937  else if (rect_type == TRT_HostClipRect) { return table->HostClipRect; }
15938  else if (rect_type == TRT_InnerClipRect) { return table->InnerClipRect; }
15939  else if (rect_type == TRT_BackgroundClipRect) { return table->BgClipRect; }
15940  else if (rect_type == TRT_ColumnsRect) { ImGuiTableColumn* c = &table->Columns[n]; return ImRect(c->MinX, table->InnerClipRect.Min.y, c->MaxX, table->InnerClipRect.Min.y + table->LastOuterHeight); }
15941  else if (rect_type == TRT_ColumnsWorkRect) { ImGuiTableColumn* c = &table->Columns[n]; return ImRect(c->WorkMinX, table->WorkRect.Min.y, c->WorkMaxX, table->WorkRect.Max.y); }
15942  else if (rect_type == TRT_ColumnsClipRect) { ImGuiTableColumn* c = &table->Columns[n]; return c->ClipRect; }
15943  else if (rect_type == TRT_ColumnsContentHeadersUsed){ ImGuiTableColumn* c = &table->Columns[n]; return ImRect(c->WorkMinX, table->InnerClipRect.Min.y, c->ContentMaxXHeadersUsed, table->InnerClipRect.Min.y + table->LastFirstRowHeight); } // Note: y1/y2 not always accurate
15944  else if (rect_type == TRT_ColumnsContentHeadersIdeal){ImGuiTableColumn* c = &table->Columns[n]; return ImRect(c->WorkMinX, table->InnerClipRect.Min.y, c->ContentMaxXHeadersIdeal, table->InnerClipRect.Min.y + table->LastFirstRowHeight); }
15945  else if (rect_type == TRT_ColumnsContentFrozen) { ImGuiTableColumn* c = &table->Columns[n]; return ImRect(c->WorkMinX, table->InnerClipRect.Min.y, c->ContentMaxXFrozen, table->InnerClipRect.Min.y + table->LastFirstRowHeight); }
15946  else if (rect_type == TRT_ColumnsContentUnfrozen) { ImGuiTableColumn* c = &table->Columns[n]; return ImRect(c->WorkMinX, table->InnerClipRect.Min.y + table->LastFirstRowHeight, c->ContentMaxXUnfrozen, table->InnerClipRect.Max.y); }
15947  IM_ASSERT(0);
15948  return ImRect();
15949  }
15950 
15951  static ImRect GetWindowRect(ImGuiWindow* window, int rect_type)
15952  {
15953  if (rect_type == WRT_OuterRect) { return window->Rect(); }
15954  else if (rect_type == WRT_OuterRectClipped) { return window->OuterRectClipped; }
15955  else if (rect_type == WRT_InnerRect) { return window->InnerRect; }
15956  else if (rect_type == WRT_InnerClipRect) { return window->InnerClipRect; }
15957  else if (rect_type == WRT_WorkRect) { return window->WorkRect; }
15958  else if (rect_type == WRT_Content) { ImVec2 min = window->InnerRect.Min - window->Scroll + window->WindowPadding; return ImRect(min, min + window->ContentSize); }
15959  else if (rect_type == WRT_ContentIdeal) { ImVec2 min = window->InnerRect.Min - window->Scroll + window->WindowPadding; return ImRect(min, min + window->ContentSizeIdeal); }
15960  else if (rect_type == WRT_ContentRegionRect) { return window->ContentRegionRect; }
15961  IM_ASSERT(0);
15962  return ImRect();
15963  }
15964  };
15965 
15966  // Tools
15967  if (TreeNode("Tools"))
15968  {
15969  // The Item Picker tool is super useful to visually select an item and break into the call-stack of where it was submitted.
15970  if (Button("Item Picker.."))
15971  DebugStartItemPicker();
15972  SameLine();
15973  MetricsHelpMarker("Will call the IM_DEBUG_BREAK() macro to break in debugger.\nWarning: If you don't have a debugger attached, this will probably crash.");
15974 
15975  Checkbox("Show windows begin order", &cfg->ShowWindowsBeginOrder);
15976  Checkbox("Show windows rectangles", &cfg->ShowWindowsRects);
15977  SameLine();
15978  SetNextItemWidth(GetFontSize() * 12);
15979  cfg->ShowWindowsRects |= Combo("##show_windows_rect_type", &cfg->ShowWindowsRectsType, wrt_rects_names, WRT_Count, WRT_Count);
15980  if (cfg->ShowWindowsRects && g.NavWindow != NULL)
15981  {
15982  BulletText("'%s':", g.NavWindow->Name);
15983  Indent();
15984  for (int rect_n = 0; rect_n < WRT_Count; rect_n++)
15985  {
15986  ImRect r = Funcs::GetWindowRect(g.NavWindow, rect_n);
15987  Text("(%6.1f,%6.1f) (%6.1f,%6.1f) Size (%6.1f,%6.1f) %s", r.Min.x, r.Min.y, r.Max.x, r.Max.y, r.GetWidth(), r.GetHeight(), wrt_rects_names[rect_n]);
15988  }
15989  Unindent();
15990  }
15991  Checkbox("Show ImDrawCmd mesh when hovering", &cfg->ShowDrawCmdMesh);
15992  Checkbox("Show ImDrawCmd bounding boxes when hovering", &cfg->ShowDrawCmdBoundingBoxes);
15993 
15994  Checkbox("Show tables rectangles", &cfg->ShowTablesRects);
15995  SameLine();
15996  SetNextItemWidth(GetFontSize() * 12);
15997  cfg->ShowTablesRects |= Combo("##show_table_rects_type", &cfg->ShowTablesRectsType, trt_rects_names, TRT_Count, TRT_Count);
15998  if (cfg->ShowTablesRects && g.NavWindow != NULL)
15999  {
16000  for (int table_n = 0; table_n < g.Tables.GetSize(); table_n++)
16001  {
16002  ImGuiTable* table = g.Tables.GetByIndex(table_n);
16003  if (table->LastFrameActive < g.FrameCount - 1 || (table->OuterWindow != g.NavWindow && table->InnerWindow != g.NavWindow))
16004  continue;
16005 
16006  BulletText("Table 0x%08X (%d columns, in '%s')", table->ID, table->ColumnsCount, table->OuterWindow->Name);
16007  if (IsItemHovered())
16008  GetForegroundDrawList()->AddRect(table->OuterRect.Min - ImVec2(1, 1), table->OuterRect.Max + ImVec2(1, 1), IM_COL32(255, 255, 0, 255), 0.0f, ~0, 2.0f);
16009  Indent();
16010  char buf[128];
16011  for (int rect_n = 0; rect_n < TRT_Count; rect_n++)
16012  {
16013  if (rect_n >= TRT_ColumnsRect)
16014  {
16015  if (rect_n != TRT_ColumnsRect && rect_n != TRT_ColumnsClipRect)
16016  continue;
16017  for (int column_n = 0; column_n < table->ColumnsCount; column_n++)
16018  {
16019  ImRect r = Funcs::GetTableRect(table, rect_n, column_n);
16020  ImFormatString(buf, IM_ARRAYSIZE(buf), "(%6.1f,%6.1f) (%6.1f,%6.1f) Size (%6.1f,%6.1f) Col %d %s", r.Min.x, r.Min.y, r.Max.x, r.Max.y, r.GetWidth(), r.GetHeight(), column_n, trt_rects_names[rect_n]);
16021  Selectable(buf);
16022  if (IsItemHovered())
16023  GetForegroundDrawList()->AddRect(r.Min - ImVec2(1, 1), r.Max + ImVec2(1, 1), IM_COL32(255, 255, 0, 255), 0.0f, ~0, 2.0f);
16024  }
16025  }
16026  else
16027  {
16028  ImRect r = Funcs::GetTableRect(table, rect_n, -1);
16029  ImFormatString(buf, IM_ARRAYSIZE(buf), "(%6.1f,%6.1f) (%6.1f,%6.1f) Size (%6.1f,%6.1f) %s", r.Min.x, r.Min.y, r.Max.x, r.Max.y, r.GetWidth(), r.GetHeight(), trt_rects_names[rect_n]);
16030  Selectable(buf);
16031  if (IsItemHovered())
16032  GetForegroundDrawList()->AddRect(r.Min - ImVec2(1, 1), r.Max + ImVec2(1, 1), IM_COL32(255, 255, 0, 255), 0.0f, ~0, 2.0f);
16033  }
16034  }
16035  Unindent();
16036  }
16037  }
16038 
16039  TreePop();
16040  }
16041 
16042  // Windows
16043  DebugNodeWindowsList(&g.Windows, "Windows");
16044  //DebugNodeWindowsList(&g.WindowsFocusOrder, "WindowsFocusOrder");
16045 
16046  // DrawLists
16047  int drawlist_count = 0;
16048  for (int viewport_i = 0; viewport_i < g.Viewports.Size; viewport_i++)
16049  drawlist_count += g.Viewports[viewport_i]->DrawDataBuilder.GetDrawListCount();
16050  if (TreeNode("DrawLists", "DrawLists (%d)", drawlist_count))
16051  {
16052  for (int viewport_i = 0; viewport_i < g.Viewports.Size; viewport_i++)
16053  {
16054  ImGuiViewportP* viewport = g.Viewports[viewport_i];
16055  bool viewport_has_drawlist = false;
16056  for (int layer_i = 0; layer_i < IM_ARRAYSIZE(viewport->DrawDataBuilder.Layers); layer_i++)
16057  for (int draw_list_i = 0; draw_list_i < viewport->DrawDataBuilder.Layers[layer_i].Size; draw_list_i++)
16058  {
16059  if (!viewport_has_drawlist)
16060  Text("Active DrawLists in Viewport #%d, ID: 0x%08X", viewport->Idx, viewport->ID);
16061  viewport_has_drawlist = true;
16062  DebugNodeDrawList(NULL, viewport, viewport->DrawDataBuilder.Layers[layer_i][draw_list_i], "DrawList");
16063  }
16064  }
16065  TreePop();
16066  }
16067 
16068  // Viewports
16069  if (TreeNode("Viewports", "Viewports (%d)", g.Viewports.Size))
16070  {
16071  Indent(GetTreeNodeToLabelSpacing());
16072  RenderViewportsThumbnails();
16073  Unindent(GetTreeNodeToLabelSpacing());
16074 
16075  bool open = TreeNode("Monitors", "Monitors (%d)", g.PlatformIO.Monitors.Size);
16076  SameLine();
16077  MetricsHelpMarker("Dear ImGui uses monitor data:\n- to query DPI settings on a per monitor basis\n- to position popup/tooltips so they don't straddle monitors.");
16078  if (open)
16079  {
16080  for (int i = 0; i < g.PlatformIO.Monitors.Size; i++)
16081  {
16082  const ImGuiPlatformMonitor& mon = g.PlatformIO.Monitors[i];
16083  BulletText("Monitor #%d: DPI %.0f%%\n MainMin (%.0f,%.0f), MainMax (%.0f,%.0f), MainSize (%.0f,%.0f)\n WorkMin (%.0f,%.0f), WorkMax (%.0f,%.0f), WorkSize (%.0f,%.0f)",
16084  i, mon.DpiScale * 100.0f,
16085  mon.MainPos.x, mon.MainPos.y, mon.MainPos.x + mon.MainSize.x, mon.MainPos.y + mon.MainSize.y, mon.MainSize.x, mon.MainSize.y,
16086  mon.WorkPos.x, mon.WorkPos.y, mon.WorkPos.x + mon.WorkSize.x, mon.WorkPos.y + mon.WorkSize.y, mon.WorkSize.x, mon.WorkSize.y);
16087  }
16088  TreePop();
16089  }
16090 
16091  if (TreeNode("Inferred order (front-to-back)"))
16092  {
16093  static ImVector<ImGuiViewportP*> viewports;
16094  viewports.resize(g.Viewports.Size);
16095  memcpy(viewports.Data, g.Viewports.Data, g.Viewports.size_in_bytes());
16096  if (viewports.Size > 1)
16097  ImQsort(viewports.Data, viewports.Size, sizeof(ImGuiViewport*), ViewportComparerByFrontMostStampCount);
16098  for (int i = 0; i < viewports.Size; i++)
16099  BulletText("Viewport #%d, ID: 0x%08X, FrontMostStampCount = %08d, Window: \"%s\"", viewports[i]->Idx, viewports[i]->ID, viewports[i]->LastFrontMostStampCount, viewports[i]->Window ? viewports[i]->Window->Name : "N/A");
16100  TreePop();
16101  }
16102 
16103  for (int i = 0; i < g.Viewports.Size; i++)
16104  DebugNodeViewport(g.Viewports[i]);
16105  TreePop();
16106  }
16107 
16108  // Details for Popups
16109  if (TreeNode("Popups", "Popups (%d)", g.OpenPopupStack.Size))
16110  {
16111  for (int i = 0; i < g.OpenPopupStack.Size; i++)
16112  {
16113  ImGuiWindow* window = g.OpenPopupStack[i].Window;
16114  BulletText("PopupID: %08x, Window: '%s'%s%s", g.OpenPopupStack[i].PopupId, window ? window->Name : "NULL", window && (window->Flags & ImGuiWindowFlags_ChildWindow) ? " ChildWindow" : "", window && (window->Flags & ImGuiWindowFlags_ChildMenu) ? " ChildMenu" : "");
16115  }
16116  TreePop();
16117  }
16118 
16119  // Details for TabBars
16120  if (TreeNode("TabBars", "Tab Bars (%d)", g.TabBars.GetSize()))
16121  {
16122  for (int n = 0; n < g.TabBars.GetSize(); n++)
16123  DebugNodeTabBar(g.TabBars.GetByIndex(n), "TabBar");
16124  TreePop();
16125  }
16126 
16127  // Details for Tables
16128 #ifdef IMGUI_HAS_TABLE
16129  if (TreeNode("Tables", "Tables (%d)", g.Tables.GetSize()))
16130  {
16131  for (int n = 0; n < g.Tables.GetSize(); n++)
16132  DebugNodeTable(g.Tables.GetByIndex(n));
16133  TreePop();
16134  }
16135 #endif // #ifdef IMGUI_HAS_TABLE
16136 
16137  // Details for Docking
16138 #ifdef IMGUI_HAS_DOCK
16139  if (TreeNode("Docking"))
16140  {
16141  static bool root_nodes_only = true;
16142  ImGuiDockContext* dc = &g.DockContext;
16143  Checkbox("List root nodes", &root_nodes_only);
16144  Checkbox("Ctrl shows window dock info", &cfg->ShowDockingNodes);
16145  if (SmallButton("Clear nodes")) { DockContextClearNodes(&g, 0, true); }
16146  SameLine();
16147  if (SmallButton("Rebuild all")) { dc->WantFullRebuild = true; }
16148  for (int n = 0; n < dc->Nodes.Data.Size; n++)
16149  if (ImGuiDockNode* node = (ImGuiDockNode*)dc->Nodes.Data[n].val_p)
16150  if (!root_nodes_only || node->IsRootNode())
16151  DebugNodeDockNode(node, "Node");
16152  TreePop();
16153  }
16154 #endif // #ifdef IMGUI_HAS_DOCK
16155 
16156  // Settings
16157  if (TreeNode("Settings"))
16158  {
16159  if (SmallButton("Clear"))
16160  ClearIniSettings();
16161  SameLine();
16162  if (SmallButton("Save to memory"))
16163  SaveIniSettingsToMemory();
16164  SameLine();
16165  if (SmallButton("Save to disk"))
16166  SaveIniSettingsToDisk(g.IO.IniFilename);
16167  SameLine();
16168  if (g.IO.IniFilename)
16169  Text("\"%s\"", g.IO.IniFilename);
16170  else
16171  TextUnformatted("<NULL>");
16172  Text("SettingsDirtyTimer %.2f", g.SettingsDirtyTimer);
16173  if (TreeNode("SettingsHandlers", "Settings handlers: (%d)", g.SettingsHandlers.Size))
16174  {
16175  for (int n = 0; n < g.SettingsHandlers.Size; n++)
16176  BulletText("%s", g.SettingsHandlers[n].TypeName);
16177  TreePop();
16178  }
16179  if (TreeNode("SettingsWindows", "Settings packed data: Windows: %d bytes", g.SettingsWindows.size()))
16180  {
16181  for (ImGuiWindowSettings* settings = g.SettingsWindows.begin(); settings != NULL; settings = g.SettingsWindows.next_chunk(settings))
16182  DebugNodeWindowSettings(settings);
16183  TreePop();
16184  }
16185 
16186 #ifdef IMGUI_HAS_TABLE
16187  if (TreeNode("SettingsTables", "Settings packed data: Tables: %d bytes", g.SettingsTables.size()))
16188  {
16189  for (ImGuiTableSettings* settings = g.SettingsTables.begin(); settings != NULL; settings = g.SettingsTables.next_chunk(settings))
16190  DebugNodeTableSettings(settings);
16191  TreePop();
16192  }
16193 #endif // #ifdef IMGUI_HAS_TABLE
16194 
16195 #ifdef IMGUI_HAS_DOCK
16196  if (TreeNode("SettingsDocking", "Settings packed data: Docking"))
16197  {
16198  ImGuiDockContext* dc = &g.DockContext;
16199  Text("In SettingsWindows:");
16200  for (ImGuiWindowSettings* settings = g.SettingsWindows.begin(); settings != NULL; settings = g.SettingsWindows.next_chunk(settings))
16201  if (settings->DockId != 0)
16202  BulletText("Window '%s' -> DockId %08X", settings->GetName(), settings->DockId);
16203  Text("In SettingsNodes:");
16204  for (int n = 0; n < dc->NodesSettings.Size; n++)
16205  {
16206  ImGuiDockNodeSettings* settings = &dc->NodesSettings[n];
16207  const char* selected_tab_name = NULL;
16208  if (settings->SelectedWindowId)
16209  {
16210  if (ImGuiWindow* window = FindWindowByID(settings->SelectedWindowId))
16211  selected_tab_name = window->Name;
16212  else if (ImGuiWindowSettings* window_settings = FindWindowSettings(settings->SelectedWindowId))
16213  selected_tab_name = window_settings->GetName();
16214  }
16215  BulletText("Node %08X, Parent %08X, SelectedTab %08X ('%s')", settings->ID, settings->ParentNodeId, settings->SelectedWindowId, selected_tab_name ? selected_tab_name : settings->SelectedWindowId ? "N/A" : "");
16216  }
16217  TreePop();
16218  }
16219 #endif // #ifdef IMGUI_HAS_DOCK
16220 
16221  if (TreeNode("SettingsIniData", "Settings unpacked data (.ini): %d bytes", g.SettingsIniData.size()))
16222  {
16223  InputTextMultiline("##Ini", (char*)(void*)g.SettingsIniData.c_str(), g.SettingsIniData.Buf.Size, ImVec2(-FLT_MIN, GetTextLineHeight() * 20), ImGuiInputTextFlags_ReadOnly);
16224  TreePop();
16225  }
16226  TreePop();
16227  }
16228 
16229  // Misc Details
16230  if (TreeNode("Internal state"))
16231  {
16232  const char* input_source_names[] = { "None", "Mouse", "Nav", "NavKeyboard", "NavGamepad" }; IM_ASSERT(IM_ARRAYSIZE(input_source_names) == ImGuiInputSource_COUNT);
16233 
16234  Text("WINDOWING");
16235  Indent();
16236  Text("HoveredWindow: '%s'", g.HoveredWindow ? g.HoveredWindow->Name : "NULL");
16237  Text("HoveredRootWindow: '%s'", g.HoveredRootWindow ? g.HoveredRootWindow->Name : "NULL");
16238  Text("HoveredWindowUnderMovingWindow: '%s'", g.HoveredWindowUnderMovingWindow ? g.HoveredWindowUnderMovingWindow->Name : "NULL");
16239  Text("HoveredDockNode: 0x%08X", g.HoveredDockNode ? g.HoveredDockNode->ID : 0);
16240  Text("MovingWindow: '%s'", g.MovingWindow ? g.MovingWindow->Name : "NULL");
16241  Text("MouseViewport: 0x%08X (UserHovered 0x%08X, LastHovered 0x%08X)", g.MouseViewport->ID, g.IO.MouseHoveredViewport, g.MouseLastHoveredViewport ? g.MouseLastHoveredViewport->ID : 0);
16242  Unindent();
16243 
16244  Text("ITEMS");
16245  Indent();
16246  Text("ActiveId: 0x%08X/0x%08X (%.2f sec), AllowOverlap: %d, Source: %s", g.ActiveId, g.ActiveIdPreviousFrame, g.ActiveIdTimer, g.ActiveIdAllowOverlap, input_source_names[g.ActiveIdSource]);
16247  Text("ActiveIdWindow: '%s'", g.ActiveIdWindow ? g.ActiveIdWindow->Name : "NULL");
16248  Text("HoveredId: 0x%08X/0x%08X (%.2f sec), AllowOverlap: %d", g.HoveredId, g.HoveredIdPreviousFrame, g.HoveredIdTimer, g.HoveredIdAllowOverlap); // Data is "in-flight" so depending on when the Metrics window is called we may see current frame information or not
16249  Text("DragDrop: %d, SourceId = 0x%08X, Payload \"%s\" (%d bytes)", g.DragDropActive, g.DragDropPayload.SourceId, g.DragDropPayload.DataType, g.DragDropPayload.DataSize);
16250  Unindent();
16251 
16252  Text("NAV,FOCUS");
16253  Indent();
16254  Text("NavWindow: '%s'", g.NavWindow ? g.NavWindow->Name : "NULL");
16255  Text("NavId: 0x%08X, NavLayer: %d", g.NavId, g.NavLayer);
16256  Text("NavInputSource: %s", input_source_names[g.NavInputSource]);
16257  Text("NavActive: %d, NavVisible: %d", g.IO.NavActive, g.IO.NavVisible);
16258  Text("NavActivateId: 0x%08X, NavInputId: 0x%08X", g.NavActivateId, g.NavInputId);
16259  Text("NavDisableHighlight: %d, NavDisableMouseHover: %d", g.NavDisableHighlight, g.NavDisableMouseHover);
16260  Text("NavFocusScopeId = 0x%08X", g.NavFocusScopeId);
16261  Text("NavWindowingTarget: '%s'", g.NavWindowingTarget ? g.NavWindowingTarget->Name : "NULL");
16262  Unindent();
16263 
16264  TreePop();
16265  }
16266 
16267  // Overlay: Display windows Rectangles and Begin Order
16268  if (cfg->ShowWindowsRects || cfg->ShowWindowsBeginOrder)
16269  {
16270  for (int n = 0; n < g.Windows.Size; n++)
16271  {
16272  ImGuiWindow* window = g.Windows[n];
16273  if (!window->WasActive)
16274  continue;
16275  ImDrawList* draw_list = GetForegroundDrawList(window);
16276  if (cfg->ShowWindowsRects)
16277  {
16278  ImRect r = Funcs::GetWindowRect(window, cfg->ShowWindowsRectsType);
16279  draw_list->AddRect(r.Min, r.Max, IM_COL32(255, 0, 128, 255));
16280  }
16281  if (cfg->ShowWindowsBeginOrder && !(window->Flags & ImGuiWindowFlags_ChildWindow))
16282  {
16283  char buf[32];
16284  ImFormatString(buf, IM_ARRAYSIZE(buf), "%d", window->BeginOrderWithinContext);
16285  float font_size = GetFontSize();
16286  draw_list->AddRectFilled(window->Pos, window->Pos + ImVec2(font_size, font_size), IM_COL32(200, 100, 100, 255));
16287  draw_list->AddText(window->Pos, IM_COL32(255, 255, 255, 255), buf);
16288  }
16289  }
16290  }
16291 
16292 #ifdef IMGUI_HAS_TABLE
16293  // Overlay: Display Tables Rectangles
16294  if (cfg->ShowTablesRects)
16295  {
16296  for (int table_n = 0; table_n < g.Tables.GetSize(); table_n++)
16297  {
16298  ImGuiTable* table = g.Tables.GetByIndex(table_n);
16299  if (table->LastFrameActive < g.FrameCount - 1)
16300  continue;
16301  ImDrawList* draw_list = GetForegroundDrawList(table->OuterWindow);
16302  if (cfg->ShowTablesRectsType >= TRT_ColumnsRect)
16303  {
16304  for (int column_n = 0; column_n < table->ColumnsCount; column_n++)
16305  {
16306  ImRect r = Funcs::GetTableRect(table, cfg->ShowTablesRectsType, column_n);
16307  ImU32 col = (table->HoveredColumnBody == column_n) ? IM_COL32(255, 255, 128, 255) : IM_COL32(255, 0, 128, 255);
16308  float thickness = (table->HoveredColumnBody == column_n) ? 3.0f : 1.0f;
16309  draw_list->AddRect(r.Min, r.Max, col, 0.0f, ~0, thickness);
16310  }
16311  }
16312  else
16313  {
16314  ImRect r = Funcs::GetTableRect(table, cfg->ShowTablesRectsType, -1);
16315  draw_list->AddRect(r.Min, r.Max, IM_COL32(255, 0, 128, 255));
16316  }
16317  }
16318  }
16319 #endif // #ifdef IMGUI_HAS_TABLE
16320 
16321 #ifdef IMGUI_HAS_DOCK
16322  // Overlay: Display Docking info
16323  if (cfg->ShowDockingNodes && g.IO.KeyCtrl && g.HoveredDockNode)
16324  {
16325  char buf[64] = "";
16326  char* p = buf;
16327  ImGuiDockNode* node = g.HoveredDockNode;
16328  ImDrawList* overlay_draw_list = node->HostWindow ? GetForegroundDrawList(node->HostWindow) : GetForegroundDrawList(GetMainViewport());
16329  p += ImFormatString(p, buf + IM_ARRAYSIZE(buf) - p, "DockId: %X%s\n", node->ID, node->IsCentralNode() ? " *CentralNode*" : "");
16330  p += ImFormatString(p, buf + IM_ARRAYSIZE(buf) - p, "WindowClass: %08X\n", node->WindowClass.ClassId);
16331  p += ImFormatString(p, buf + IM_ARRAYSIZE(buf) - p, "Size: (%.0f, %.0f)\n", node->Size.x, node->Size.y);
16332  p += ImFormatString(p, buf + IM_ARRAYSIZE(buf) - p, "SizeRef: (%.0f, %.0f)\n", node->SizeRef.x, node->SizeRef.y);
16333  int depth = DockNodeGetDepth(node);
16334  overlay_draw_list->AddRect(node->Pos + ImVec2(3, 3) * (float)depth, node->Pos + node->Size - ImVec2(3, 3) * (float)depth, IM_COL32(200, 100, 100, 255));
16335  ImVec2 pos = node->Pos + ImVec2(3, 3) * (float)depth;
16336  overlay_draw_list->AddRectFilled(pos - ImVec2(1, 1), pos + CalcTextSize(buf) + ImVec2(1, 1), IM_COL32(200, 100, 100, 255));
16337  overlay_draw_list->AddText(NULL, 0.0f, pos, IM_COL32(255, 255, 255, 255), buf);
16338  }
16339 #endif // #ifdef IMGUI_HAS_DOCK
16340 
16341  End();
16342 }
16343 
16344 // [DEBUG] Display contents of Columns
16345 void ImGui::DebugNodeColumns(ImGuiOldColumns* columns)
16346 {
16347  if (!TreeNode((void*)(uintptr_t)columns->ID, "Columns Id: 0x%08X, Count: %d, Flags: 0x%04X", columns->ID, columns->Count, columns->Flags))
16348  return;
16349  BulletText("Width: %.1f (MinX: %.1f, MaxX: %.1f)", columns->OffMaxX - columns->OffMinX, columns->OffMinX, columns->OffMaxX);
16350  for (int column_n = 0; column_n < columns->Columns.Size; column_n++)
16351  BulletText("Column %02d: OffsetNorm %.3f (= %.1f px)", column_n, columns->Columns[column_n].OffsetNorm, GetColumnOffsetFromNorm(columns, columns->Columns[column_n].OffsetNorm));
16352  TreePop();
16353 }
16354 
16355 // [DEBUG] Display contents of ImDockNode
16356 void ImGui::DebugNodeDockNode(ImGuiDockNode* node, const char* label)
16357 {
16358  ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
16359  const bool is_alive = (g.FrameCount - node->LastFrameAlive < 2); // Submitted with ImGuiDockNodeFlags_KeepAliveOnly
16360  const bool is_active = (g.FrameCount - node->LastFrameActive < 2); // Submitted
16361  if (!is_alive) { PushStyleColor(ImGuiCol_Text, GetStyleColorVec4(ImGuiCol_TextDisabled)); }
16362  bool open;
16363  if (node->Windows.Size > 0)
16364  open = TreeNode((void*)(intptr_t)node->ID, "%s 0x%04X%s: %d windows (vis: '%s')", label, node->ID, node->IsVisible ? "" : " (hidden)", node->Windows.Size, node->VisibleWindow ? node->VisibleWindow->Name : "NULL");
16365  else
16366  open = TreeNode((void*)(intptr_t)node->ID, "%s 0x%04X%s: %s split (vis: '%s')", label, node->ID, node->IsVisible ? "" : " (hidden)", (node->SplitAxis == ImGuiAxis_X) ? "horizontal" : (node->SplitAxis == ImGuiAxis_Y) ? "vertical" : "n/a", node->VisibleWindow ? node->VisibleWindow->Name : "NULL");
16367  if (!is_alive) { PopStyleColor(); }
16368  if (is_active && IsItemHovered())
16369  if (ImGuiWindow* window = node->HostWindow ? node->HostWindow : node->VisibleWindow)
16370  GetForegroundDrawList(window)->AddRect(node->Pos, node->Pos + node->Size, IM_COL32(255, 255, 0, 255));
16371  if (open)
16372  {
16373  IM_ASSERT(node->ChildNodes[0] == NULL || node->ChildNodes[0]->ParentNode == node);
16374  IM_ASSERT(node->ChildNodes[1] == NULL || node->ChildNodes[1]->ParentNode == node);
16375  BulletText("Pos (%.0f,%.0f), Size (%.0f, %.0f) Ref (%.0f, %.0f)",
16376  node->Pos.x, node->Pos.y, node->Size.x, node->Size.y, node->SizeRef.x, node->SizeRef.y);
16377  DebugNodeWindow(node->HostWindow, "HostWindow");
16378  DebugNodeWindow(node->VisibleWindow, "VisibleWindow");
16379  BulletText("SelectedTabID: 0x%08X, LastFocusedNodeID: 0x%08X", node->SelectedTabId, node->LastFocusedNodeId);
16380  BulletText("Misc:%s%s%s%s%s",
16381  node->IsDockSpace() ? " IsDockSpace" : "",
16382  node->IsCentralNode() ? " IsCentralNode" : "",
16383  is_alive ? " IsAlive" : "", is_active ? " IsActive" : "",
16384  node->WantLockSizeOnce ? " WantLockSizeOnce" : "");
16385  if (TreeNode("flags", "LocalFlags: 0x%04X SharedFlags: 0x%04X", node->LocalFlags, node->SharedFlags))
16386  {
16387  CheckboxFlags("LocalFlags: NoDocking", &node->LocalFlags, ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoDocking);
16388  CheckboxFlags("LocalFlags: NoSplit", &node->LocalFlags, ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoSplit);
16389  CheckboxFlags("LocalFlags: NoResize", &node->LocalFlags, ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoResize);
16390  CheckboxFlags("LocalFlags: NoResizeX", &node->LocalFlags, ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoResizeX);
16391  CheckboxFlags("LocalFlags: NoResizeY", &node->LocalFlags, ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoResizeY);
16392  CheckboxFlags("LocalFlags: NoTabBar", &node->LocalFlags, ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoTabBar);
16393  CheckboxFlags("LocalFlags: HiddenTabBar", &node->LocalFlags, ImGuiDockNodeFlags_HiddenTabBar);
16394  CheckboxFlags("LocalFlags: NoWindowMenuButton", &node->LocalFlags, ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoWindowMenuButton);
16395  CheckboxFlags("LocalFlags: NoCloseButton", &node->LocalFlags, ImGuiDockNodeFlags_NoCloseButton);
16396  TreePop();
16397  }
16398  if (node->ParentNode)
16399  DebugNodeDockNode(node->ParentNode, "ParentNode");
16400  if (node->ChildNodes[0])
16401  DebugNodeDockNode(node->ChildNodes[0], "Child[0]");
16402  if (node->ChildNodes[1])
16403  DebugNodeDockNode(node->ChildNodes[1], "Child[1]");
16404  if (node->TabBar)
16405  DebugNodeTabBar(node->TabBar, "TabBar");
16406  TreePop();
16407  }
16408 }
16409 
16410 // [DEBUG] Display contents of ImDrawList
16411 // Note that both 'window' and 'viewport' may be NULL here. Viewport is generally null of destroyed popups which previously owned a viewport.
16412 void ImGui::DebugNodeDrawList(ImGuiWindow* window, ImGuiViewportP* viewport, const ImDrawList* draw_list, const char* label)
16413 {
16414  ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
16415  ImGuiMetricsConfig* cfg = &g.DebugMetricsConfig;
16416  int cmd_count = draw_list->CmdBuffer.Size;
16417  if (cmd_count > 0 && draw_list->CmdBuffer.back().ElemCount == 0 && draw_list->CmdBuffer.back().UserCallback == NULL)
16418  cmd_count--;
16419  bool node_open = TreeNode(draw_list, "%s: '%s' %d vtx, %d indices, %d cmds", label, draw_list->_OwnerName ? draw_list->_OwnerName : "", draw_list->VtxBuffer.Size, draw_list->IdxBuffer.Size, cmd_count);
16420  if (draw_list == GetWindowDrawList())
16421  {
16422  SameLine();
16423  TextColored(ImVec4(1.0f, 0.4f, 0.4f, 1.0f), "CURRENTLY APPENDING"); // Can't display stats for active draw list! (we don't have the data double-buffered)
16424  if (node_open)
16425  TreePop();
16426  return;
16427  }
16428 
16429  ImDrawList* fg_draw_list = viewport ? GetForegroundDrawList(viewport) : NULL; // Render additional visuals into the top-most draw list
16430  if (window && fg_draw_list && IsItemHovered())
16431  fg_draw_list->AddRect(window->Pos, window->Pos + window->Size, IM_COL32(255, 255, 0, 255));
16432  if (!node_open)
16433  return;
16434 
16435  if (window && !window->WasActive)
16436  TextDisabled("Warning: owning Window is inactive. This DrawList is not being rendered!");
16437 
16438  for (const ImDrawCmd* pcmd = draw_list->CmdBuffer.Data; pcmd < draw_list->CmdBuffer.Data + cmd_count; pcmd++)
16439  {
16440  if (pcmd->UserCallback)
16441  {
16442  BulletText("Callback %p, user_data %p", pcmd->UserCallback, pcmd->UserCallbackData);
16443  continue;
16444  }
16445 
16446  char buf[300];
16447  ImFormatString(buf, IM_ARRAYSIZE(buf), "DrawCmd:%5d tris, Tex 0x%p, ClipRect (%4.0f,%4.0f)-(%4.0f,%4.0f)",
16448  pcmd->ElemCount / 3, (void*)(intptr_t)pcmd->TextureId,
16449  pcmd->ClipRect.x, pcmd->ClipRect.y, pcmd->ClipRect.z, pcmd->ClipRect.w);
16450  bool pcmd_node_open = TreeNode((void*)(pcmd - draw_list->CmdBuffer.begin()), "%s", buf);
16451  if (IsItemHovered() && (cfg->ShowDrawCmdMesh || cfg->ShowDrawCmdBoundingBoxes) && fg_draw_list)
16452  DebugNodeDrawCmdShowMeshAndBoundingBox(fg_draw_list, draw_list, pcmd, cfg->ShowDrawCmdMesh, cfg->ShowDrawCmdBoundingBoxes);
16453  if (!pcmd_node_open)
16454  continue;
16455 
16456  // Calculate approximate coverage area (touched pixel count)
16457  // This will be in pixels squared as long there's no post-scaling happening to the renderer output.
16458  const ImDrawIdx* idx_buffer = (draw_list->IdxBuffer.Size > 0) ? draw_list->IdxBuffer.Data : NULL;
16459  const ImDrawVert* vtx_buffer = draw_list->VtxBuffer.Data + pcmd->VtxOffset;
16460  float total_area = 0.0f;
16461  for (unsigned int idx_n = pcmd->IdxOffset; idx_n < pcmd->IdxOffset + pcmd->ElemCount; )
16462  {
16463  ImVec2 triangle[3];
16464  for (int n = 0; n < 3; n++, idx_n++)
16465  triangle[n] = vtx_buffer[idx_buffer ? idx_buffer[idx_n] : idx_n].pos;
16466  total_area += ImTriangleArea(triangle[0], triangle[1], triangle[2]);
16467  }
16468 
16469  // Display vertex information summary. Hover to get all triangles drawn in wire-frame
16470  ImFormatString(buf, IM_ARRAYSIZE(buf), "Mesh: ElemCount: %d, VtxOffset: +%d, IdxOffset: +%d, Area: ~%0.f px", pcmd->ElemCount, pcmd->VtxOffset, pcmd->IdxOffset, total_area);
16471  Selectable(buf);
16472  if (IsItemHovered() && fg_draw_list)
16473  DebugNodeDrawCmdShowMeshAndBoundingBox(fg_draw_list, draw_list, pcmd, true, false);
16474 
16475  // Display individual triangles/vertices. Hover on to get the corresponding triangle highlighted.
16476  ImGuiListClipper clipper;
16477  clipper.Begin(pcmd->ElemCount / 3); // Manually coarse clip our print out of individual vertices to save CPU, only items that may be visible.
16478  while (clipper.Step())
16479  for (int prim = clipper.DisplayStart, idx_i = pcmd->IdxOffset + clipper.DisplayStart * 3; prim < clipper.DisplayEnd; prim++)
16480  {
16481  char* buf_p = buf, * buf_end = buf + IM_ARRAYSIZE(buf);
16482  ImVec2 triangle[3];
16483  for (int n = 0; n < 3; n++, idx_i++)
16484  {
16485  const ImDrawVert& v = vtx_buffer[idx_buffer ? idx_buffer[idx_i] : idx_i];
16486  triangle[n] = v.pos;
16487  buf_p += ImFormatString(buf_p, buf_end - buf_p, "%s %04d: pos (%8.2f,%8.2f), uv (%.6f,%.6f), col %08X\n",
16488  (n == 0) ? "Vert:" : " ", idx_i, v.pos.x, v.pos.y, v.uv.x, v.uv.y, v.col);
16489  }
16490 
16491  Selectable(buf, false);
16492  if (fg_draw_list && IsItemHovered())
16493  {
16494  ImDrawListFlags backup_flags = fg_draw_list->Flags;
16495  fg_draw_list->Flags &= ~ImDrawListFlags_AntiAliasedLines; // Disable AA on triangle outlines is more readable for very large and thin triangles.
16496  fg_draw_list->AddPolyline(triangle, 3, IM_COL32(255, 255, 0, 255), true, 1.0f);
16497  fg_draw_list->Flags = backup_flags;
16498  }
16499  }
16500  TreePop();
16501  }
16502  TreePop();
16503 }
16504 
16505 // [DEBUG] Display mesh/aabb of a ImDrawCmd
16506 void ImGui::DebugNodeDrawCmdShowMeshAndBoundingBox(ImDrawList* out_draw_list, const ImDrawList* draw_list, const ImDrawCmd* draw_cmd, bool show_mesh, bool show_aabb)
16507 {
16508  IM_ASSERT(show_mesh || show_aabb);
16509  ImDrawIdx* idx_buffer = (draw_list->IdxBuffer.Size > 0) ? draw_list->IdxBuffer.Data : NULL;
16510  ImDrawVert* vtx_buffer = draw_list->VtxBuffer.Data + draw_cmd->VtxOffset;
16511 
16512  // Draw wire-frame version of all triangles
16513  ImRect clip_rect = draw_cmd->ClipRect;
16514  ImRect vtxs_rect(FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX, -FLT_MAX, -FLT_MAX);
16515  ImDrawListFlags backup_flags = out_draw_list->Flags;
16516  out_draw_list->Flags &= ~ImDrawListFlags_AntiAliasedLines; // Disable AA on triangle outlines is more readable for very large and thin triangles.
16517  for (unsigned int idx_n = draw_cmd->IdxOffset; idx_n < draw_cmd->IdxOffset + draw_cmd->ElemCount; )
16518  {
16519  ImVec2 triangle[3];
16520  for (int n = 0; n < 3; n++, idx_n++)
16521  vtxs_rect.Add((triangle[n] = vtx_buffer[idx_buffer ? idx_buffer[idx_n] : idx_n].pos));
16522  if (show_mesh)
16523  out_draw_list->AddPolyline(triangle, 3, IM_COL32(255, 255, 0, 255), true, 1.0f); // In yellow: mesh triangles
16524  }
16525  // Draw bounding boxes
16526  if (show_aabb)
16527  {
16528  out_draw_list->AddRect(ImFloor(clip_rect.Min), ImFloor(clip_rect.Max), IM_COL32(255, 0, 255, 255)); // In pink: clipping rectangle submitted to GPU
16529  out_draw_list->AddRect(ImFloor(vtxs_rect.Min), ImFloor(vtxs_rect.Max), IM_COL32(0, 255, 255, 255)); // In cyan: bounding box of triangles
16530  }
16531  out_draw_list->Flags = backup_flags;
16532 }
16533 
16534 // [DEBUG] Display contents of ImGuiStorage
16535 void ImGui::DebugNodeStorage(ImGuiStorage* storage, const char* label)
16536 {
16537  if (!TreeNode(label, "%s: %d entries, %d bytes", label, storage->Data.Size, storage->Data.size_in_bytes()))
16538  return;
16539  for (int n = 0; n < storage->Data.Size; n++)
16540  {
16541  const ImGuiStorage::ImGuiStoragePair& p = storage->Data[n];
16542  BulletText("Key 0x%08X Value { i: %d }", p.key, p.val_i); // Important: we currently don't store a type, real value may not be integer.
16543  }
16544  TreePop();
16545 }
16546 
16547 // [DEBUG] Display contents of ImGuiTabBar
16548 void ImGui::DebugNodeTabBar(ImGuiTabBar* tab_bar, const char* label)
16549 {
16550  // Standalone tab bars (not associated to docking/windows functionality) currently hold no discernible strings.
16551  char buf[256];
16552  char* p = buf;
16553  const char* buf_end = buf + IM_ARRAYSIZE(buf);
16554  const bool is_active = (tab_bar->PrevFrameVisible >= GetFrameCount() - 2);
16555  p += ImFormatString(p, buf_end - p, "%s 0x%08X (%d tabs)%s", label, tab_bar->ID, tab_bar->Tabs.Size, is_active ? "" : " *Inactive*");
16556  p += ImFormatString(p, buf_end - p, " { ");
16557  for (int tab_n = 0; tab_n < ImMin(tab_bar->Tabs.Size, 3); tab_n++)
16558  {
16559  ImGuiTabItem* tab = &tab_bar->Tabs[tab_n];
16560  p += ImFormatString(p, buf_end - p, "%s'%s'",
16561  tab_n > 0 ? ", " : "", (tab->Window || tab->NameOffset != -1) ? tab_bar->GetTabName(tab) : "???");
16562  }
16563  p += ImFormatString(p, buf_end - p, (tab_bar->Tabs.Size > 3) ? " ... }" : " } ");
16564  if (!is_active) { PushStyleColor(ImGuiCol_Text, GetStyleColorVec4(ImGuiCol_TextDisabled)); }
16565  bool open = TreeNode(tab_bar, "%s", buf);
16566  if (!is_active) { PopStyleColor(); }
16567  if (is_active && IsItemHovered())
16568  {
16569  ImDrawList* draw_list = GetForegroundDrawList();
16570  draw_list->AddRect(tab_bar->BarRect.Min, tab_bar->BarRect.Max, IM_COL32(255, 255, 0, 255));
