16571  draw_list->AddLine(ImVec2(tab_bar->ScrollingRectMinX, tab_bar->BarRect.Min.y), ImVec2(tab_bar->ScrollingRectMinX, tab_bar->BarRect.Max.y), IM_COL32(0, 255, 0, 255));
16572  draw_list->AddLine(ImVec2(tab_bar->ScrollingRectMaxX, tab_bar->BarRect.Min.y), ImVec2(tab_bar->ScrollingRectMaxX, tab_bar->BarRect.Max.y), IM_COL32(0, 255, 0, 255));
16573  }
16574  if (open)
16575  {
16576  for (int tab_n = 0; tab_n < tab_bar->Tabs.Size; tab_n++)
16577  {
16578  const ImGuiTabItem* tab = &tab_bar->Tabs[tab_n];
16579  PushID(tab);
16580  if (SmallButton("<")) { TabBarQueueReorder(tab_bar, tab, -1); } SameLine(0, 2);
16581  if (SmallButton(">")) { TabBarQueueReorder(tab_bar, tab, +1); } SameLine();
16582  Text("%02d%c Tab 0x%08X '%s' Offset: %.1f, Width: %.1f/%.1f",
16583  tab_n, (tab->ID == tab_bar->SelectedTabId) ? '*' : ' ', tab->ID, (tab->Window || tab->NameOffset != -1) ? tab_bar->GetTabName(tab) : "???", tab->Offset, tab->Width, tab->ContentWidth);
16584  PopID();
16585  }
16586  TreePop();
16587  }
16588 }
16589 
16590 void ImGui::DebugNodeViewport(ImGuiViewportP* viewport)
16591 {
16592  SetNextItemOpen(true, ImGuiCond_Once);
16593  if (TreeNode((void*)(intptr_t)viewport->ID, "Viewport #%d, ID: 0x%08X, Parent: 0x%08X, Window: \"%s\"", viewport->Idx, viewport->ID, viewport->ParentViewportId, viewport->Window ? viewport->Window->Name : "N/A"))
16594  {
16595  ImGuiWindowFlags flags = viewport->Flags;
16596  BulletText("Main Pos: (%.0f,%.0f), Size: (%.0f,%.0f)\nWorkArea Offset Left: %.0f Top: %.0f, Right: %.0f, Bottom: %.0f\nMonitor: %d, DpiScale: %.0f%%",
16597  viewport->Pos.x, viewport->Pos.y, viewport->Size.x, viewport->Size.y,
16598  viewport->WorkOffsetMin.x, viewport->WorkOffsetMin.y, viewport->WorkOffsetMax.x, viewport->WorkOffsetMax.y,
16599  viewport->PlatformMonitor, viewport->DpiScale * 100.0f);
16600  if (viewport->Idx > 0) { SameLine(); if (SmallButton("Reset Pos")) { viewport->Pos = ImVec2(200, 200); viewport->UpdateWorkRect(); if (viewport->Window) viewport->Window->Pos = viewport->Pos; } }
16601  BulletText("Flags: 0x%04X =%s%s%s%s%s%s%s%s%s%s%s%s", viewport->Flags,
16602  //(flags & ImGuiViewportFlags_IsPlatformWindow) ? " IsPlatformWindow" : "", // Omitting because it is the standard
16603  (flags & ImGuiViewportFlags_IsPlatformMonitor) ? " IsPlatformMonitor" : "",
16604  (flags & ImGuiViewportFlags_OwnedByApp) ? " OwnedByApp" : "",
16605  (flags & ImGuiViewportFlags_NoDecoration) ? " NoDecoration" : "",
16606  (flags & ImGuiViewportFlags_NoTaskBarIcon) ? " NoTaskBarIcon" : "",
16607  (flags & ImGuiViewportFlags_NoFocusOnAppearing) ? " NoFocusOnAppearing" : "",
16608  (flags & ImGuiViewportFlags_NoFocusOnClick) ? " NoFocusOnClick" : "",
16609  (flags & ImGuiViewportFlags_NoInputs) ? " NoInputs" : "",
16610  (flags & ImGuiViewportFlags_NoRendererClear) ? " NoRendererClear" : "",
16611  (flags & ImGuiViewportFlags_TopMost) ? " TopMost" : "",
16612  (flags & ImGuiViewportFlags_Minimized) ? " Minimized" : "",
16613  (flags & ImGuiViewportFlags_NoAutoMerge) ? " NoAutoMerge" : "",
16614  (flags & ImGuiViewportFlags_CanHostOtherWindows) ? " CanHostOtherWindows" : "");
16615  for (int layer_i = 0; layer_i < IM_ARRAYSIZE(viewport->DrawDataBuilder.Layers); layer_i++)
16616  for (int draw_list_i = 0; draw_list_i < viewport->DrawDataBuilder.Layers[layer_i].Size; draw_list_i++)
16617  DebugNodeDrawList(NULL, viewport, viewport->DrawDataBuilder.Layers[layer_i][draw_list_i], "DrawList");
16618  TreePop();
16619  }
16620 }
16621 
16622 void ImGui::DebugNodeWindow(ImGuiWindow* window, const char* label)
16623 {
16624  if (window == NULL)
16625  {
16626  BulletText("%s: NULL", label);
16627  return;
16628  }
16629 
16630  ImGuiContext& g = *GImGui;
16631  const bool is_active = window->WasActive;
16632  ImGuiTreeNodeFlags tree_node_flags = (window == g.NavWindow) ? ImGuiTreeNodeFlags_Selected : ImGuiTreeNodeFlags_None;
16633  if (!is_active) { PushStyleColor(ImGuiCol_Text, GetStyleColorVec4(ImGuiCol_TextDisabled)); }
16634  const bool open = TreeNodeEx(label, tree_node_flags, "%s '%s'%s", label, window->Name, is_active ? "" : " *Inactive*");
16635  if (!is_active) { PopStyleColor(); }
16636  if (IsItemHovered() && is_active)
16637  GetForegroundDrawList(window)->AddRect(window->Pos, window->Pos + window->Size, IM_COL32(255, 255, 0, 255));
16638  if (!open)
16639  return;
16640 
16641  if (window->MemoryCompacted)
16642  TextDisabled("Note: some memory buffers have been compacted/freed.");
16643 
16644  ImGuiWindowFlags flags = window->Flags;
16645  DebugNodeDrawList(window, window->Viewport, window->DrawList, "DrawList");
16646  BulletText("Pos: (%.1f,%.1f), Size: (%.1f,%.1f), ContentSize (%.1f,%.1f) Ideal (%.1f,%.1f)", window->Pos.x, window->Pos.y, window->Size.x, window->Size.y, window->ContentSize.x, window->ContentSize.y, window->ContentSizeIdeal.x, window->ContentSizeIdeal.y);
16647  BulletText("Flags: 0x%08X (%s%s%s%s%s%s%s%s%s..)", flags,
16648  (flags & ImGuiWindowFlags_ChildWindow) ? "Child " : "", (flags & ImGuiWindowFlags_Tooltip) ? "Tooltip " : "", (flags & ImGuiWindowFlags_Popup) ? "Popup " : "",
16649  (flags & ImGuiWindowFlags_Modal) ? "Modal " : "", (flags & ImGuiWindowFlags_ChildMenu) ? "ChildMenu " : "", (flags & ImGuiWindowFlags_NoSavedSettings) ? "NoSavedSettings " : "",
16650  (flags & ImGuiWindowFlags_NoMouseInputs)? "NoMouseInputs":"", (flags & ImGuiWindowFlags_NoNavInputs) ? "NoNavInputs" : "", (flags & ImGuiWindowFlags_AlwaysAutoResize) ? "AlwaysAutoResize" : "");
16651  BulletText("WindowClassId: 0x%08X", window->WindowClass.ClassId);
16652  BulletText("Scroll: (%.2f/%.2f,%.2f/%.2f) Scrollbar:%s%s", window->Scroll.x, window->ScrollMax.x, window->Scroll.y, window->ScrollMax.y, window->ScrollbarX ? "X" : "", window->ScrollbarY ? "Y" : "");
16653  BulletText("Active: %d/%d, WriteAccessed: %d, BeginOrderWithinContext: %d", window->Active, window->WasActive, window->WriteAccessed, (window->Active || window->WasActive) ? window->BeginOrderWithinContext : -1);
16654  BulletText("Appearing: %d, Hidden: %d (CanSkip %d Cannot %d), SkipItems: %d", window->Appearing, window->Hidden, window->HiddenFramesCanSkipItems, window->HiddenFramesCannotSkipItems, window->SkipItems);
16655  BulletText("NavLastIds: 0x%08X,0x%08X, NavLayerActiveMask: %X", window->NavLastIds[0], window->NavLastIds[1], window->DC.NavLayerActiveMask);
16656  BulletText("NavLastChildNavWindow: %s", window->NavLastChildNavWindow ? window->NavLastChildNavWindow->Name : "NULL");
16657  if (!window->NavRectRel[0].IsInverted())
16658  BulletText("NavRectRel[0]: (%.1f,%.1f)(%.1f,%.1f)", window->NavRectRel[0].Min.x, window->NavRectRel[0].Min.y, window->NavRectRel[0].Max.x, window->NavRectRel[0].Max.y);
16659  else
16660  BulletText("NavRectRel[0]: <None>");
16661  BulletText("Viewport: %d%s, ViewportId: 0x%08X, ViewportPos: (%.1f,%.1f)", window->Viewport ? window->Viewport->Idx : -1, window->ViewportOwned ? " (Owned)" : "", window->ViewportId, window->ViewportPos.x, window->ViewportPos.y);
16662  BulletText("ViewportMonitor: %d", window->Viewport ? window->Viewport->PlatformMonitor : -1);
16663  BulletText("DockId: 0x%04X, DockOrder: %d, Act: %d, Vis: %d", window->DockId, window->DockOrder, window->DockIsActive, window->DockTabIsVisible);
16664  if (window->DockNode || window->DockNodeAsHost)
16665  DebugNodeDockNode(window->DockNodeAsHost ? window->DockNodeAsHost : window->DockNode, window->DockNodeAsHost ? "DockNodeAsHost" : "DockNode");
16666  if (window->RootWindow != window) { DebugNodeWindow(window->RootWindow, "RootWindow"); }
16667  if (window->RootWindowDockStop != window->RootWindow) { DebugNodeWindow(window->RootWindowDockStop, "RootWindowDockStop"); }
16668  if (window->ParentWindow != NULL) { DebugNodeWindow(window->ParentWindow, "ParentWindow"); }
16669  if (window->DC.ChildWindows.Size > 0) { DebugNodeWindowsList(&window->DC.ChildWindows, "ChildWindows"); }
16670  if (window->ColumnsStorage.Size > 0 && TreeNode("Columns", "Columns sets (%d)", window->ColumnsStorage.Size))
16671  {
16672  for (int n = 0; n < window->ColumnsStorage.Size; n++)
16673  DebugNodeColumns(&window->ColumnsStorage[n]);
16674  TreePop();
16675  }
16676  DebugNodeStorage(&window->StateStorage, "Storage");
16677  TreePop();
16678 }
16679 
16680 void ImGui::DebugNodeWindowSettings(ImGuiWindowSettings* settings)
16681 {
16682  Text("0x%08X \"%s\" Pos (%d,%d) Size (%d,%d) Collapsed=%d",
16683  settings->ID, settings->GetName(), settings->Pos.x, settings->Pos.y, settings->Size.x, settings->Size.y, settings->Collapsed);
16684 }
16685 
16686 void ImGui::DebugNodeWindowsList(ImVector<ImGuiWindow*>* windows, const char* label)
16687 {
16688  if (!TreeNode(label, "%s (%d)", label, windows->Size))
16689  return;
16690  Text("(In front-to-back order:)");
16691  for (int i = windows->Size - 1; i >= 0; i--) // Iterate front to back
16692  {
16693  PushID((*windows)[i]);
16694  DebugNodeWindow((*windows)[i], "Window");
16695  PopID();
16696  }
16697  TreePop();
16698 }
16699 
16700 #else
16701 
16702 void ImGui::ShowMetricsWindow(bool*) {}
16703 void ImGui::DebugNodeColumns(ImGuiOldColumns*) {}
16704 void ImGui::DebugNodeDrawList(ImGuiWindow*, ImGuiViewportP*, const ImDrawList*, const char*) {}
16705 void ImGui::DebugNodeDrawCmdShowMeshAndBoundingBox(ImDrawList*, const ImDrawList*, const ImDrawCmd*, bool, bool) {}
16706 void ImGui::DebugNodeStorage(ImGuiStorage*, const char*) {}
16707 void ImGui::DebugNodeTabBar(ImGuiTabBar*, const char*) {}
16708 void ImGui::DebugNodeWindow(ImGuiWindow*, const char*) {}
16709 void ImGui::DebugNodeWindowSettings(ImGuiWindowSettings*) {}
16710 void ImGui::DebugNodeWindowsList(ImVector<ImGuiWindow*>*, const char*) {}
16711 void ImGui::DebugNodeViewport(ImGuiViewportP*) {}

16714 
16715 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
16716 
16717 // Include imgui_user.inl at the end of imgui.cpp to access private data/functions that aren't exposed.
16718 // Prefer just including imgui_internal.h from your code rather than using this define. If a declaration is missing from imgui_internal.h add it or request it on the github.
16719 #ifdef IMGUI_INCLUDE_IMGUI_USER_INL
16720 #include "imgui_user.inl"
16721 #endif
16722 
16723 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
16724 
16725 #endif // #ifndef IMGUI_DISABLE
glm::min
GLM_FUNC_DECL GLM_CONSTEXPR genType min(genType x, genType y)
Definition: func_common.inl:17
glm::length
GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER T length(vec< L, T, Q > const &v)
Definition: func_geometric.inl:136
glm::dot
GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER GLM_CONSTEXPR T dot(vec< L, T, Q > const &x, vec< L, T, Q > const &y)
Definition: func_geometric.inl:167
